programme.title: Football: 2nd league highlights / FuSSball: 2. Liga Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights and summaries of the games of the Easter 2nd league are shown. / Gezeigt werden Highlights und Zusammenfassungen der Partien der osterreichischen 2. Liga.

programme.title: Basic Instinct / Basic Instinct
programme.desc: The murder commissioner Nick Curran is investigating in the case of a late rock star in San Francisco. The main suspect is the friend of the rock star Catherine, who wrote a book about a similar murder case. But Catherine has a strong attraction on Nick. When he finds out that a policeman will die in Catherine's latest book, he fits in a dangerous situation. / Der Mordkommissar Nick Curran ermittelt im Fall eines verstorbenen Rockstars in San Francisco. Die Hauptverdachtige ist die Freundin des Rockstars Catherine, die ein Buch uber einen ahnlichen Mordfall geschrieben hat. Doch Catherine ubt eine starke Anziehung auf Nick aus. Als er herausfindet, dass in Catherines neuestem Buch ein Polizist sterben wird, befurchtet er, in eine gefahrliche Situation geraten zu sein.

programme.title: Auerhaus / Auerhaus
programme.desc: Six friends want to live their lives differently. They move to a shared apartment. There they want to break out of their predictable existence. The focus is on her friend Frieder, who is not sure whether he is able to live this life. / Sechs Freunde wollen ihr Leben anders leben. Sie ziehen in eine Wohngemeinschaft. Dort wollen sie aus ihrer vorhersehbaren Existenz ausbrechen. Im Zentrum steht ihr Freund Frieder, der nicht sicher ist, ob er zu diesem Leben in der Lage ist.

programme.title: Herzblatt Taxi - love to take away / Herzblatt Taxi - Liebe zum Mitnehmen
programme.desc: The taxi stops in Lower Easter and Karnten, where creativity is required when it comes to dream vacation and favorite room. In search of the Herzblatt, the book-loving dentist Lisa and the metal fan Philipp are. / Zum Auftakt macht das Taxi Halt in Niederosterreich und Karnten, wo in Sachen Traumurlaub und Lieblingsraum Kreativitat gefragt ist. Auf der Suche nach dem Herzblatt sind die bucherliebende Zahnarztin Lisa und der Metal-Fan Philipp.

programme.title: Swimming highlights / Schwimmen Highlights

programme.desc: Highlights and summaries from swimming. / Highlights und Zusammenfassungen aus dem Schwimmsport.

programme.title: King Julien / King Julien
programme.desc: Julien is the jungle's new monarch and he turns the kingdom into a party zone. Unfortunately, he also has to be king to satisfy his subjects. However, the regent does not like that. / Julien ist der neue Monarch des Dschungels und er verwandelt das Konigreich in eine Party-Zone. Dummerweise muss er sich auch als Konig betatigen, um seine Untertanen zufrieden zu stellen. Das schmeckt dem Regenten allerdings gar nicht.

programme.title: Turbo FAST / Turbo FAST
programme.sub-title: Hartschale jagt Turbo; Wo bist du, Mr. Brummer?
programme.desc: After a strange accident, the Turbo snail develops extraordinary speed. This allows the snail to finally realize its dream and take part in the Indianapolis 500, a based car race. / Nach einem seltsamen Unfall entwickelt die Schnecke Turbo eine auSSergewohnliche Schnelligkeit. Dadurch kann die Schnecke endlich ihren Traum verwirklichen und am Indianapolis 500, einem beruhmten Autorennen, teilnehmen.

programme.title: Zoo and so - animal wild! / Zoo und so - Tierisch wild!
programme.desc: The Chester Zoo in the northwest of England is one of the greatest zoos in the country and houses over 20,000 animals. A film team watches everyday life in the zoo for months and gives an impression of the life of animals and the work of the zookeepers. / Der Chester Zoo im Nordwesten Englands ist einer der groSSten Zoos des Landes und beherbergt uber 20.000 Tiere. Ein Filmteam beobachtet den Alltag im Zoo uber Monate und vermittelt einen Eindruck vom Leben der Tiere und der Arbeit der Tierpfleger.

programme.title: Black-ish / Black-ish
programme.desc: Andre Johnson, called Dre, loves his job, his wife Rainbow and his four children about everything. programme.title: The Goldbergs / Die Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam uses his video camera to record the Goldberg family in the golden 80s. Even his father's outburst of anger, his mother's superiority behavior or the conflicts of the siblings are not safe in front of the camera. / Adam nutzt seine Videokamera, um in den goldenen 80er-Jahren die Familie Goldberg aufzunehmen. Selbst die Wutausbruche seines Vaters, das uberfursorgliche Verhalten seiner Mutter oder die Konflikte der Geschwister sind nicht vor der Kamera sicher.

programme.title: Die Simpsons / Die Simpsons
programme.desc: There is always something going on in the life of the Simpson family. The lovable, but persecuted by the bad luck, dashful and rather lazy father Homer Simpson works in a nuclear power plant and tries to keep his family over water. As a mother and housewife, his wife Marge is the good soul at Simpson and always tries to improve basic moral values in both family and society. The parents have all the hands full to do with their three children. In the ten -year beard you never know which prank he outsource as the next. The eight -year -old highly intelligent and ambitious Lisa is a world improver who is often praised as a nerd at school. Baby Maggie's Simpsons are improved. The life of the family and the other residents of the US small city of Springfield is characterized by everyday chaos and normal madness of society. / Im Leben der Familie Simpson ist immer etwas los. Der liebenswerte, aber vom Pech verfolgte, schusselige und ziemlich faule Vater Homer Simpson arbeitet in einem Atomkraftwerk und versucht, seine Familie bestmoglich uber Wasser zu halten. Seine Frau Marge ist als Mutter und Hausfrau die gute Seele im Hause Simpson und versucht stets, sowohl in der Familie als auch in der Gesellschaft die moralischen Grundwerte zu verbessern. Die Eltern haben alle Hande voll zu tun mit ihren drei Kindern. Bei dem zehnjahrigen Bart weiSS man nie, welchen Streich er als nachstes ausheckt. Die achtjahrige hochintelligente und ehrgeizige Lisa ist eine Weltverbesserin, die in der Schule oft als Streber gehanselt wird. Vervollstandigt werden die Simpsons von Baby Maggie. Das Leben der Familie und der anderen Bewohner der US-Kleinstadt Springfield ist gepragt vom alltaglichen Chaos und ganz normalen Wahnsinn der Gesellschaft.

programme.desc: Founded in 2000, the Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina is the highest rank of football competitions in BiH. With the entry of cubes from Republika Srpska, two years later, the league receives a format with 16 clubs in the two -round competition system. Today, 12 clubs compete in the league, which after 22 rounds are divided into the Champions League and League to stay. The first historic champion of BiH was Leotar from Trebinje. The club with the highest championship titles Zrinjski is from Mostar. The greatest European success is the placement of Željezničar in the UEFA semi -finals in 1984. / Osnovana 2000. godine Premijer liga Bosne i Hercegovine najviši je rang nogometnih natjecanja u BiH. Ulaskom kubova iz Republike Srpske dvije godine kasnije liga dobiva format sa 16 klubova u dvokružnom sistemu natjecanja. Danas se u ligi natječe 12 klubova koje se nakon 22 odigrana kola dijele na Ligu za prvaka i Ligu za ostanak. Prvi povijesni prvak BiH bio je Leotar iz Trebinja. Klub s najviše osvojenih naslova prvaka Zrinjski je iz Mostara. Najveći europski uspjeh plasman je Željezničara u polufinale kupa UEFA 1984. godine.

programme.title: Football - Champions League Qualifications / Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za Ligu prvaka

programme.title: Football - Superliga Serbia / Fudbal - Superliga Srbije
programme.desc: The Serbian Super League has had its premiere in the 2006/2007 season. In today's league system, there are 20 teams and functions on the two-circular principle of competition. The history of the Super League was largely marked by two large Belgrade Rivals, Partizan and Red Star. Historically, according to the number of titles, the red-white part of the city is more successful. / Srpska Superliga svoju premijeru imala je u sezoni 2006./2007. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 20 ekipa i funkcionira po dvokružnom principu takmičenja. Historiju Superlige u najvećoj su mjeri obilježila dva velika beogradska rivala, Partizan i Crvena zvezda. Historijski gledano, po broju osvojenih naslova crveno-bijeli dio grada je uspješniji.

programme.title: Football - Brazilian League / Fudbal - Brazilska liga
programme.desc: Series A is the first rank of a football competition in Brazil. High attendance and the extremely attacking style of football attracts a large number of fans around the world. / Serija A je prvi rang nogometnog takmičenja u Brazilu. Visoka posjećenost i izuzetno napadački stil nogometa privlači veliki broj obožavatelja širom svijeta.

Danas se u ligi natječe 12 klubova koje se nakon 22 odigrana kola dijele na Ligu za prvaka i Ligu za ostanak. Prvi povijesni prvak BiH bio je Leotar iz Trebinja. programme.title: Made in Italy - Champions of Italy / Made in Italy - Champions of Italy
programme.desc: The largest League competition in Italy was founded in 1898. Twenty clubs are struggled every year for the prestigious title of Champions series A. / Najveće ligaško takmičenje u Italiji osnovano je 1898 godine. Dvadeset klubova se svake godine bori za prestižnu titulu prvaka Serije A.

programme.title: FBBAL - Italian League / Fudbal - Italijanska liga
programme.desc: Italian series and is a professional football competition that counts 20 teams in the two-circular league championship. Since 1929, when she was founded, a series A became synonymous with tactical football. For many years, Italian football has considered the best in Europe with its quality and a series of great players and trainers. With the fall of the financial power of Italian first league and a series of corruption scandals, the league briefly fell in quality but is returned to the place where it belongs. / Italijanska Serija A profesionalno je fudbalsko takmičenje koje broji 20 momčadi u dvokružnom ligaškom prvenstvu. Još od 1929. godine kada je osnovana, Serija A je postala sinonim za taktički fudbal. Dugi niz godina italijanski se fudbal svojom kvalitetom te nizom sjajnih igrača i trenera smatrao najboljim u Evropi. Padom finansijske moći italijanskih prvoligaša te nizom korupcijskih skandala liga je nakratko pala u kvaliteti ali se sigurnim koracima vraća na mjesto gdje i pripada.

programme.title: Football - Poland League / Fudbal - Poljska liga
programme.desc: Ekstraklasa is the highest professional football league of Poland. The first league of Poland in football was founded in 1927. years, and the League organizes the Football Association of Poland (PZPN). Currently, 16 teams participate in the league, and the winner directly wins the title of the Polish Champion. / Ekstraklasa je najviša profesionalna fudbalska liga Poljske. Prva liga Poljske u fudbalu osnovana je 1927. godine, a tu ligu organizuje Fudbalski savez Poljske (PZPN). Trenutno u ligi sudjeluje 16 ekipa, a pobjednik direktno osvaja titulu poljskog šampiona.

Prva liga Poljske u fudbalu osnovana je 1927. godine, a tu ligu organizuje Fudbalski savez Poljske (PZPN). Trenutno u ligi sudjeluje 16 ekipa, a pobjednik direktno osvaja titulu poljskog šampiona.

programme.title: Football - Spanish League / Fudbal - Španska liga
programme.desc: Primera or popular La Liga is the first Spanish football league. With as many as 22 conquered titles of the European Primary Champion, the Spanish Primera for years are considered the best European football league. Founded in 1929. year, the example counts 20 teams that in 38 cars are trying to collect the largest number of points. This is the most path to go to Madrid Real, while the other is the most successful Team Barcelona. With top teams of Spanish league, it adorns and extremely technical mentality of the game mostly clubs with the aim of overcoming opponents. / Primera ili popularno La Liga prva je španska fudbalska liga. Sa čak 22 osvojene titule prvaka Evrope španska Primera godinama se smatra najboljom evropskom fudbalskom ligom. Osnovana 1929. godine, Primera broji 20 ekipa koje u 38 kola sezone pokušavaju skupiti najveći broj bodova. To je najviše puta pošlo za rukom madridskom Realu dok je druga najuspješnija ekipa Barselona. Uz vrhunske ekipe špansku ligu krasi i izrazito tehnički mentalitet igre većine klubova sa ciljem za nadigravanjem protivnika.

programme.title: Football: HNL / Fudbal: HNL
programme.desc: Croatian football league (HNL) was founded in 1992. year and the first historical title won Split Hajduk. Through years, the system of competition and the number of clubs changed but in recent years, today's system with 10 teams and the four-round form of the competition. The transition cup intended to champion is the work of the academic sculptor Marijana earns. He won him in Zagreb Dinamo mostly. / Hrvatska fudbalska liga (HNL) osnovana je 1992. godine i prvu istorijsku titulu je osvojio splitski Hajduk. Kroz godine sistem takmičenja i broj klubova se mijenjao ali poslednjih godina ustalio se današnji sistem sa 10 ekipa i četverokružnim oblikom takmičenja. Prijelazni kup namjenjen prvaku djelo je akademskog kipara Marijana Zaradića. Najviše puta osvajao ga je zagrebački Dinamo.

programme.desc: Primera or popular La Liga is the first Spanish football league. With as many as 22 conquered titles of the European Primary Champion, the Spanish Primera for years are considered the best European football league. Founded in 1929. year, the example counts 20 teams that in 38 cars are trying to collect the largest number of points. This is the most path to go to Madrid Real, while the other is the most successful Team Barcelona. With top teams of Spanish league, it adorns and extremely technical mentality of the game mostly clubs with the aim of overcoming opponents. / Primera ili popularno La Liga prva je španska fudbalska liga. Sa čak 22 osvojene titule prvaka Evrope španska Primera godinama se smatra najboljom evropskom fudbalskom ligom. Osnovana 1929. godine, Primera broji 20 ekipa koje u 38 kola sezone pokušavaju skupiti najveći broj bodova. To je najviše puta pošlo za rukom madridskom Realu dok je druga najuspješnija ekipa Barselona. Uz vrhunske ekipe špansku ligu krasi i izrazito tehnički mentalitet igre većine klubova sa ciljem za nadigravanjem protivnika.

programme.title: LaLiga Talking Football / LaLiga Talking Football
programme.desc: Interesting talks with current and former participants in the highest, Spanish, football league. They talk about their experiences, opinion and unforgettable time spent in the game. / Interesantni razgovori sa sadašnjim i bivšim učesnicima najviše, španske, fudbalske lige. Oni pričaju o svojim iskustvima, mišljenju i nezaboravnom vremenu provedenom u igri.

programme.title: Football: HNL / Fudbal: HNL
programme.desc: Croatian football league (HNL) was founded in 1992. year and the first historical title won Split Hajduk. Through years, the system of competition and the number of clubs changed but in recent years, today's system with 10 teams and the four-round form of the competition. The transition cup intended to champion is the work of the academic sculptor Marijana earns. He won him in Zagreb Dinamo mostly. / Hrvatska fudbalska liga (HNL) osnovana je 1992. godine i prvu istorijsku titulu je osvojio splitski Hajduk. Kroz godine sistem takmičenja i broj klubova se mijenjao ali poslednjih godina ustalio se današnji sistem sa 10 ekipa i četverokružnim oblikom takmičenja. Prijelazni kup namjenjen prvaku djelo je akademskog kipara Marijana Zaradića. Najviše puta osvajao ga je zagrebački Dinamo.

programme.desc: Youth sports games are the largest manifestation for children and youth in this area whose main goal is to promote a healthy lifestyle and friendship. / Sportske igre mladih najveća su manifestacija za djecu i omladinu na ovim prostorima čiji je osnovni cilj promocija zdravog načina života i prijateljstva.

programme.title: Basketball - Serbian League / Košarka - Srpska liga
programme.desc: Serbia has its first basketball league as the highest rank of professional basketball in that country. The League itself was founded in 2006. and as such as 14 teams. The competition takes place according to the subcircular point system and in mutual meetings each club hosts one time and by one guest. It is interesting in this part of the competition, Serbian clubs playing in this part of the competition, which play the regional ABA league. After the first part of the four best clubs are placed in the Super League in which clubs that played a regional competition are placed only then and in that phase, the Champions of Serbia is decided. The number of clubs that will be placed in the Super League depends on the number of representatives in the regional league, but in that part of the competition, there are always 8 teams. / Srbija ima svoju prvu košarkašku ligu kao najviši rang profesionalne košarke u toj zemlji. Sama liga osnovana je 2006. godine i kao takva broji 14 timova. Takmičenje se odvija po dvokružnom bod sistemu te je u međusobnim susretima svaki klub jedan put domaćin i po jednom gost. Zanimljivost je što u ovom delu takmičenja ne nastupaju i srpski klubovi koji igraju regionalnu ABA ligu. Nakon prvog dela četiri najbolja kluba se plasiraju u Superligu u kojoj se tek tada priključuju klubovi koji su igrali regionalno takmičenje i u toj fazi se odlučuje o prvaku Srbije. Broj klubova koji će se plasirati u Superligu zavisi o broju predstavnika u regionalnoj ligi, no u tom delu takmičenja se uvek nalazi 8 timova.

programme.title: Football - friendly match / Fudbal - Prijateljska utakmica
programme.desc: Club seasons in most of the world leagues are divided by two parts, autumn and spring. At the time of summer and winter, the clubs are in the preparatory period and complement the difficult pace of training by playing preparatory friendly matches. Friendly meetings are a great way to test the current team of teams and temptation of different tactical variants for the upcoming official matches. In friendly matches, the emphasis is on the fair game and the coaches are allowed to make an unlimited number of changes. / Klupske sezone u većini svjetskih liga podijeljene su dva dijela, jesenski i proljetni. U vrijeme ljeta i zime klubovi su u pripremnom periodu te težak ritam treninga upotpunjuju odigravanjem pripremnih prijateljskih utakmica. Prijateljski susreti odličan su način za ispitivanje trenutne snage momčadi i iskušavanje različitih taktičkih varijanti za nadolazeće službene utakmice. U prijateljskim susretima naglasak je na fer igri te je trenerima dozvoljeno napraviti neograničeni broj izmjena.

The number of clubs that will be placed in the Super League depends on the number of representatives in the regional league, but in that part of the competition, there are always 8 teams. / Srbija ima svoju prvu košarkašku ligu kao najviši rang profesionalne košarke u toj zemlji. Sama liga osnovana je 2006. godine i kao takva broji 14 timova. Takmičenje se odvija po dvokružnom bod sistemu te je u međusobnim susretima svaki klub jedan put domaćin i po jednom gost. Zanimljivost je što u ovom delu takmičenja ne nastupaju i srpski klubovi koji igraju regionalnu ABA ligu. Nakon prvog dela četiri najbolja kluba se plasiraju u Superligu u kojoj se tek tada priključuju klubovi koji su igrali regionalno takmičenje i u toj fazi se odlučuje o prvaku Srbije. Broj klubova koji će se plasirati u Superligu zavisi o broju predstavnika u regionalnoj ligi, no u tom delu takmičenja se uvek nalazi 8 timova.

programme.title: Football - Poland League / Fudbal - Poljska liga
programme.desc: Ekstraklasa is the highest professional football league of Poland. The first league of Poland in football was founded in 1927. years, and the League organizes the Football Association of Poland (PZPN). Currently, 16 teams participate in the league, and the winner directly wins the title of the Polish Champion. / Ekstraklasa je najviša profesionalna fudbalska liga Poljske. Prva liga Poljske u fudbalu osnovana je 1927. godine, a tu ligu organizuje Fudbalski savez Poljske (PZPN). Trenutno u ligi sudjeluje 16 ekipa, a pobjednik direktno osvaja titulu poljskog šampiona.

programme.title: Auto Shop Magazin / Auto Shop Magazin
programme.desc: Follow the show "Auto Shop magazine" and keep up to date with the latest developments in the world of automobilism. / Pratite emisiju "Auto Shop Magazin" i budite u toku sa najnovijim dešavanjima u svijetu automobilizma.

programme.title: Auto Shop Magazin / Auto Shop Magazin
programme.desc: Follow the show "Auto Shop magazine" and keep up to date with the latest developments in the world of automobilism. / Pratite emisiju "Auto Shop Magazin" i budite u toku sa najnovijim dešavanjima u svijetu automobilizma.

programme.title: Football - Romania League / Fudbal - Rumunjska liga
programme.desc: Romania's first football league has a long history, the first season has been played back in 1909. year when the first title won the extinguished Olympi Bucharest today. Throughout history, the undisputed rulers of this league are Steau and Dinamo from Bucharest who took most of the title of champions. The League currently has 14 clubs and after "regular" work, where everyone plays one game at home and one in the guests, the league is divided into two parts. The first part is play off for the champion where six best clubs are participated as the rest is struggling in a special part for survival. / Prva fudbalska liga Rumunije ima dugačku istoriju, prva sezona je odigrana davne 1909. godine kada je prvu titulu osvojila danas ugašena Olimpija Bukurešt. Kroz istoriju neprikosnoveni vladari ove lige su Steaua i Dinamo iz Bukurešta koji su uzeli većinu titula šampiona. Trenutno liga broji 14 klubova i nakon "regularnog" dela, gdje svako sa svakim igra po jednu utakmicu na domaćem terenu i jednu u gostima, liga se deli na dva dijela. Prvi dio je play off za šampiona gde učestvuje šest najbolje plasiranih klubova dok se ostatak bori u posebnom delu za opstanak.

programme.title: Great Sporting Moments / Great Sporting Moments
programme.desc: Magazine on the highest moments in the history of sports. / Magazin o najvećim trenucima u istoriji sporta.

programme.title: Football: HNL / Fudbal: HNL
programme.desc: Croatian football league (HNL) was founded in 1992. year and the first historical title won Split Hajduk. Through years, the system of competition and the number of clubs changed but in recent years, today's system with 10 teams and the four-round form of the competition. The transition cup intended to champion is the work of the academic sculptor Marijana earns. He won him in Zagreb Dinamo mostly. / Hrvatska fudbalska liga (HNL) osnovana je 1992. godine i prvu istorijsku titulu je osvojio splitski Hajduk. Kroz godine sistem takmičenja i broj klubova se mijenjao ali poslednjih godina ustalio se današnji sistem sa 10 ekipa i četverokružnim oblikom takmičenja. Prijelazni kup namjenjen prvaku djelo je akademskog kipara Marijana Zaradića. Najviše puta osvajao ga je zagrebački Dinamo.

programme.title: Football - Superliga Serbia / Fudbal - Superliga Srbije
programme.desc: The Serbian Super League has had its premiere in the 2006/2007 season. In today's league system, there are 20 teams and functions on the two-circular principle of competition. The history of the Super League was largely marked by two large Belgrade Rivals, Partizan and Red Star. Historically, according to the number of titles, the red-white part of the city is more successful. / Srpska Superliga svoju premijeru imala je u sezoni 2006./2007. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 20 ekipa i funkcionira po dvokružnom principu takmičenja. Historiju Superlige u najvećoj su mjeri obilježila dva velika beogradska rivala, Partizan i Crvena zvezda. Historijski gledano, po broju osvojenih naslova crveno-bijeli dio grada je uspješniji.

programme.desc: The Serbian Super League has had its premiere in the 2006/2007 season. In today's league system, there are 20 teams and functions on the two-circular principle of competition. The history of the Super League was largely marked by two large Belgrade Rivals, Partizan and Red Star. Historically, according to the number of titles, the red-white part of the city is more successful. / Srpska Superliga svoju premijeru imala je u sezoni 2006./2007. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 20 ekipa i funkcionira po dvokružnom principu takmičenja. Historiju Superlige u najvećoj su mjeri obilježila dva velika beogradska rivala, Partizan i Crvena zvezda. Historijski gledano, po broju osvojenih naslova crveno-bijeli dio grada je uspješniji.

programme.title: Football: Russian Premier League / Fudbal: Ruska Premier Liga
programme.desc: The Russian Football League is getting closer to the quality of the League "Five", so no special invitation is required to follow the duels of the greats such as Zenit St. Petersburg, CSKA and Spartak Moscow. / Ruska nogometna liga je sve bliže kvalitetom ligama "Petice", stoga nije potrebna posebna pozivnica da na malim ekranima pratite dvoboje velikana kao što su Zenit St. Petersburg, CSKA i Spartak Moskva.

programme.title: Great Sporting Moments / Great Sporting Moments
programme.desc: Magazine on the highest moments in the history of sports. / Magazin o najvećim trenucima u istoriji sporta.

programme.title: Football - Romania League / Fudbal - Rumunjska liga
programme.desc: Romania's first football league has a long history, the first season has been played back in 1909. year when the first title won the extinguished Olympi Bucharest today. Throughout history, the undisputed rulers of this league are Steau and Dinamo from Bucharest who took most of the title of champions. The League currently has 14 clubs and after "regular" work, where everyone plays one game at home and one in the guests, the league is divided into two parts. The first part is play off for the champion where six best clubs are participated as the rest is struggling in a special part for survival. / Prva fudbalska liga Rumunije ima dugačku istoriju, prva sezona je odigrana davne 1909. godine kada je prvu titulu osvojila danas ugašena Olimpija Bukurešt. Kroz istoriju neprikosnoveni vladari ove lige su Steaua i Dinamo iz Bukurešta koji su uzeli većinu titula šampiona. Trenutno liga broji 14 klubova i nakon "regularnog" dela, gdje svako sa svakim igra po jednu utakmicu na domaćem terenu i jednu u gostima, liga se deli na dva dijela. Prvi dio je play off za šampiona gde učestvuje šest najbolje plasiranih klubova dok se ostatak bori u posebnom delu za opstanak.

programme.title: Football: HNL / Fudbal: HNL
programme.desc: Croatian football league (HNL) was founded in 1992. year and the first historical title won Split Hajduk. Through years, the system of competition and the number of clubs changed but in recent years, today's system with 10 teams and the four-round form of the competition. The transition cup intended to champion is the work of the academic sculptor Marijana earns. He won him in Zagreb Dinamo mostly. / Hrvatska fudbalska liga (HNL) osnovana je 1992. godine i prvu istorijsku titulu je osvojio splitski Hajduk. Kroz godine sistem takmičenja i broj klubova se mijenjao ali poslednjih godina ustalio se današnji sistem sa 10 ekipa i četverokružnim oblikom takmičenja. Prijelazni kup namjenjen prvaku djelo je akademskog kipara Marijana Zaradića. Najviše puta osvajao ga je zagrebački Dinamo.

programme.title: Tennis: Canada WTA tournament / Tennis : Tournoi WTA du Canada
programme.desc: Follow WTA 1000 tournament matches from Montreal and Toronto, among the most prestigious tournaments of the WTA Tour of Tennis. This tournament, also known as Canada Open, is played on a hard surface outdoors. Each year, WTA and ATP tournaments change host city, alternating between Montreal and Toronto. It is also one of the oldest tournaments on the Tour, already played at the end of the 19th century. / Suivez des matchs des tournois WTA 1000 de Montreal et de Toronto, parmi les tournois les plus prestigieux du WTA Tour de tennis. Ce tournoi, aussi connu sous le nom de Canada Open, se joue sur surface dure en exterieur. Chaque annee, les tournois WTA et ATP changent de ville hôte, en alternance entre Montreal et Toronto. Cest aussi un des plus anciens tournois sur le tour, joue dejà à la fin du XIX siècle.

programme.title: Tennis: Canada WTA tournament / Tennis : Tournoi WTA du Canada
programme.desc: Follow WTA 1000 tournament matches from Montreal and Toronto, among the most prestigious tournaments of the WTA Tour of Tennis. programme.title: Salon VIP / Salon VIP
programme.desc: In the BeIN Sports VIP lounge, Claire Arnoux welcomes an prompt, sports or not, that shares her passion for sport. In an atmosphere discontracted, the latest sports lactualite news is reviewed, as well as the highlights of preceding days. / Dans le Salon VIP de beIN SPORTS, Claire Arnoux accueille un invite, sportif ou non, qui fait partager sa passion du sport. Dans une ambiance decontractee, les dernières news de lactualite sportive sont passees en revue, ainsi que les resultats marquants des jours precedents.

programme.title: Kylian Mbappe - First season / Kylian Mbappe - Première saison
programme.desc: Back on the first months of Kylian Mbappe with Real Madrid! Between dream and nightmare, the Frenchman lived on halftone starts. / Retour sur les premiers mois de Kylian Mbappe avec le Real Madrid ! Entre reve et cauchemar, le Français a vecu des debuts en demi-teinte.

programme.title: Rugby to XIII : NRL / Rugby à XIII : NRL
programme.desc: Retransmission of a NRL match, the Australian National Rugby Championship in XIII. The National Rugby League is a moon of the two most prestigious XIII rugby competitions in the world with the Super League. NEE in 1998 of the merger of Laustralian Rugby League (ARL) and the Super League Daustralia, the NRL is based on a franchise system in a firm championship and without possible backing. Sixteen franchises make up this championship. / Retransmission dun match de NRL, le championnat national australien de rugby à XIII. La National Rugby League est lune des deux competitions de rugby à XIII les plus prestigieuses du monde avec la Super League. Nee en 1998 de la fusion de lAustralian Rugby League (ARL) et de la Super League dAustralie, la NRL repose sur un système de franchises dans un championnat ferme et sans relegation possible. Seize franchises composent ce championnat.

programme.title: This is Paris / This is Paris
programme.desc: This is Paris is the magazine DEDIE in all the lactuality of Paris Saint-Germain: last news from the locker room, reports and interviews of those who make the club, everything is reviewed as well as the last results and the next to come. / This is Paris est le magazine dedie à toute lactualite du Paris Saint-Germain : dernières news des vestiaires, reportages et interviews de ceux qui font le club, tout est passe en revue ainsi que les derniers resultats et les prochaines echeances à venir.

programme.title: Tennis: Canada WTA tournament / Tennis : Tournoi WTA du Canada
programme.desc: Follow WTA 1000 tournament matches from Montreal and Toronto, among the most prestigious tournaments of the WTA Tour of Tennis. This tournament, also known as Canada Open, is played on a hard surface outdoors. Each year, WTA and ATP tournaments change host city, alternating between Montreal and Toronto. It is also one of the oldest tournaments on the Tour, already played at the end of the 19th century. / Suivez des matchs des tournois WTA 1000 de Montreal et de Toronto, parmi les tournois les plus prestigieux du WTA Tour de tennis. Ce tournoi, aussi connu sous le nom de Canada Open, se joue sur surface dure en exterieur. Chaque annee, les tournois WTA et ATP changent de ville hôte, en alternance entre Montreal et Toronto. Cest aussi un des plus anciens tournois sur le tour, joue dejà à la fin du XIX siècle.

This sport, the first rules of which were adopted at the end of the 19th century in the United Kingdom, was registered worldwide by FIFA, created in 1904, and each continent has its own federation, Luefa representing them. / A suivre, un match dispute dans le cadre dune competition de football. Aucun continent nechappe à la ferveur de la pratique de cette discipline, et chaque pays dispose de ses propres federations et divisions. Ce sport, dont les premières règles furent adoptees dès la fin du XIXe siècle au Royaume-Uni, est regi au niveau mondial par la FIFA, creee en 1904, et chaque continent possède sa propre federation, lUEFA representant lEurope.

programme.title: Equitation: Dinard International Jumping / Equitation : Jumping international de Dinard
programme.desc: Dissemination of Dinard's international Jumping, a prestigious hippic competition appeared in 1912. Long unofficial, the decision was taken in 1934 to transform this very popular meeting among the riders into an official Competition. He was classified in the category of international competitions in 1960, allowing him to discuss competitions such as Deurope championships. / Diffusion du Jumping International de Dinard, un prestigieux concours hippique apparu dès 1912. Longtemps officieux, la decision fut prise en 1934 de transformer ce rendez-vous très populaire parmi les cavaliers en une competition officielle. Il a ete classe dans la categorie des concours internationaux en 1960, lui permettant daccueillir des competitions telles que des championnats dEurope.

programme.title: The dream of life / Le Reve dune vie
programme.desc: In 2025, Serbian Novak Djokovic Sapaprete to play Wimbledon for the 20th time. His claim was to lift the trophee, he will succeed 7 times. "The dream of a life" recounts the history of a boy in ex-Yugoslavia who discovers the lawn in 2005, and who will take a taste for the point of degusting a few strands in each final victory. / En 2025, le Serbe Novak Djokovic sapprete à disputer Wimbledon pour la 20ème fois. Son reve denfant etait de soulever le trophee, il va y parvenir à 7 reprises. "Le Reve dune vie" raconte lhistoire dun garçon ne en ex-Yougoslavie qui decouvre le gazon en 2005, et qui va y prendre goût au point den deguster quelques brins dherbe à chaque victoire finale.

programme.title: Volley-ball : Marmara SpikeLigue / Volley-ball : Marmara SpikeLigue
programme.desc: Last act, last breath: the SAPPRETE TVB to live a dhistory evening on Saturday in Grenon, against Poitiers. Winner in Laller (3-1), Tours has a golden opportunity to decocate a 10th title of champion of France, which would propel him near CANNES at the top of hexagonal volleyball. But a Nobeit derby has no logic. Poitiers, heckling but far from being killed, knows that he would be enough for him a victory, of four Daudace sets, to write his own legend. LEXPLOIT DE NANTES LAN passes, who came Simpose at the gold set, feeds their hopes. Lalterna will count on Nik Mujanovic, in quest for last coup in the pepper colors before joining the TVB this summer. At the end of the path: them and the Champions League. But for Tours, it is also a plowing of a forge season in the fight. / Dernier acte, dernier souffle : le TVB sapprete à vivre une soiree aux allures dhistoire samedi à Grenon, face à Poitiers. Vainqueur à laller (3-1), Tours a une occasion en or de decrocher un 10e titre de champion de France, qui le propulserait à hauteur de lAS Cannes au sommet du volley hexagonal. Mais un derby nobeit à aucune logique. Poitiers, chahute mais loin detre abattu, sait quil lui suffirait dune victoire, de quatre sets daudace, pour ecrire sa propre legende. Lexploit de Nantes lan passe, venu simposer au set en or, alimente leurs espoirs. LAlterna comptera sur Nik Mujanovic, en quete dun dernier coup declat sous les couleurs poitevines avant de rejoindre le TVB cet ete. Au bout du chemin : lEurope et la Ligue des Champions. Mais pour Tours, cest aussi laboutissement dune saison forgee dans la lutte.

Basic Instinct / Basic Instinct
programme.desc: Detective Nick Curran is commissioned to clear up a murder. programme.title: Auerhaus / Auerhaus
programme.desc: Atmospheric, empty film adaptation of the Bov Bjerg cult stream of the same name. Four young people Grund a shared apartment in the province. Used behind the walls of an old farmhouse, they want to develop their living environments freely and open up new perspectives to their friend Frieder (Max von der Groeben). His friend Frieder suffers from severe depression. After his dismissal from psychiatry, Frieder suggests that a flat share in the abandoned house of his grandfather. Together with Hoppner, his girlfriend Vera and class colleague Cacilia also move to the Auerhaus, where they want to celebrate the moment and be there for each other. / Stimmungsvoll einfuhlsame Verfilmung des gleichnamigen Kultromans von Bov Bjerg. Vier Jugendliche grunden in der Provinz eine Wohngemeinschaft. programme.title: All the ear / Ganz Ohr
programme.desc: Esther investigates what exactly a family is. Who belongs to it and how different families can look. For this she visits a Gogele family in Wiener Neustadt. Konstantin, Elmar, Ruben, Moses, Salomon and Caspar - the 6 boys of the family live here. What does everyday life look like in such a large family? How are children who have so many siblings? In addition, what did families look like? And: What if dad and mom separate? For this, Esther visits Svea, Arne and Tilo in Wildon in Styria. Her parents have been divorced for 2 years. Now the children have 2 at home: one with Papa, one with mom. / Esther geht der Frage nach, was genau eine Familie ist. Wer gehort dazu und wie unterschiedlich konnen Familien aussehen. Dafur besucht sie eine Familie Gogele in Wiener Neustadt. Hier leben Konstantin, Elmar, Ruben, Moses, Salomon und Caspar - die 6 Buben der Familie. Wie sieht der Alltag in so einer GroSSfamilie aus? Wie geht es Kindern, die so viele Geschwister haben? AuSSerdem: Wie haben Familien fruher ausgesehen? Und: Was, wenn Papa und Mama sich trennen? Dafur besucht Esther Svea, Arne und Tilo in Wildon in der Steiermark. Ihre Eltern sind seit 2 Jahren geschieden. Jetzt haben die Kinder 2 Zuhause: eines bei Papa, eines bei Mama.

programme.title: Glassboy / Glassboy
programme.desc: Coming-of Age adventure. An eleven years that suffers from a life -threatening hereditary disease is in isolation in the house of his family. When he gets to know the preserving of a bicycle clique, he wins friends and begins to get more freedom. The eleven-year Pino lives from the outside world in his room, in which he has everything he can wish, except friends. Because he has been diagnosed with hamophilia, his parents prohibited him from contact with others so as not to dangerous. Other children can therefore only observe Pino through its binoculars. He prefers to follow the gang from the old market square, which calls itself nerds. When there is a surprising encounter with her runner Mavi, everything is suddenly different for Pino. / MitreiSSendes Coming-of Age-Abenteuer. Ein Elfjahriger, der an einer lebensbedrohlichen Erbkrankheit leidet, befindet sich im Haus seiner Familie in Isolation. Als er die Anfuhrerin einer Fahrrad-Clique kennenlernt, gewinnt er Freunde und beginnt, sich mehr Freiheiten zu erkampfen.Der Elfjahrige Pino lebt von der AuSSenwelt abgeschottet in seinem Zimmer, in dem er alles hat, was er sich wunschen kann, auSSer Freunde. Weil bei ihm Hamophilie diagnostiziert worden ist, untersagen ihm seine Eltern jeglichen Kontakt mit anderen, um ihn nicht zu gefahrden. Andere Kinder kann Pino daher nur durch sein Fernglas beobachten. Am liebsten folgt er dabei der Bande vom alten Marktplatz, die sich selbst Nerds nennt. Als es zu einer uberraschenden Begegnung mit deren Anfuhrerin Mavi kommt, andert sich fur Pino schlagartig alles.

programme.title: Gaetano Donizetti - Maria Stuarda / Gaetano Donizetti - Maria Stuarda
programme.desc: Gaetano Donizetti's opera Maria Stuarda took away the audience into the dramatic world of two legendar konies, whose fates are inextricably linked: Maria Stuart, the Scottish Konigin, and Elisabeth I, the ruler of England. These two women, trapped in a bitter power struggle for the English throne, experience an unstoppable struggle between political responsibility and personal support. While both women are caught in this torn power structure, one of them must die. Maria is executed in 1587, and the struggle for the throne ends tragically. Donizetti succeeds with Maria Stuarda a masterpiece of the Belcanto tradition that gives the tragic argument of two iconic monarches with all their emotional intensity and dramatic depth. A fascinating work on power, betrayal and longing for freedom. / Gaetano Donizettis Oper Maria Stuarda entfuhrt das Publikum in die dramatische Welt zweier legendarer Koniginnen, deren Schicksale untrennbar miteinander verbunden sind: Maria Stuart, die schottische Konigin, und Elisabeth I., die Herrscherin von England. Diese beiden Frauen, gefangen in einem erbitterten Machtkampf um den englischen Thron, erleben ein unaufhaltsames Ringen zwischen politischer Verantwortung und personlicher Tragodie. Wahrend beide Frauen in dieser zerrissenen Machtstruktur gefangen sind, muss eine von ihnen sterben. 1587 wird Maria hingerichtet, und der Kampf um den Thron endet tragisch.Mit Maria Stuarda gelingt Donizetti ein Meisterwerk der Belcanto-Tradition, das die tragische Auseinandersetzung zweier ikonischer Monarchinnen mit all ihrer emotionalen Intensitat und dramatischen Tiefe lebendig werden lasst. Ein faszinierendes Werk uber Macht, Verrat und die Sehnsucht nach Freiheit.

programme.title: Fighting the Configns - Mary Stuart vs. Elizabeth I. / Kampf der Koniginnen - Mary Stuart vs. Elizabeth I.
programme.desc: England, February 1587: With three powerful beating, the executioner puts an end to the life of Mary Stuart - Konigin von Scotland and France: brought to the scaffold by her cousin Elizabeth I. Because of Hochgerrat and a murderer, Mary Stuart is considered a passionate woman and Catholic martyr for centuries. As a saint who had to pay for her love for the wrong man with life. Her cousin Elizabeth, Kingin of England, her greatest rival, but as jealous, vengeful virgin. But the truth is different: Mary Stuart used intrigue and developed murder plans to get the English throne for more than 30 years. It is a drama about "fake news" and "hate speech" in England in the 16th century. The documentary shows the bitter struggle of the two queens and uses an ingenious trick: Queen Elizabeth - Greatly more gambled by the brilliant castle actress Marie -Christine Friedrich - raises her intimate knowledge from all the phases of life of her competitor Mary Stuart. / England, Februar 1587: Mit drei kraftigen Schlagen setzt der Henker dem Leben der Mary Stuart - Konigin von Schottland und Frankreich - ein Ende: Aufs Schafott gebracht von ihrer Cousine Elizabeth I. wegen Hochverrats und eines Mordkomplotts, gilt Mary Stuart jahrhundertelang als leidenschaftliche Frau und katholische Martyrerin. Als Heilige, die fur ihre Liebe zum falschen Mann mit dem Leben bezahlen musste. Ihre Cousine Elizabeth, Konigin von England, ihre groSSte Rivalin, hingegen als eifersuchtige, rachsuchtige Jungfer. Doch die Wahrheit ist eine andere: Mehr als 30 Jahre lang nutzte Mary Stuart Intrigen und entwickelte Mordplane, um auf den englischen Thron zu gelangen. Es ist ein Drama um "Fake News" und "Hate Speech" im England des 16.Jahrhunderts. Die Doku zeigt den erbitterten Kampf der beiden Queens und bedient sich eines genialen Kunstgriffs: Queen Elizabeth - groSSartig verkorpert von der genialen Burgschauspielerin Marie-Christine Friedrich - erzahlt ihr intimes Wissen aus allen Lebensphasen ihrer Konkurrentin Mary Stuart.Regie: Andrea OsterProduktion: Metafilm, Ifage, ORF, ZDF arte, RTR

programme.title: Worldwide / WeltWeit
programme.sub-title: Trend oder Tradition. Radfahren auf 3 Kontinenten.
programme.desc: Many are happy to get on the bike again in the spring. But more and more Austrians are now on the road by bike in winter. Since there - especially in the east of the country - there is increasingly rare snow and ice days, the bicycle is becoming increasingly a all -year means of transport. In addition, the e-bike boom has revolutionized cycling. Quick, comfortable and sustainable - you can make good progress by bike, especially in big city. The "worldwide" reporters: Inside, turned to the bike and looked at the importance of the people in Sudamerica, Africa and China. Correspondent Isabella Purkart is on the Ciclovía in Colombia's capital Bogotá, which is an integral part of their week for many cyclists. Every Sunday as part of the Ciclovía, 120 kilometers of streets are closed to motorized traffic and freezes for cycling. The cycle path network is steadily expanded, because there is still a need for improvement in the poor, often mountainous districts of the city. Correspondent Patrick A. Hafner meets a bike -loving nation in Rwanda in which cycling professionals such as Gotter are worshiped. What's football in Latin America is cycling here in East Africa. The 18-year Deny's Irakoze sums it up: "A contract with a successful team is a great chance of escaping financial hardship." She trains hard for this. In September, the world of street bikes will take place in Rwanda, which is currently politically controversial. For the first time, a World Cup is held in an African country. Those who think of cycling inevitably think of China. In the 1980s, the Middle Kingdom had the nickname "kingdom of the bicycle". Today, only a few people have their own bike, knows correspondent Josef Dollinger. For this, tens of millions of Chinese are traveling with rental tractors every day. They represent cheap and simple transport. In the slipstream of the rental drivers, cycling in China also develops into the city of Life-Style. Chinese bike manufacturers now offer bicycles at a price that average earners can hardly afford. / Viele freuen sich, jetzt im Fruhling wieder aufs Fahrrad zu steigen. Aber immer mehr Österreicherinnen und Österreicher sind inzwischen auch im Winter mit dem Radl unterwegs. Da es - vor allem im Osten des Landes - immer seltener Schnee- und Eistage gibt, wird das Fahrrad zusehends zum Ganzjahres-Verkehrsmittel. Dazu kommt, dass der E-Bike-Boom das Radfahren revolutioniert hat. Schnell, bequem und nachhaltig - mit dem Rad kommt man vor allem in groSSen Stadten gut voran. Die "WeltWeit"-Reporter:innen haben sich selbst auf den Drahtesel geschwungen und sich angeschaut, welchen Stellenwert Radfahren fur die Menschen in Sudamerika, Afrika und China hat.Korrespondentin Isabella Purkart ist in Kolumbiens Hauptstadt Bogotá auf der Ciclovía unterwegs, die fur viele Radlerinnen und Radler ein fester Bestandteil ihrer Woche ist. Jeden Sonntag werden im Rahmen der Ciclovía 120 Kilometer StraSSen fur den motorisierten Verkehr gesperrt und furs Radeln freigegeben. Das Radwegenetz wird stetig ausgebaut, denn besonders in den armeren, oft bergigen Bezirken der Stadt besteht noch Verbesserungsbedarf.Korrespondent Patrick A. Hafner trifft in Ruanda auf eine radbegeisterte Nation, in der Radprofis wie Gotter verehrt werden. Was in Lateinamerika der FuSSball, ist hier in Ostafrika der Radsport. Die 18-jahrige Denyse Irakoze bringt es auf den Punkt: "Ein Vertrag bei einem erfolgreichen Team ist eine groSSe Chance, der finanziellen Not zu entkommen." Dafur trainiert sie hart. Im September wird in Ruanda die StraSSenrad-Weltmeisterschaft stattfinden, was derzeit politisch umstritten ist. Zum ersten Mal wird damit eine Rad-WM in einem afrikanischen Land ausgetragen.Wer an Radfahren denkt, denkt unweigerlich an China. In den 1980ern hatte das Reich der Mitte den Spitznamen "Konigreich der Fahrrader". Heute besitzen nur wenige Menschen ein eigenes Fahrrad, weiSS Korrespondent Josef Dollinger. Dafur sind zig Millionen Chinesinnen und Chinesen taglich mit Leihfahrradern unterwegs. Sie stellen eine billige und einfache Transportmoglichkeit dar. Da wird auch achselzuckend in Kauf genommen, dass diese Rader viele Daten uber die Benutzer sammeln. Im Windschatten der Leihfahrrader entwickelt sich Radfahren in China aber auch zum stadtischen Life-style. Chinesische Rad-Manufakturen bieten mittlerweile Fahrrader zu einem Preis an, den sich Durchschnittsverdiener kaum leisten konnen.

programme.desc: Loneliness is not fate! In the 3rd episode, lonely hearts with Nina Horowitz find new love gluc: bookstorus Helga might be really loved and loved again, David from Karnten is looking for a relationship at eye level and the young Alina from Styria Dreamt from a loving, quiet and well -groomed partner. For Albert from Vienna, the new woman should have a heart, such as a mine, animal trainer Manuela from the Weinviertel. / Einsamkeit ist kein Schicksal! In der 3. Folge finden einsame Herzen mit Nina Horowitz neues Liebesgluck: Buchhandlerin Helga mochte wieder richtig lieben und geliebt werden, David aus Karnten sucht eine Beziehung auf Augenhohe und die junge Alina aus der Steiermark traumt von einem liebevollen, ruhigen und gepflegten Partner. Fur Albert aus Wien sollte die neue Frau ein Herz haben, wie ein Bergwerk, Tiertrainerin Manuela aus dem Weinviertel halt Ausschau nach einem besonders tierliebenden Mann und Romantiker Gregor aus Niederosterreich wird mit der Richtigen eine vertrauensvolle Beziehung aufbauen.

programme.title: Experience Austria / Erlebnis Österreich
programme.sub-title: Die Freiheit zu gehen - Weitwandern in Niederosterreich
programme.desc: "Only where you were on foot were you really," said Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, and the Greek doctor Hippocrates said: "Going is the best medicine". A "Experience Austria" from the ORF state studio in Niederosterreich (a repetition from November 2024) is devoted - in this sense - to walk, hike, the long hiking in Niederosterreich (design: Barbara Baldauf, camera: Andreas Kotzmann). The largest federal state of Austria is a country of diversity - every region offers something special, and there is something for every taste for hiking enthusiasts. In the Mostviertel this is the Romerweg and Via Aqua. Two hiking trails that show the beauties of the district in the Sudwesten in Lower Easter - on old routes that have already used the Romer and along the river that arise from the Ötscher area. In the Waldviertel, the life path is not a walk, rather an expedition that runs through the forest with its huge granite blocks, through the Ysperklamm and also to an observatory, the astronomical center Martinsberg, where impressive star observations are made. As on all long-distance hiking trails, there are also interesting overnight stays and refreshments on the life path, such as in the Krenn inn in Stangles. In the Wachau, the World Heritage Weirs to explore the nature of the world -famous river on foot and racing at one of the traditional Heurigenbetriebe. The paths on the highest mountain of Niederosterreich, Schneeberg, are suitable. The film accompanies a hiking group at the "Alpine Sunrise", in which the Schneebergbahn ride on the mountain at night to make the sunrise tangible in over 2000 meters high. The Rax massif, on the other hand, offers something for Geubte and for cozy hikers and it offers a fascinating variety of plants in midsummer. In the event of a herbly hikes, the participants learn a lot about the vegetation on the mountain and that, if you get involved, "the mountain has answered answers, on questions that you have not asked." The Jakobsweg, the pilgrimage path, also runs through Lower Easter - the part in the Weinviertel runs from the Czech border of Sudwestwarts through Poysdorf and Falkirchen, past Jakobskirchen, by Vineyards and Kellergassen and also to a wine labyrinth. "And at the end of the path there are the answers," said the Chinese philosopher Lao-Tse a long time ago. / "Nur wo du zu FuSS warst, bist du wirklich gewesen", sagte Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, und der griechische Arzt Hippokrates meinte: "Gehen ist die beste Medizin". Ein "Erlebnis Österreich" aus dem ORF Landesstudio Niederosterreich (eine Wiederholung von November 2024) widmet sich - in diesem Sinne - dem Gehen, dem Wandern, dem Weitwandern in Niederosterreich (Gestaltung: Barbara Baldauf, Kamera: Andreas Kotzmann). Das groSSte Bundesland Österreichs ist ein Land der Vielfalt - jede Region bietet etwas Spezielles, und fur Wanderbegeisterte ist fur jeden Geschmack etwas dabei.Sechs Weitwanderwege und die Besonderheiten, die an den Strecken gesehen und erlebt werden konnen, werden im Film vorgestellt. Im Mostviertel sind das der Romerweg und die Via Aqua. Zwei Wanderwege, die die Schonheiten des Viertels im Sudwesten Niederosterreichs zeigen - auf alten Trassen, die bereits die Romer benutzt haben und entlang der Flusse, die dem Ötschergebiet entspringen. Im Waldviertel ist der Lebensweg kein Spaziergang, eher eine Expedition, die durch die Walder mit ihren riesigen Granitsteinblocken fuhrt, durch die Ysperklamm und auch an eine Sternwarte, das astronomische Zentrum Martinsberg, wo beeindruckende Sternenbeobachtungen gemacht werden. Wie an allen Weitwanderwegen gibt es auch am Lebensweg interessante Übernachtungs- und Einkehrmoglichkeiten, wie zum Beispiel in der Wirtshausbrennerei Krenn in Stangles. In der Wachau ladt der Welterbesteig dazu ein, die Natur des weltberuhmten Flusstals zu FuSS zu erkunden und Rast bei einem der traditionellen Heurigenbetriebe zu machen.Fur fortgeschrittene Wanderer sind die Wege am hochsten Berg Niederosterreichs, dem Schneeberg, geeignet. Der Film begleitet eine Wandergruppe beim "Alpine Sunrise", bei dem die Schneebergbahn bereits in der Nacht auf den Berg fahrt, um den Sonnenaufgang in uber 2000 Metern Hohe erlebbar zu machen. Das Raxmassiv wiederum bietet sowohl fur geubte als auch fur gemutliche Wanderer etwas und es bietet im Hochsommer eine faszinierende Pflanzenvielfalt. Bei gefuhrten Krauterwanderungen lernen die Teilnehmer vieles uber die Vegetation am Berg und dass, wenn man sich darauf einlasst, "der Berg Antworten gibt, auf Fragen, die man gar nicht gestellt hat."Auch der Jakobsweg, der beruhmte Pilgerweg, fuhrt durch Niederosterreich - der Teil im Weinviertel verlauft von der tschechischen Grenze sudwestwarts durch Poysdorf und Falkenstein, vorbei an Jakobskirchen, durch Weinberge und Kellergassen und auch zu einem Weinlabyrinth. "Und am Ende des Weges stehen die Antworten" sagte der chinesische Philosoph Lao-Tse schon vor langer Zeit.

programme.title: Prism special / Prisma Spezial
programme.sub-title: Die Jugend und der Papst - Das Jubilaum der Jugend in Rom
programme.desc: This week there is a remarkable spectacle in Rome: a million young people from all over the world. The reason: the holy year that the Catholic Church celebrates. Why don't young people prefer to go to a pop concert today? And how does the new Pope Leo get to you? / Diese Woche findet in Rom ein bemerkenswertes Spektakel statt: Eine Million Jugendliche stromen aus aller Welt zusammen. Der Grund: das heilige Jahr, das die katholische Kirche feiert. Wieso fahren junge Leute von heute nicht lieber zu einem Popkonzert? Und wie kommt der neue Papst Leo bei ihnen an?

programme.title: Currently after five / Aktuell nach funf

programme.desc: In "Consciously healthy - the magazine" we give suggestions and guidance to become healthy and stay healthy. Important insights around provision, re -discovering old knowledge about what body and soul do well up to new knowledge from the world of medicine, are the cornerstones of the magazine. programme.title: Slow food - culinary heritage as a treasure of the future / Slow food - Kulinarisches Erbe als Schatz der Zukunft
programme.desc: The global movement Slow Food is committed to a regional, seasonal and sustainable eating culture. This philosophy is lived in Karnten by diverse slow food efforts. The appreciation of natural foods from regional craftsmanship production leads to new because of sustainability and conscious enjoyment. As an ambassador for Slow Food Karnten, the Easter -Reician actor with a carnival roots fetches the diverse projects of the culinary initiative in front of the curtain in this production. There, the main topics of the village community, direct marketing and delicatesses, old pet breeds, alternative creating cultivation, viticulture, agriculture in catering and slow food were highlighted in schools. / Die weltweite Bewegung Slow Food setzt sich fur eine regionale, saisonale und nachhaltige Esskultur ein. Diese Philosophie wird in Karnten durch vielfaltige Slow Food Bestrebungen beispielgebend gelebt. Die Wertschatzung naturbelassener Lebensmittel aus regionaler handwerklicher Produktion fuhrt zu neuen Wegen der Nachhaltigkeit und des bewussten Genusses. Der osterreichische Schauspieler mit Karntner Wurzeln Harald Krassnitzer holt als Botschafter fur Slow Food Karnten in dieser Produktion die vielfaltigen Projekte der kulinarischen Initiative vor den Vorhang.Barbara Altersberger fuhrte als Gestalterin mit dem Kamerateam Harald Krassnitzer in das Slow Food Village Berg im Drautal und in die Slow Food Travelling Region "Marktplatz Mittelkarnten". Dort wurden die Schwerpunktthemen Dorfgemeinschaft, Direktvermarktung und Delikatessengeschaft, alte Haustierrassen, alternativer Gemuseanbau, Weinbau, Landwirtschaft in der Gastronomie sowie Slow Food Konzepte in den Schulen hervorgehoben.

programme.title: 9 Breaks - 9 Schatze: So is Austria / 9 Platze - 9 Schatze: So schon ist Österreich
programme.desc: After ten years of "9 Square 9 Schatze" on the national holiday, Bernd Radler presents the barnest places - which were previously sent from Karnten to the competition in the big federal lander show. There are three in the preliminary round each year. The focus is on lakes, mountains, old walls and power places of nature. One focus of the program is at the only winner in Karnten - the Landskron and its animals Castle. The victory has ensured sustainable developments in tourism and animal care there. We visit the winning team from back then. Accordingly, the program was mainly moderated in the Villach area, but also on Lake Worther. According to the motto - that's how Carnies is! / Nach zehn Jahren "9 Platze 9 Schatze" am Nationalfeiertag prasentiert Bernd Radler die schonsten Orte - die bisher aus Karnten in den Wettkampf in der groSSen Bundeslandershow geschickt wurden. Pro Jahr sind es drei in der Vorrunde. Im Fokus stehen Seen, Berge, alte Mauern und Kraftplatze der Natur. Ein Schwerpunkt der Sendung liegt am bisher einzigen Siegerort in Karnten - der Burg Landskron und ihren Tieren. Der Sieg hat dort fur nachhaltige Entwicklungen in Tourismus und Tierpflege gesorgt. Wir besuchen das Siegerteam von damals. Dementsprechend wurde die Sendung vorwiegend im GroSSraum Villach moderiert, aber auch am Worthersee. Ganz nach dem Motto - so schon ist Karnten!

programme.title: The enchantment / Die Verzauberung

In the landing of the University Tor Vergata in the Suden of Rom.orf 2, the celebrations for the "Jubilae der Jugend" translate live from 9:10 a.m. Sandra Szabo (ORF Religion and Ethics) and the Abbot of the Benedictine Abbey Kremsmunster, Bernhard Eckerstorfer, who took part in the meeting in Rome in the days before, and Sandra Szabo and Abbot Bernhard Eckerforferaudiodescription: Johannes Karner and Michaela Starosciak / Die Teilnehmenden am Jugendtreffen feiern mit Papst Leo XIV.Hunderttausende Jugendliche kommen im "Heiligen Jahr 2025" der katholischen Kirche nach Rom zum "Jubilaum der Jugend". programme.title: What does Austria believe - did God have had its day? / Was glaubt Österreich - Hat Gott ausgedient?
programme.desc: What pays in life, what wears in crises, what moves head and heart! The ORF asked! An Easter range of repressant study of the University Vienna with the support of the Future Fund of the Republic of Austria provides information about how people in Austria find sense, how they make ethical decisions and how their worldview influences their political thinking. In the documentary "did God have had its day?" the results are praised for the first time. Andrea Eder embarks on an exciting journey with celebrities and shows what people in Austria believe, what they cohesion and how faith and religion have changed in the face of the many challenges. / Was im Leben zahlt, was in Krisen tragt, was Kopf und Herz bewegt! Der ORF hat nachgefragt! Eine osterreichweite reprasentative Studie der Universitat Wien mit Unterstutzung des Zukunftsfonds der Republik Österreich gibt Auskunft daruber, worin Menschen in Österreich Sinn finden, wie sie ethische Entscheidungen treffen und wie ihre Weltanschauung ihr politisches Denken beeinflusst. In der Doku "Hat Gott ausgedient?" werden erstmals die Ergebnisse prasentiert. Andrea Eder begibt sich dafur mit Prominenten auf eine spannende Reise und zeigt auf, was Menschen in Österreich glauben, was sie zusammenhalt und wie sich Glaube und Religion angesichts der vielen Herausforderungen verandert haben.

programme.title: Remark times! - Johann-Philipps Castle visits / Herrschaftszeiten! - Johann-Philipps Schlossbesuche
programme.sub-title: Bei Fam. Salm-Reifferscheidt auf Schloss Steyregg
programme.desc: Johann-Philipp Spiegelfeld visits another historical castle in Oberosterreich. This time it goes to Steygg, where high over the Muhlviertel small town since the 11th or 12th centuries - that does not be found at all - the honest Gemauer enthroned. With today's owner, Niklas Salm-Reifferscheidt and his family, Johann-Philipp spends two highly interesting days full of history and stories about the castle, its residents and so many secrets. Anyone who likes to know more about Franz Schubert's "Ave Maria" or the high-ranking ancestors such as a Japanese foreign minister, the approximately 8,500 war bombs and their today's traces in the forest, the imposing cemetery or the Naturfriedhof Pfenningberg, is best again in this issue of the "Hume period" to the curious visitor Johann-Philipp Spiegelfeld. / Johann-Philipp Spiegelfeld besucht ein weiteres geschichtstrachtiges Schloss in Oberosterreich. Diesmal geht es nach Steyregg, wo hoch uber der Muhlviertler Kleinstadt seit dem 11. oder 12. Jahrhundert - genau lasst sich das gar nicht feststellen - die ehrwurdigen Gemauer thronen. Mit dem heutigen Besitzer, Niklas Salm-Reifferscheidt und seiner Familie verbringt Johann-Philipp zwei hochinteressante Tage voll Geschichte und Geschichten rund um das Schloss, seine Bewohnerinnen und Bewohner und so manche Geheimnisse. Wer mehr uber Franz Schuberts "Ave Maria" oder die hochrangigen Vorfahren wie zum Beispiel auch ein japanischer AuSSenminister, die rund 8500 abgeworfenen Kriegsbomben und ihre heutigen Spuren im Wald, den imposante Rittersaal oder den Naturfriedhof Pfenningberg wissen mochte, der schlieSSt sich am besten gleich wieder in dieser Ausgabe der "Herrschaftszeiten" dem neugierigen Besucher Johann-Philipp Spiegelfeld an.

programme.title: Served on Sunday / Aufgetischt am Sonntag
programme.desc: Framed by Rax and Schneeberg, Kampalpe and Sonnwendstein, Semmering is more than one place, it is a "landscape". Once obstacle on the way to the Suden, later with the move of the railway, a gateway to an unspeaked wilderness, through which artists, scholars, noble and burgers found new inspiration in the fresh air. In this film, the landscape is not just a backdrop, but itself the main actress, full of stories of prominent summer freshmen from once and now. / Gerahmt von Rax und Schneeberg, Kampalpe und Sonnwendstein ist der Semmering mehr als ein Ort, er ist eine "Landschaft". Einst Hindernis auf dem Weg in den Suden, spater mit dem Einzug der Eisenbahn ein Tor zu ungezahmter Wildnis, durch das Kunstler, Gelehrte, Adelige und Burger an der frischen Luft neue Inspiration gefunden haben. Die Landschaft ist in diesem Film nicht nur Kulisse, sondern selbst Hauptdarstellerin, voller Geschichten prominenter Sommerfrischler von einst und heute.

programme.title: Dream Weekend in Prague with Sasa Schwarzjirg / Traumweekend in Prag mit Sasa Schwarzjirg
programme.desc: Prague, the capital of the Czech Republic, attracts millions of tourists annually. Sasa Schwarzjirg goes on historical and cultural traces of the city. Prague as a university city attracts a lot of young audiences, the Karlsbrucke with the numerous figures, the Prague castle and the apostle watch are the most popular photo motifs in the city. Prague is also a city of pleasure. There are 30 breweries here, some of which are hearty, and the tree cake is ideal as a dessert. The story of why the Czech Suuss dish does not actually come from the Czech Republic learns Sasa on her stroll through her, which also runs over the many flea markets and stands along the Vltava. / Prag, die Hauptstadt von Tschechien, lockt jahrlich Millionen von Touristen an. Sasa Schwarzjirg begibt sich auf historische und kulturelle Spuren der Stadt. Prag als Universitatsstadt zieht viel junges Publikum an, die Karlsbrucke mit den zahlreichen Figuren, die Prager Burg und die Aposteluhr sind die beliebtesten Fotomotive der Stadt. Prag ist aber auch eine Genussstadt. Allein 30 Brauereien gibt es hier, dazu teils deftiges Essen, und als Nachspeise bietet sich der Baumkuchen an. Die Geschichte, warum die tschechische SuSSspeise eigentlich gar nicht aus Tschechien kommt, erfahrt Sasa bei ihrem Stadtbummel, der sie auch uber die vielen Flohmarkte und Stande entlang der Moldau fuhrt.

programme.title: Experience Austria / Erlebnis Österreich
programme.desc: In 2025 the composer and musician Kurt Schwertsik turned 90 years old. In the documentary "Wiener Steichn der Kurt Schwertsik", he remembers events from a long life in numerous original scenes. The film is raised by humorous and dramatic events that appear again and again and reports on the life of a profound, humorous and thoughtful artist who has never lost faith and hope of human being in humanity. In life like in this film, wife Christa will accompany Julia, Katharina and Regina Stemberger Kurt Schwertsik with her dachts. A film by Herbert Eisenschenk for the Vienna State Studio / 2025 wird der Komponist und Musiker Kurt Schwertsik 90 Jahre. In der Dokumentation "Wiener Geschichtn des Kurt Schwertsik" erinnert er sich an zahlreichen Originalschauplatzen an Ereignisse aus einem langen Leben. Der Film erzahlt von humorvollen und dramatischen, immer wieder absurd anmutenden Ereignissen und berichtet vom Leben eines tiefsinnig-humorvollen und nachdenklichen Kunstlers, der Glaube und Hoffnung an das Menschliche im Menschsein nie verloren hat. Im Leben wie in diesem Film wird Ehefrau Christa mit ihren Tochtern Julia, Katharina und Regina Stemberger Kurt Schwertsik begleiten. Ein Film von Herbert Eisenschenk fur das Landesstudio Wien

programme.title: Currently after five / Aktuell nach funf
Back to nature / Zuruck zur Natur
programme.desc: The native nature gives us food in abundance - in the mountains as well as in the valley. Everything wakes up and thrives. We visit the organic farmers Scott and Ulli Klein in Styria. The couple cultivates old tomatoes with specialist knowledge and passion. In the Kleinwalsertal, Haubenkoch Jeremias Riezler ensures that the old cows also get tasty on the plate. In the Innviertel, Wolfgang Mayr cultivates almost 60 different types of garlic. Experience and storage require experience. And Maggie Duckfellner today stops by Hannes Royer at the foot of the Dachstein. The mountain farmer also launched the association "Land creates life" some time ago. / Die heimische Natur schenkt uns Nahrung im Überfluss - in den Bergen wie in den Talern. Alles wachst und gedeiht. Wir besuchen die Biobauern Scott und Ulli Klein in der Steiermark. Das Paar kultiviert mit Fachwissen und Leidenschaft alte Tomatensorten. Im Kleinwalsertal sorgt Haubenkoch Jeremias Riezler dafur, dass auch die alten Kuhe schmackhaft auf den Teller kommen. Im Innviertel kultiviert Wolfgang Mayr knapp 60 verschiedene Knoblauchsorten. Anbau wie Lagerung erfordern Erfahrung. Und Maggie Entenfellner schaut heute bei Hannes Royer am FuSSe des Dachsteins vorbei. Der Bergbauer hat vor einiger Zeit auch den Verein "Land schafft Leben" ins Leben gerufen.

programme.title: Austria picture from the State Studio Karnten / Österreich-Bild aus dem Landesstudio Karnten
programme.sub-title: Vom Norischen Eisen zur Area Sud
programme.desc: The topic is the development of the economy in the most sudious federal state of Austria from the beginning of mining in the Rome period over the basis of the first trades and industrial companies up to the 21st century, which has primarily brought a rapid expansion of the technology business - keyword infineon. Jahrhundert, das vor allem einen rasanten Ausbau der Technologiebetriebe - Stichwort Infineon - gebracht hat. Mit der Eroffnung der Koralmbahn wachst Karnten mit der Steiermark zum zweitgroSSten Wirtschaftsraum in Österreich zusammen. Wie Karnten das fur sich nutzen kann, welche Vor-und Nachteile das fur die Unternehmen und fur die Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter bringt, soll diese Dokumentation aufzeigen.

programme.title: Long country / Weites Land
programme.desc: In this episode of the "Weites Land" series, director Jennifer Rezny in Austria's eastern and youngest state: The Burgenland goes on her feature -sonist land survey: Burgenland. Again, it is important to knock stereotypes on their truth content, to refute or confirm clichés. Do people find funny in Burgenland Burgenlandenwitzen? The residents and hospitable are warm. But they are also assumed to be overrun curiosity and gossip addiction. Life knew how to celebrate and celebrate how they fall. Of course, exploring Burgenland does not work without wine and the Neusiedlersee, but the focus is on people. As a "sausage SMMEL commissioner" around Schnuffler "Rex", Martin Weinek became a crowd favorite. The actor is something like a Uhudler philosopher and together with his wife side acquisition winemaker in the Sudburgenland. In the Easter music scene, Ferry Janoska is a composer and arranger. He belongs to the Roma ethnic group and has their say as well as his daughter, author and moderator Katharina Graf-Janoska. In addition, director Rezny visits the emeritus bishop of Eisenstadt, Paul Iby, as well as a widely traveled Kapitan large cruise ship, for whom Burgenland is the center of the world. / Auf ihrer feuilletonistischen Landvermessung begibt sich Regisseurin Jennifer Rezny in dieser Folge der Reihe "Weites Land" in Österreichs ostlichstes und jungstes Bundesland: Das Burgenland. Wieder gilt es, Stereotype auf ihren Wahrheitsgehalt abzuklopfen, Klischees zu widerlegen oder zu bestatigen.Finden die Menschen im Burgenland Burgenlanderwitze lustig? Herzlich seien die Einwohner und gastfreundlich. Aber auch ubertriebene Neugier und Klatschsucht wird ihnen unterstellt. Das Leben wussten sie zu feiern und Feste, wie sie fallen. Naturlich geht eine Erkundung des Burgenlands nicht ohne Wein und den Neusiedlersee ab, im Mittelpunkt aber stehen die Menschen. Als "Wurstsemmel-Kommissar" rund um Schnuffler "Rex" wurde Martin Weinek zum Publikumsliebling. Der Schauspieler ist so etwas wie ein Uhudler-Philosoph und gemeinsam mit seiner Frau Nebenerwerbs-Winzer im Sudburgenland. In der osterreichischen Musikszene ist Ferry Janoska als Komponist und Arrangeur tonangebend. Er gehort der Volksgruppe der Roma an und kommt ebenso zu Wort wie seine Tochter, Autorin und Moderatorin Katharina Graf-Janoska. AuSSerdem besucht Regisseurin Rezny den emeritierten Bischof von Eisenstadt, Paul Iby, sowie einen weitgereisten Kapitan groSSer Kreuzfahrtschiffe, fur den das Burgenland den Mittelpunkt der Welt ist.

programme.title: Gaetano Donizetti - Maria Stuarda / Gaetano Donizetti - Maria Stuarda
programme.desc: Gaetano Donizetti's opera Maria Stuarda took away the audience into the dramatic world of two legendar konies, whose fates are inextricably linked: Maria Stuart, the Scottish Konigin, and Elisabeth I, the ruler of England. These two women, trapped in a bitter power struggle for the English throne, experience an unstoppable struggle between political responsibility and personal support. While both women are caught in this torn power structure, one of them must die. Maria is executed in 1587, and the struggle for the throne ends tragically. Donizetti succeeds with Maria Stuarda a masterpiece of the Belcanto tradition that gives the tragic argument of two iconic monarches with all their emotional intensity and dramatic depth. A fascinating work on power, betrayal and longing for freedom. / Gaetano Donizettis Oper Maria Stuarda entfuhrt das Publikum in die dramatische Welt zweier legendarer Koniginnen, deren Schicksale untrennbar miteinander verbunden sind: Maria Stuart, die schottische Konigin, und Elisabeth I., die Herrscherin von England. Diese beiden Frauen, gefangen in einem erbitterten Machtkampf um den englischen Thron, erleben ein unaufhaltsames Ringen zwischen politischer Verantwortung und personlicher Tragodie. Wahrend beide Frauen in dieser zerrissenen Machtstruktur gefangen sind, muss eine von ihnen sterben. 1587 wird Maria hingerichtet, und der Kampf um den Thron endet tragisch.Mit Maria Stuarda gelingt Donizetti ein Meisterwerk der Belcanto-Tradition, das die tragische Auseinandersetzung zweier ikonischer Monarchinnen mit all ihrer emotionalen Intensitat und dramatischen Tiefe lebendig werden lasst. Ein faszinierendes Werk uber Macht, Verrat und die Sehnsucht nach Freiheit.

programme.title: Fighting the Configns - Mary Stuart vs. Elizabeth I. / Kampf der Koniginnen - Mary Stuart vs. Elizabeth I.
programme.desc: England, February 1587: With three powerful beating, the executioner puts an end to the life of Mary Stuart - Konigin von Scotland and France: brought to the scaffold by her cousin Elizabeth I. Because of Hochgerrat and a murderer, Mary Stuart is considered a passionate woman and Catholic martyr for centuries. As a saint who had to pay for her love for the wrong man with life. Her cousin Elizabeth, Kingin of England, her greatest rival, but as jealous, vengeful virgin. But the truth is different: Mary Stuart used intrigue and developed murder plans to get the English throne for more than 30 years. It is a drama about "fake news" and "hate speech" in England in the 16th century. The documentary shows the bitter struggle of the two queens and uses an ingenious trick: Queen Elizabeth - Greatly more gambled by the brilliant castle actress Marie -Christine Friedrich - raises her intimate knowledge from all the phases of life of her competitor Mary Stuart. / England, Februar 1587: Mit drei kraftigen Schlagen setzt der Henker dem Leben der Mary Stuart - Konigin von Schottland und Frankreich - ein Ende: Aufs Schafott gebracht von ihrer Cousine Elizabeth I. wegen Hochverrats und eines Mordkomplotts, gilt Mary Stuart jahrhundertelang als leidenschaftliche Frau und katholische Martyrerin. Als Heilige, die fur ihre Liebe zum falschen Mann mit dem Leben bezahlen musste. Ihre Cousine Elizabeth, Konigin von England, ihre groSSte Rivalin, hingegen als eifersuchtige, rachsuchtige Jungfer. Doch die Wahrheit ist eine andere: Mehr als 30 Jahre lang nutzte Mary Stuart Intrigen und entwickelte Mordplane, um auf den englischen Thron zu gelangen. Es ist ein Drama um "Fake News" und "Hate Speech" im England des 16.Jahrhunderts. Die Doku zeigt den erbitterten Kampf der beiden Queens und bedient sich eines genialen Kunstgriffs: Queen Elizabeth - groSSartig verkorpert von der genialen Burgschauspielerin Marie-Christine Friedrich - erzahlt ihr intimes Wissen aus allen Lebensphasen ihrer Konkurrentin Mary Stuart.Regie: Andrea OsterProduktion: Metafilm, Ifage, ORF, ZDF arte, RTR

programme.title: The boss / Die Chefin
programme.desc: Paparazzo Carlo Ramsauer experiences powerlessly from the roof of a house, how the model Mira Lehmann is attacked in the apartment towards the apartment. But soon it turns out that Bernhardt does dubious business with Meyerling clients. / Machtlos erlebt Paparazzo Carlo Ramsauer vom Dach eines Hauses mit, wie im Apartment gegenuber das Model Mira Lehmann todlich attackiert wird. programme.title: Die Rosenheim-Cops / Die Rosenheim-Cops
programme.desc: Christian Lind and Hofer representative Florian Prantl are called to an abandoned car that was parked on the edge of the forest. programme.title: Die Rosenheim-Cops / Die Rosenheim-Cops
programme.desc: Ulrich Niedecker reports to the police that his neighbor Walter Dobler is dead in his house - and in fact the Rosenheim -Cops discover the apparently murdered landlord at the site. Alsbald ist klar, warum Ulrich Niedecker uber Doblers Ableben Bescheid wusste: Seit geraumer Zeit spionierte Niedecker seinen Nachbarn mittels Fernrohres aus. programme.desc: Austria's landscapes are equal and inspiration for many people who combine exactly that - art and nature. programme.title: The enchantment / Die Verzauberung

Aber: Die Idylle trugt.

programme.title: Rosamunde Pilcher / Rosamunde Pilcher
programme.desc: Stirring romance in the cozy place in England, a picturesque custody town in Cornwall! Gartner Laura makes every mud planting shine, only her love for Bob wakes up and does not thrive properly. The widely traveled journalist conjured up her from the spot butterflies in the stomach. Laura loves life in the country. On behalf of the municipality, she grief for the welcome in the village. There Laura knows every corner and is so popular that she is even chosen as a master mayor. After a heart attack by her father Francis, she should take over the responsible office against his will. Only in terms of love Laura is still waiting for the right one. When she meets London journalist Bob, it crackles immediately. But the relationship is like a roller coaster ride. Freuden fuss loose off small disasters, and suddenly Laura's whole life is head. / MitreiSSende Romanze am lauschigsten Platz Englands, einem malerischen Kustenort in Cornwall!Gartnerin Laura bringt jedes mude Pflanzchen zum Erstrahlen, nur ihre Liebe zu Bob wachst und gedeiht nicht richtig. Dabei hat der weitgereiste Journalist ihr vom Fleck weg Schmetterlinge in den Bauch gezaubert.Laura liebt das Leben am Land. Im Auftrag der Gemeinde kummert sie sich um die Begrunung im Ort. Dort kennt Laura jeden Winkel und ist so beliebt, dass sie sogar zur Burgermeisterin gewahlt wird. Nach einem Herzanfall ihres Vaters Francis soll sie gegen seinen Willen das verantwortungsvolle Amt ubernehmen. Nur in puncto Liebe wartet Laura noch auf den Richtigen. Als sie den Londoner Journalisten Bob kennenlernt, knistert es sofort. Doch die Beziehung gleicht einer Achterbahnfahrt. Freudengefuhle losen kleine Katastrophen ab, und plotzlich steht Lauras ganzes Leben Kopf.
