programme.title: I can too e3 (e) / Μπορώ κι Εγώ Ε3 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Germany, Mika. Keeping the forest alive. This year's common issue of EBU's co -production concerns children aged 8 to 12, who have set a goal in their lives during the film and are trying to fulfill it. / Επεισόδιο: Γερμανία, Μίκα. Διατηρώντας το δάσος ζωντανό. Το φετινό κοινό θέμα της συμπαραγωγής της ΕBU αφορά σε παιδιά ηλικίας 8 έως 12 ετών, που την περίοδο της κινηματογράφησης έχουν βάλει κάποιο στόχο στη ζωή τους και προσπαθούν να τον εκπληρώσουν.

programme.title: World Athletics Championship 2025 / Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα Υγρού Στίβου 2025
programme.desc: Swimming - 7th day. Afternoon. Watch the big track celebration: The World Championships, held in Singapore from July 11 to August 3, 2025. The best athletes and athletes in the world are fighting for medals. / Κολύμβηση - 7η μέρα. Απόγευμα. Παρακολουθήστε τη μεγάλη γιορτή του υγρού στίβου: το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα, που διεξάγεται στη Σιγκαπούρη από τις 11 Ιουλίου έως τις 3 Αυγούστου 2025. Οι καλύτεροι αθλητές και αθλήτριες του κόσμου δίνουν τη μάχη των μεταλλίων.

programme.title: Novasports Exclusive (E) / Novasports Αποκλειστικό (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Fanis Christodoulou, Part 2. Documentary series with the stamp of Novasports journalists! The episode is dedicated to Fani Christodoulou. The life of Greek basketball in a unique narrative by himself and the people who lived. / Επεισόδιο: Φάνης Χριστοδούλου, 2ο Μέρος. Σειρά ντοκιμαντέρ με τη σφραγίδα των δημοσιογράφων του Novasports! Το επεισόδιο είναι αφιερωμένο στον Φάνη Χριστοδούλου. Η ζωή του μπέμπη του ελληνικού μπάσκετ σε μια μοναδική αφήγηση από τον ίδιο και τους ανθρώπους που τον έζησαν.

programme.title: And yet I'm still here E37 (e) / Κι Όμως Είμαι Ακόμα Εδώ Ε37 (Ε)
programme.desc: Katerina and Alexander end up at the house in Varkiza, but Katerina does not want any reference to the future and no commitment. Natasha shocked by the revelation that she is a sister with Katerina shesitate to talk to her. / Η Κατερίνα και ο Αλέξανδρος καταλήγουν στο σπίτι στην Βάρκιζα, αλλά η Κατερίνα δε θέλει καμία αναφορά στο μέλλον και καμία δέσμευση. Η Νατάσα σοκαρισμένη απ την αποκάλυψη πως είναι αδερφή με την Κατερίνα διστάζει να της μιλήσει.

programme.title: And yet I'm still here E38 (e) / Κι Όμως Είμαι Ακόμα Εδώ Ε38 (Ε)
programme.desc: Katerina cannot believe that Natasha is her sister. So does Natasha. However, they both make an effort to get to know each other and slowly begin to get to know each other. / Η Κατερίνα δεν μπορεί να πιστέψει ότι η Νατάσα είναι αδερφή της. Το ίδιο και η Νατάσα. Παρόλα αυτά κάνουν και οι δύο μια προσπάθεια να γνωριστούν και σιγά-σιγά αρχίζουν να γνωρίζονται και να πλησιάζουν η μία την άλλη.

programme.title: Look what did you do / Κοίτα τι Έκανες
programme.desc: Episode: Dimitris Horn. The show presents glittering and discussed faces, in which unforgettable surprises are reserved. / Επεισόδιο: Δημήτρης Χορν. Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει λαμπερά και πολυσυζητημένα πρόσωπα, στα οποία επιφυλάσσει αξέχαστες εκπλήξεις.

programme.title: The mafia of the door next door / Ο Μαφιόζος της Διπλανής Πόρτας
programme.desc: Oz, an unfortunate dentist, discovers that a former professional killer, a current police informant, moved to the neighboring house. At the encouragement of his wife, Oz travels to Chicago to quote him to the mobsters who are wanted. (105) / Ο Οζ, ένας άτυχος οδοντίατρος, ανακαλύπτει ότι στο διπλανό σπίτι μετακόμισε ένας πρώην επαγγελματίας δολοφόνος, νυν πληροφοριοδότης της αστυνομίας. Με την παρότρυνση της γυναίκας του, ο Οζ ταξιδεύει μέχρι το Σικάγο για να τον καταδώσει στους μαφιόζους που τον καταζητούν. (105)

programme.title: Elvis Presley: Continuous Search (E) / Έλβις Πρίσλεϋ: Διαρκής Αναζήτηση (Ε)
programme.desc: Following his creative journey from his childhood to the end, in 1976, the documentary includes shots from the interior of Greisland, as well as interviews with musicians, producers, engineers, directors and other artists who were deeply influenced by him. / Ακολουθώντας το δημιουργικό του ταξίδι από την παιδική του ηλικία μέχρι το τέλος, το 1976, το ντοκιμαντέρ περιλαμβάνει πλάνα από το εσωτερικό της Γκρέισλαντ, καθώς και συνεντεύξεις με μουσικούς, παραγωγούς, μηχανικούς, σκηνοθέτες και άλλους καλλιτέχνες που επηρεάστηκαν βαθιά από αυτόν.

programme.title: Zone Defense E3 (E) / Άμυνα Ζώνης Ε3 (Ε)
programme.desc: Greek Police Series 2007. Police Officer Haritos undertakes the investigation of two murders and, closer to the truth, the more dangerously faces a zone defense that no one dares to break. / Ελληνική αστυνομική σειρά παραγωγής 2007. Δέκα παιδιά και η οικογένειά τους μας καλούν σε ένα υπαίθριο γεύμα, με συνταγές της πατρίδας τους.

programme.title: Miam and out e8 (e) / Μιάμ Κι Έξω Ε8 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Eczevier, New Zealand. When you live and grow away from your place of origin, one thing that certainly unites your community is food. Ten children and their family invite us to an outdoor meal, with recipes from their homeland. / Επεισόδιο: Εκζέβιερ, Νέα Ζηλανδία. Όταν μένεις και μεγαλώνεις μακριά από τον τόπο καταγωγής σου, ένα πράγμα που σίγουρα ενώνει την κοινότητά σου είναι το φαγητό. Δέκα παιδιά και η οικογένειά τους μας καλούν σε ένα υπαίθριο γεύμα, με συνταγές της πατρίδας τους.

programme.title: I can too e4 (e) / Μπορώ κι Εγώ Ε4 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Croatia, Grega, the flying musician. The ten -year -old Grega dreams of flying with a balloon. To raise the money needed for the flight, he plays a fagot on the street. At his side are his parents, experienced street artists. / Επεισόδιο: Κροατία, Γκρέγκα, ο ιπτάμενος μουσικός. Ο δεκάχρονος Γκρέγκα ονειρεύεται να πετάξει με αερόστατο. Για να μαζέψει τα χρήματα που χρειάζονται για την πτήση, παίζει φαγκότο στον δρόμο. Στο πλευρό του στέκονται οι γονείς του, έμπειροι καλλιτέχνες του δρόμου.

programme.title: World Athletics Championship 2025 (G) / Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα Υγρού Στίβου 2025 (Ζ)
programme.desc: Swimming - Day 8. Afternoon. Watch the big track celebration: The World Championships, held in Singapore from July 11 to August 3, 2025. The best athletes and athletes in the world are fighting for medals. / Κολύμβηση - 8η μέρα. Απόγευμα. Παρακολουθήστε τη μεγάλη γιορτή του υγρού στίβου: το Παγκόσμιο Πρωτάθλημα, που διεξάγεται στη Σιγκαπούρη από τις 11 Ιουλίου έως τις 3 Αυγούστου 2025. Οι καλύτεροι αθλητές και αθλήτριες του κόσμου δίνουν τη μάχη των μεταλλίων.

programme.title: Novasports Exclusive (E) / Novasports Αποκλειστικό (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Alexandros Paschalakis. The international goalkeeper, Alexandros Paschalakis, plays ball with Apostolis Lambos, and talks about his decision to go to Olympiacos as well as his beloved national team! / Επεισόδιο: Αλέξανδρος Πασχαλάκης. Ο διεθνής τερματοφύλακας, Αλέξανδρος Πασχαλάκης, παίζει μπάλα με τον Αποστόλη Λάμπο, και μιλάει για την απόφασή του να πάει στον Ολυμπιακό, καθώς και για την αγαπημένη του Εθνική ομάδα!

programme.title: And yet I'm still here E39 (e) / Κι Όμως Είμαι Ακόμα Εδώ Ε39 (Ε)
programme.desc: The results of the DNA test show that Katerina and Natasa are not sisters and they are both frustrated. Natasha asks her mother's mother to help Katerina find her father. / Τα αποτελέσματα του τεστ DNA δείχνουν πως η Κατερίνα και η Νατάσα δεν είναι αδερφές και απογοητεύονται και οι δύο. Η Νατάσα ζητάει από τη δημοσιογράφο μητέρα της να βοηθήσει την Κατερίνα να βρει τον πατέρα της.

programme.title: And yet I'm still here E40 (E) / Κι Όμως Είμαι Ακόμα Εδώ Ε40 (Ε)
programme.desc: Katerina, distressed by the end of the assassination attempt, talks to Angelos, who, in order to comfort her, shows her various versions of her life in parallel universes. / Η Κατερίνα στενοχωρημένη από την κατάληξη της απόπειρας δολοφονίας μιλάει με τον Άγγελο, που για να την παρηγορήσει, της δείχνει διάφορες εκδοχές της ζωής της σε παράλληλα σύμπαντα.

programme.title: Broadcast (e) / Εκπομπή (Ε)
programme.desc: ERT presents you selected broadcasts. / Η ΕΡΤ σας παρουσιάζει επιλεγμένες εκπομπές.

programme.title: Formal participation / Επίσημη Συμμετοχή
programme.desc: An elderly billionaire who is worried about his hysteria hires a leading director and the best active actors for an ambitious and costly production, who is in danger of collapsing when the protagonists come against. (115) / Ένας ηλικιωμένος δισεκατομμυριούχος που ανησυχεί για την υστεροφημία του, προσλαμβάνει μια κορυφαία σκηνοθέτρια και τους καλύτερους εν ενεργεία ηθοποιούς για μια φιλόδοξη και κοστοβόρα παραγωγή, η οποία κινδυνεύει να καταρρεύσει όταν οι πρωταγωνιστές έρχονται σε κόντρα. (115)

programme.title: Elvis Presley: Continuous Search (E) / Έλβις Πρίσλεϋ: Διαρκής Αναζήτηση (Ε)
programme.desc: Following his creative journey from his childhood to the end, in 1976, the documentary includes shots from the interior of Greisland, as well as interviews with musicians, producers, engineers, directors and other artists who were deeply influenced by him. / Ακολουθώντας το δημιουργικό του ταξίδι από την παιδική του ηλικία μέχρι το τέλος, το 1976, το ντοκιμαντέρ περιλαμβάνει πλάνα από το εσωτερικό της Γκρέισλαντ, καθώς και συνεντεύξεις με μουσικούς, παραγωγούς, μηχανικούς, σκηνοθέτες και άλλους καλλιτέχνες που επηρεάστηκαν βαθιά από αυτόν.

programme.title: The opposite / Οι Απέναντι
programme.desc: In Athens 80, a young man prefers to live at night despite the day. In the opposite apartment building, a mature housewife, with her gaps and needs. Apparently nothing connects them. (106) / Στην Αθήνα του 80, ένας νεαρός προτιμά να ζει τη νύχτα παρά τη μέρα. Στην απέναντι πολυκατοικία, μια νοικοκυρά ώριμης ηλικίας, με τα κενά και τις ανάγκες της. Φαινομενικά δεν τους συνδέει τίποτα απολύτως. (106)

programme.title: 24 hours Greece K5 E5 (E) / 24 Ώρες Ελλάδα Κ5 Ε5 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Aegina. On the beautiful island that was fortunate to be designated as the first capital of the newly established Greek state we will get to know the Kapodistrian buildings, learn about the sacred fruit of the island and visit the Temple of Aphaia. / Επεισόδιο: Αίγινα. Στο πανέμορφο νησί που είχε την τύχη να οριστεί ως η πρώτη πρωτεύουσα του νεοσύστατου ελληνικού κράτους θα γνωρίσουμε τα καποδιστριακά κτήρια, θα μάθουμε για τον ιερό καρπό του νησιού και θα επισκεφτούμε το ναό της Αφαίας.

programme.title: Perimeter (e) / Περίμετρος (Ε)
programme.desc: An informative broadcast that focuses daily on the news and on specific issues, in concentric circles, with a focus on Thessaloniki, the regions of the country, our neighboring countries and the community. / Ενημερωτική εκπομπή η οποία επικεντρώνει καθημερινά στην επικαιρότητα και σε ειδικά θέματα, σε ομόκεντρους κύκλους, με έμφαση τη Θεσσαλονίκη, τις περιφέρειες της χώρας, τις γειτονικές μας χώρες και την Ομογένεια.

programme.title: From the field to the shelf K2 E5 (E) / Από το Χωράφι στο Ράφι Κ2 Ε5 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Lemon. The show, recognizing the importance of lemon for the domestic primary sector, visited two of the main cores of lemon production in our country, Argolida and Corinth. / Επεισόδιο: Λεμόνι. Η εκπομπή, αναγνωρίζοντας τη σημασία της λεμονιάς για τον εγχώριο πρωτογενή τομέα, επισκέφθηκε δύο από τους βασικότερους πυρήνες της παραγωγής λεμονιών στη χώρα μας, την Αργολίδα και την Κορινθία.

programme.title: The northern current (E) / Το Βόρειο Ρεύμα (Ε)
programme.desc: After a decisive experience in the Lofoten Islands, German director Stephen Crunes begins to build buoys to follow the journey of plastic waste from Dresden and through German and international waters. / Μετά από μία καθοριστική εμπειρία στα νησιά Λοφότεν, ο Γερμανός σκηνοθέτης Στέφεν Κρόνες αρχίζει να κατασκευάζει σημαδούρες για να ακολουθήσει το ταξίδι των πλαστικών αποβλήτων από τη Δρέσδη και μέσα από τα γερμανικά και διεθνή ύδατα.

programme.title: Life in the desert E1 (E) / Η Ζωή στην Έρημο Ε1 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Judea Desert: The Desert of the Soul. A relatively small desert, with an area of 1,500 sq. Km, which has amazing parts and incredible history that has formed the cultural history of mankind and gave birth to the religions of Judaism and Christianity. / Επεισόδιο: Έρημος Ιουδαίας: Η Έρημος της Ψυχής. Μια σχετικά μικρή έρημος, με έκταση 1.500 τ.χλμ., η οποία διαθέτει εκπληκτικά μέρη και απίστευτη ιστορία που έχει διαμορφώσει την πολιτιστική ιστορία της ανθρωπότητας και γέννησε τις θρησκείες του Ιουδαϊσμού και του Χριστιανισμού.

programme.title: Sir Simon Ratl and Leonidas Kavakos (E) / Σερ Σάιμον Ρατλ και Λεωνίδας Καβάκος (Ε)
programme.desc: The concert was filmed in the Barbican Hall in London on 6/1/22. Sir Simon Ratl runs Sibelius, Bartok and the world premiere of the new Unnuk Qin violin with soloist Leonidas Kavakos. / Η συναυλία μαγνητοσκοπήθηκε στο Μπάρμπικαν Χολ του Λονδίνου στις 6/1/22. Ο Σερ Σάιμον Ρατλ διευθύνει Σιμπέλιους, Μπάρτοκ και την παγκόσμια πρεμιέρα του νέου κοντσέρτου για βιολί της Ουνσούκ Τσιν με σολίστ τον Λεωνίδα Καβάκο.

programme.title: Open Book K2 E8 (E) / Ανοιχτό Βιβλίο Κ2 Ε8 (Ε)
programme.desc: What do women claim today? We are talking with Irene Georgis, Maria Karamesini and Antigoni Luberakis about the position of the woman and the gap that society must cover. / Τι διεκδικούν σήμερα οι γυναίκες; Μιλάμε με την Ειρήνη Γεωργή, την Μαρία Καραμεσίνη και την Αντιγόνη Λυμπεράκη για την θέση της γυναίκας και το χάσμα που πρέπει να καλύψει η κοινωνία.

programme.title: It's up to you K2 E9 (E) / Είναι στο Χέρι σου Κ2 Ε9 (Ε)
programme.desc: A potter is coming to serve a double purpose at the house of Ilenia and Stefanos. A conversation about the cottage and the difficulty of watering the lawn brings to the table the idea of placing a synthetic lawn. / Ένας πάγκος- γλάστρα έρχεται να εξυπηρετήσει έναν διπλό σκοπό στο σπίτι της Ιλένιας και του Στέφανου. Μια συζήτηση για το εξοχικό και τη δυσκολία ποτίσματος του γκαζόν, φέρνει στο τραπέζι την ιδέα για τοποθέτηση συνθετικού χλοοτάπητα.

programme.title: Small States of Europe E4 (E) / Μικρά Κράτη της Ευρώπης Ε4 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Lieutenant. Liechtenstein may be small, but the different communities between the mountains and the economic world have their particularities. One thing unites all the inhabitants of the Principality: the nature that is breathtaking. / Επεισόδιο: Λιχτεστάιν. Το Λιχτενστάιν μπορεί να είναι μικρό, αλλά οι διαφορετικές κοινότητες μεταξύ των βουνών και του οικονομικού κόσμου έχουν τις ιδιαιτερότητές τους. Ένα πράγμα ενώνει όλους τους κατοίκους του Πριγκιπάτου: η φύση που σου κόβει την ανάσα.

programme.title: Auto moto ERT / Auto Moto ΕΡΤ
programme.desc: Broadcast on motor sport, with presenters Nikos Koroviela, Nikos, Kyiotelis and Angelos Stathakopoulos. / Εκπομπή για τον μηχανοκίνητο αθλητισμό, με παρουσιαστές τους Νίκο Κορόβηλα, Νίκο Παγιωτέλη και Άγγελο Σταθακόπουλο.

programme.title: Perimeter / Περίμετρος
programme.desc: An informative broadcast that focuses daily on the news and on specific issues, in concentric circles, with a focus on Thessaloniki, the regions of the country, our neighboring countries and the community. / Ενημερωτική εκπομπή η οποία επικεντρώνει καθημερινά στην επικαιρότητα και σε ειδικά θέματα, σε ομόκεντρους κύκλους, με έμφαση τη Θεσσαλονίκη, τις περιφέρειες της χώρας, τις γειτονικές μας χώρες και την Ομογένεια.

programme.title: News from the Region / Ειδήσεις από την Περιφέρεια
programme.desc: Find out about all the latest news from the region. / Ενημερωθείτε για όλα τα τελευταία νέα από την περιφέρεια.

programme.title: Village United K2 E10 (E) / Βίλατζ Γιουνάιτεντ Κ2 Ε10 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Thunderbolt Kastoria. Three points define the life and values of the Greek countryside. The church, the café and the football stadium. The show focuses on players who are competing for the applause and honor of the village and jersey. / Επεισόδιο: Κεραυνός Χιλιόδενδρου Καστοριά. Τρία σημεία ορίζουν τη ζωή και τις αξίες της ελληνικής υπαίθρου. Η εκκλησία, το καφενείο και το ποδοσφαιρικό γήπεδο. Η εκπομπή εστιάζει στους ποδοσφαιριστές που αγωνίζονται για το χειροκρότημα και την τιμή του χωριού και της φανέλας.

programme.title: The years of innocence E7 (E) / Τα Χρόνια της Αθωότητας Ε7 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Panachaic, Ioannina, Kastoria (1971-1980). In the 70's, three groups shook the waters. Davourlis' great Panachaic has reached Europe. PAS Ioannina of the Argentines gave unparalleled moments. Finally, Kastoria won the Greek Cup in 1980. / Επεισόδιο: Παναχαϊκή, Γιάννινα, Καστοριά (1971-1980). Την δεκαετία του 70, τρεις ομάδες τάραξαν τα νερά. Η μεγάλη Παναχαϊκή του Δαβουρλή έφτασε μέχρι την Ευρώπη. Ο ΠΑΣ Γιάννινα των Αργεντινών έδωσε ανεπανάληπτες στιγμές. Τέλος η Καστοριά, κατέκτησε το 1980 το κύπελλο Ελλάδας.

programme.title: But how is it made? E6 (e) / Μα Πώς Φτιάχνεται; Ε6 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Paper. George is looking for the path of paper and how the toilet paper, kitchen paper and napkins are finally made. The journey starts with the raw material, paper, at an impressive installation in northern Greece. / Επεισόδιο: Χαρτί. Ο Γιώργος αναζητά τον δρόμο του χαρτιού και πώς τελικά φτιάχνονται το χαρτί υγείας, το χαρτί κουζίνας και οι χαρτοπετσέτες. Το ταξίδι ξεκινά από την πρώτη ύλη, τη χαρτόμαζα, σε μια εντυπωσιακή εγκατάσταση στη Βόρεια Ελλάδα.

programme.title: Wild Greece K4 E11 (E) / Άγρια Ελλάδα Κ4 Ε11 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Doiran and Kerkini. Two lakes for biodiversity, both metaphorically and literally! Elias and Gregory explore the two neighboring wetlands and discover how important they are for wildlife but also for humans. / Επεισόδιο: Δοϊράνη and Κερκίνη. Δύο λίμνες σταθμοί για τη βιοποικιλότητα, τόσο μεταφορικά όσο και κυριολεκτικά! Ο Ηλίας και ο Γρηγόρης εξερευνούν τους δύο γειτονικούς υγρότοπους και ανακαλύπτουν πόσο σημαντικοί είναι για την άγρια ζωή αλλά και για τον άνθρωπο.

programme.title: News from the Region / Ειδήσεις από την Περιφέρεια
programme.desc: Find out about all the latest news from the region. / Ενημερωθείτε για όλα τα τελευταία νέα από την περιφέρεια.

programme.title: Athletics: Pan -Hellenic Athletics Championship (G) / Στίβος: Πανελλήνιο Πρωτάθλημα Στίβου (Ζ)
programme.desc: With the participation of thousands of athletes from all over Greece, on Saturday 2nd and Sunday, August 3, the Pan -Hellenic Men's - Women's Athletics Championships are held at the Panthessal Stadium of Volos. / Με τη συμμετοχή χιλιάδων αθλητών από όλη την Ελλάδα, το Σάββατο 2 και την Κυριακή 3 Αυγούστου διεξάγεται το Πανελλήνιο Πρωτάθλημα Στίβου Ανδρών - Γυναικών άνω και κάτω των Κ23 στο Πανθεσσαλικό Στάδιο του Βόλου.

programme.title: The champions E13 (E) / Οι Πρωταθλητές Ε13 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Women's Organic. The eternal discussion in sport. Who is the top of all time? An episode per every sport examines their candidates and their claims for the top title. / Επεισόδιο: Ενόργανη Γυναικών. Η αιώνια συζήτηση στον αθλητισμό. Ποιος είναι ο κορυφαίος όλων των εποχών; Ένα επεισόδιο ανά κάθε άθλημα εξετάζει τους υποψήφιους και τις αξιώσεις τους για τον τίτλο του κορυφαίου.

programme.title: Partners with E3 hooves / Συνεργάτες με Οπλές Ε3
programme.desc: PREMIERE. Episode: The buffalo conquers wetlands. The Asian water bull is the king of wetlands. Ever since he was domesticated about 5,000 years ago in Southeast Asia and the Indian subcontinent, Vouvalos traveled with us around the world. / ΠΡΕΜΙΕΡΑ. Επεισόδιο: Το Βουβάλι Κατακτά τους Υγροτόπους. Ο ασιατικός νεροβούβαλος είναι ο βασιλιάς των υγροτόπων. Από τότε που εξημερώθηκε πριν από περίπου 5.000 χρόνια στη Νοτιοανατολική Ασία και την Ινδική υποήπειρο, ο βούβαλος ταξίδεψε μαζί μας σε όλο τον κόσμο.

programme.title: About Santa Claus / Σχετικά με τον Βασίλη
programme.desc: A mature professor of sociology, passing through the midst of middle age, abandons his work and family and lives isolated in the countryside. The only motivation to live is the cloudy face of an unknown girl in a photo. (90) / Ένας ώριμος καθηγητής κοινωνιολογίας, περνώντας την κρίση της μέσης ηλικίας, εγκαταλείπει τη δουλειά και την οικογένειά του και ζει απομονωμένος στο εξοχικό. Μοναδικό κίνητρο για να ζει αποτελεί το θολό πρόσωπο μιας άγνωστης κοπέλας σε μια φωτογραφία. (90)

programme.title: 101 events that changed in the 20th century E7 (E) / 101 Γεγονότα που Άλλαξαν τον 20ό Αιώνα Ε7 (Ε)
programme.desc: Events 23 to 11. The rapid technological development. The Wright brothers made the first flight and the Sputnik satellite fired into space. A new vaccine for the epidemic of polio and a jump in human rights with a new declaration. / Γεγονότα 23 ως 11. Η ραγδαία τεχνολογική εξέλιξη. Οι αδελφοί Ράιτ πραγματοποίησαν την πρώτη πτήση και ο δορυφόρος Σπούτνικ εκτοξεύτηκε στο διάστημα. Ένα νέο εμβόλιο για την επιδημία της πολιομυελίτιδας και ένα άλμα στα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα με μια νέα Διακήρυξη.

programme.title: Runs the sweat e7 (e) / Τρέχει ο Ιδρώτας Ε7 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Festival of inflammatory man. The series closes with a journey to the inflammatory man festival, a huge art celebration in the Nevada desert, where Michael meets people everywhere in the world bringing the innovative designs of their steam baths to the side. / Επεισόδιο: Φεστιβάλ Φλεγόμενου Ανθρώπου. Η σειρά κλείνει με ένα ταξίδι στο Φεστιβάλ Φλεγόμενου Ανθρώπου, μια τεράστια γιορτή τέχνης στην έρημο της Νεβάδας, όπου ο Μίκελ συναντά ανθρώπους από παντού στον κόσμο που φέρνουν τα καινοτόμα σχέδια των ατμόλουτρών τους στην Πλάγια.

programme.title: Small States of Europe E4 (E) / Μικρά Κράτη της Ευρώπης Ε4 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Lieutenant. Liechtenstein may be small, but the different communities between the mountains and the economic world have their particularities. One thing unites all the inhabitants of the Principality: the nature that is breathtaking. / Επεισόδιο: Λιχτεστάιν. Το Λιχτενστάιν μπορεί να είναι μικρό, αλλά οι διαφορετικές κοινότητες μεταξύ των βουνών και του οικονομικού κόσμου έχουν τις ιδιαιτερότητές τους. Ένα πράγμα ενώνει όλους τους κατοίκους του Πριγκιπάτου: η φύση που σου κόβει την ανάσα.

programme.desc: A potter is coming to serve a double purpose at the house of Ilenia and Stefanos. A conversation about the cottage and the difficulty of watering the lawn brings to the table the idea of placing a synthetic lawn. / Ένας πάγκος- γλάστρα έρχεται να εξυπηρετήσει έναν διπλό σκοπό στο σπίτι της Ιλένιας και του Στέφανου. Μια συζήτηση για το εξοχικό και τη δυσκολία ποτίσματος του γκαζόν, φέρνει στο τραπέζι την ιδέα για τοποθέτηση συνθετικού χλοοτάπητα.

programme.title: But how is it made? E6 (e) / Μα Πώς Φτιάχνεται; Ε6 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Paper. George is looking for the path of paper and how the toilet paper, kitchen paper and napkins are finally made. The journey starts with the raw material, paper, at an impressive installation in northern Greece. / Επεισόδιο: Χαρτί. Ο Γιώργος αναζητά τον δρόμο του χαρτιού και πώς τελικά φτιάχνονται το χαρτί υγείας, το χαρτί κουζίνας και οι χαρτοπετσέτες. Το ταξίδι ξεκινά από την πρώτη ύλη, τη χαρτόμαζα, σε μια εντυπωσιακή εγκατάσταση στη Βόρεια Ελλάδα.

programme.title: Life in Desert E2 (E) / Η Ζωή στην Έρημο Ε2 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Atacama: Desert under the skies. It extends for 900 kilometers along the coastline of Chile and Peru, it is a huge, spooky landscape, from white salt basins, emerald lagoons, sand, thermopic, lava flows and blue, red and purple mountains. / Επεισόδιο: Ατακάμα: Έρημος Κάτω από τους Ουρανούς. Εκτείνεται για 900 χιλιόμετρα κατά μήκος της ακτογραμμής της Χιλής και του Περού, είναι τεράστιο, απόκοσμο τοπίο, από λεκάνες λευκού αλατιού, σμαραγδένιες λιμνοθάλασσες, άμμο, θερμοπίδακες, ροές λάβας και μπλε, κόκκινα και μωβ βουνά.

programme.title: European concert 2024 in Georgia (E) / Ευρωπαϊκό Κονσέρτο 2024 στη Γεωργία (Ε)
programme.desc: In her home country of Georgia, Lisa Batasville interprets Brahms' concert. Under the direction of Daniel Harding, the Berlin Philharmonic closes the concert with Beethoven's fifth deal. The concert was given on May 1, 2024 at the Tsinandali Amphitheater. / Στην πατρίδα της τη Γεωργία, η Λίζα Μπατιασβίλι ερμηνεύει το Κοντσέρτο για βιολί του Μπραμς. Υπό την διεύθυνση του Ντάνιελ Χάρντιγκ, η Φιλαρμονική του Βερολίνου κλείνει τη συναυλία με την Πέμπτη Συμφωνία του Μπετόβεν. Η συναυλία δόθηκε την 1η Μαΐου 2024 στο Αμφιθέατρο Τσιναντάλι.

programme.title: The History of Rain E1 (E) / Η Ιστορία της Βροχής Ε1 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Understanding the rain. Life on Earth would not be possible without rain. Although water covers most of the earth, 97% of it is seafood. The rain supports life on land by providing salt -free water that we can drink. / Επεισόδιο: Κατανοώντας τη Βροχή. Η ζωή στη Γη δεν θα ήταν δυνατή χωρίς βροχή. Αν και το νερό καλύπτει το μεγαλύτερο μέρος της γης, το 97% του είναι θαλασσινό. Η βροχή υποστηρίζει τη ζωή στη στεριά παρέχοντας νερό χωρίς αλάτι που μπορούμε να πιούμε.

programme.title: In the islands of Italy E2 (E) / Στα Νησιά της Ιταλίας Ε2 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Monte Isola. With a slight detour, we are in the north of Italy and the largest lake of Europe, Monte Isaola in Lake Iso and its small neighboring islands. / Επεισόδιο: Μόντε Ίζολα. programme.title: In the footsteps of the Greeks of Egypt E1 (E) / Στα Χνάρια των Ελλήνων της Αιγύπτου Ε1 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: Alexandria of Cavafy. The journey begins with the history and home of Constantine Cavafy, the poet who glorified Alexandria. The route continues in the cemetery and the Patriarchate of Alexandria, the flagship of Hellenism and Orthodoxy. / Επεισόδιο: Η Αλεξάνδρεια του Καβάφη. Το ταξίδι ξεκινά με την ιστορία και το σπίτι του Κωνσταντίνου Καβάφη, του ποιητή που δόξασε την Αλεξάνδρεια. Η διαδρομή συνεχίζεται στο νεκροταφείο και το πατριαρχείο της Αλεξάνδρειας, τη ναυαρχίδα του ελληνισμού και της ορθοδοξίας.

programme.title: Co-human beings K4 E2 (E) / Συν-Άνθρωποι Κ4 Ε2 (Ε)
programme.desc: Episode: From Düsseldorf to Telendo. programme.desc: Love connects two people. After the wedding, what they already had - and, these are their children. One of the most watched Spanish series, all time. programme.title: SP in water sports: water jumps: 3m (m) / SP u vodenim sportovima: Skokovi u vodu: 3m (M)
programme.desc: FINA or INTERNATIONAL PLIVAČKA ORGANIZENA SIEVE AGREEMENTS Water sports championships, at the same time, the first competition was held in Yugoslavia in Belgrade. The competitions were held in the period from 1978 - 1998. year every four years, while since 2001. they were held every two odd years so that the terms did not match the Olympics. Great interest in this championship arises from a large number of swimming disciplines and competitions that are held. The program is swimming, diving, deep diving, outdoor swimming, synchronized swimming and water polo. / FINA ili Međunarodna plivačka organizacija od 1973. godine organizuje Svjetska prvenstva u vodenim sportovima, ujedno prvo takmičenje se održalo te godine u Jugoslaviji u Beogradu. Takmičenja su se u periodu od 1978 - 1998. godine održavala svake četvrte godine, dok od 2001. godine se održavaju svake dvije neparne godine kako se ne bi termini poklapali sa olimpijskim igrama. Velika zainteresovanost za ovo prvenstvo proizlazi iz velikog broja plivačkih disciplina i takmičenja koje se održavaju. Na programu su plivanje, ronjenje, duboko ronjenje, plivanje na otvorenom, sinhronizovano plivanje i vaterpolo.

programme.title: Football - League qualifications Conference: Milsami - Future / Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za Ligu Konferencija: Milsami - Budućnost
programme.desc: From 2021. Years of fans of football will enjoy the Europon's league organized by UEFA. The idea for her appeared in 2015. years, and includes lower ranked teams of state championships. The qualifications are divided into two parts, after which 32 teams will be entered in the competition to be divided into eight groups each. 16 teams will progress in the eighth final, then quarterfinals, semifinals and finals. The winner of the final match will be placed in the Europa League next season. / Od 2021. godine ljubitelji fudbala uživaće u Ligi Konferencija Europe koju organizuje UEFA. Ideja za nju pojavila se 2015. godine, a uključuje niže rangirane timove državnih prvenstava. Kvalifikacije su podijeljene u dva dijela, nakon kojih će u takmičenje ući 32 tima koji će biti podijeljeni u osam grupa po četiri. 16 timova napredovaće u osminu finala, zatim četvrtfinale, polufinale i finale. Pobjednik finalne utakmice plasiraće se u Ligu Evrope sledeće sezone.

The program is swimming, diving, deep diving, outdoor swimming, synchronized swimming and water polo. / FINA ili Međunarodna plivačka organizacija od 1973. godine organizuje Svjetska prvenstva u vodenim sportovima, ujedno prvo takmičenje se održalo te godine u Jugoslaviji u Beogradu. Takmičenja su se u periodu od 1978 - 1998. godine održavala svake četvrte godine, dok od 2001. godine se održavaju svake dvije neparne godine kako se ne bi termini poklapali sa olimpijskim igrama. Velika zainteresovanost za ovo prvenstvo proizlazi iz velikog broja plivačkih disciplina i takmičenja koje se održavaju. Na programu su plivanje, ronjenje, duboko ronjenje, plivanje na otvorenom, sinhronizovano plivanje i vaterpolo.

programme.title: I play my game / Igram svoju igru
programme.desc: The series intended for our youngest population is conceived to popularize and propagate a healthy lifestyle through sports and proper nutrition. Episodes intended for children engaged in sports, irrelevant at which success level, will show the essential advantages that provide sports and proper nutrition. We are of the opinion that in Montenegro has many talented children who do not have adequate conditions for the development of their talent. The series would be a modest initiator to raise the current situation on a bar for one step higher level. We want to draw attention to the potential belonging to us, which is indisputable, the potential that deserves much more. / Serijal namijenjen našoj najmlađoj populaciji koncipiran je da popularizuje i propagira zdrav način života kroz sport i pravilnu ishranu. Epizode namijenjene djeci koje se bave sportom, nebitno na kom nivou uspjeha, prikazaće suštinske prednosti koje pružaju sport i pravilna ishrana. Mišljenja smo da u Crnoj Gori ima mnogo talentovane djece koja nemaju adekvatne uslove za razvoj njihovog talenta. Serijal bi bio skroman inicijator da se trenutna situacija podigne na bar za jednu stepenicu veći nivo. Želimo da skrenemo pažnju na potencijal koji pripada samo nama, koji je neosporan, potencijal koji zaslužuje mnogo više.

programme.title: Herman Jose - 50 years of career / Herman Jose - 50 Anos de Carreira
programme.desc: Herman Jose celebrated his 50th career in this concert in Campo Pequeno. More than a show, it was a pretext for reliving Herman's artistic past, enjoying the present with great enchantment and toasting the future, framed by an orchestra of more than twenty musicians. / Herman Jose celebrou os 50 anos de carreira neste concerto no Campo Pequeno. Mais do que um espectáculo, foi um pretexto para reviver o passado artístico de Herman, saborear o presente com muito encantamento e brindar ao futuro, emoldurado por uma orquestra de mais de vinte músicos.

programme.title: The wild side of Africa / O Lado Selvagem de África
programme.desc: A wild corner of Botswana is at the height of a severe drought. As the prey is attracted to the areas with water, the predators perceive. The survival never and guaranteed - the victory of one and the fall of another. / Um canto selvagem do Botswana está no auge de uma seca severa. À medida que as presas sao atraídas para as zonas com água, os predadores percebem. A sobrevivencia nunca e garantida - a vitoria de um e a queda de outro.

programme.title: Balacobaco / Balacobaco
programme.desc: Isabel and a successful architect who see her life crumble when she finds out that her husband, Danilo, lost everything in gambling and illegal schemes, besides his sister to die in a mysterious accident, leaving her with the guard of niece Taís. / Isabel e uma arquiteta bem sucedida que ve sua vida ruir quando descobre que seu marido, Danilo, perdeu tudo em jogos de azar e esquemas ilegais, alem de sua irma morrer em um acidente misterioso, deixando-a com a guarda da sobrinha Taís.

programme.title: Our afternoon / A Nossa Tarde
programme.desc: Get to know the most emotional side of Tânia Ribas de Oliveira in the new RTP afternoons program. / Conheça o lado mais emocional de Tânia Ribas de Oliveira no novo programa das tardes da RTP.

programme.title: Telesales / Televendas
programme.desc: Every day, a space dedicated to sales by television, where product demonstrations are made. / Todos os dias, um espaço dedicado a vendas por televisao, em que sao feitas demonstrações dos produtos.

programme.title: 1000 x Camões / 1000 x Camões
programme.desc: Larger and multiple poet allows fifteen embossed personalities in each of his areas to show us the poet's relationships and his texts to each of them. We started with Isabel Rio Novo to know more about the biography. / Poeta maior e múltiplo, permite que quinze personalidades de relevo em cada uma das suas áreas nos mostrem as relações do poeta e dos seus textos a cada uma delas. Começamos com Isabel Rio Novo para sabermos mais sobre a biografia.

programme.title: Panda and the Rooster / O Panda e o Galo
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship happens: a panda and a barcelo rooster are the best friends. What stories will panda, your friends from the woods and your new Portuguese friend count? / Uma amizade improvável acontece: um panda e um galo de Barcelos sao os melhores amigos. Que historias irao o Panda, os seus amigos do bosque e o seu novo amigo portugues contar?

programme.title: Panda and the Rooster / O Panda e o Galo
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship happens: a panda and a barcelo rooster are the best friends. What stories will panda, your friends from the woods and your new Portuguese friend count? / Uma amizade improvável acontece: um panda e um galo de Barcelos sao os melhores amigos. Que historias irao o Panda, os seus amigos do bosque e o seu novo amigo portugues contar?

programme.title: Twirlywoos / Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Parvo, diverse and many surprises! Always curious twirlywoos look for adventure and divergence wherever you go. In the real world and their small red boat where they like to hide, imitate and be surprised, always discovering new things. / Parvoíce, diversao e muitas surpresas! Os Twirlywoos sempre curiosos procuram aventura e diversao onde quer que vao. No mundo real e no seu pequeno barco vermelho onde gostam de se esconder, imitar e ser surpreendidos vao sempre descobrindo coisas novas.

programme.title: Twirlywoos / Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Parvo, diverse and many surprises! Always curious twirlywoos look for adventure and divergence wherever you go. In the real world and their small red boat where they like to hide, imitate and be surprised, always discovering new things. / Parvoíce, diversao e muitas surpresas! Os Twirlywoos sempre curiosos procuram aventura e diversao onde quer que vao. No mundo real e no seu pequeno barco vermelho onde gostam de se esconder, imitar e ser surpreendidos vao sempre descobrindo coisas novas.

programme.title: Zig, Zag, Zzz and Friends / Zig, Zag, Zzz e Amigos
programme.desc: Zig, Zag and Zzz are three inseparable friends who share exciting and imagining adventures. Explore the world around you and learn valuable lessons about friendship, divergence and grow together. / Zig, Zag e Zzz sao tres amigos inseparáveis que partilham aventuras emocionantes e cheias de imaginaçao. Exploram o mundo à sua volta e aprendem lições valiosas sobre amizade, diversao e crescer juntos.

programme.title: Alice's diary / O Diário de Alice
programme.desc: What would be the diary of a girl who loves to make art and tell stories? Like many five -year -olds, Alice is very fond of talking and expressing herself. You always want to tell what happened on your day, what you learned, the ideas you had and your opinions about everything! / Como seria o diário de uma menina que adora fazer arte e contar historias? Como muitas crianças de cinco anos, Alice gosta muito de falar e de se expressar. Quer sempre contar o que aconteceu no seu dia, o que aprendeu, as ideias que teve e as suas opiniões sobre tudo!

programme.title: The holidays of the boy Nicholas / As Ferias do Menino Nicolau
programme.desc: Join Nicholas and their cheerful group on their holidays, while building sand castles, explore new children's parks and go to treasury hunting! They will catapult you to your charming world, full of mischief and adventures. What a fantastic summer for Nicholas and his friends! / Junta-te ao Nicolau e ao seu alegre grupo nas suas ferias, enquanto constroem castelos de areia, exploram novos parques infantis e vao à caça de tesouros! Eles vao catapultar-te para o seu mundo encantador, cheio de travessuras e aventuras. Que verao fantástico para o Nicolau e os seus amigos!

programme.title: School of hero / Escola de Herois
programme.desc: The Heroes School and a SCHOOL FOR PRINTING SUPERHERS, where children learn to master their innate powers to help people, solve problems, and try to make the world a better place. / A Escola de Herois e uma escola para super-herois principiantes, onde as crianças aprendem a dominar os seus poderes inatos para ajudar as pessoas, resolver problemas e tentar tornar o mundo num lugar melhor.

programme.title: Robin Dos Woods - Pranks in Sherwood / Robin dos Bosques - Travessuras em Sherwood
programme.desc: This young Robin from Locksley and full of energy, courage and humor. Although very young, Robin and his friends struggle against the tyrannical schemes of young prince Joao and live big and fun adventures. / Este jovem Robin de Locksley e cheio de energia, coragem e humor. Apesar de muito jovem, Robin e os seus amigos lutam contra os esquemas tirânicos do jovem príncipe Joao e vivem grandes e divertidas aventuras.

programme.title: Robin Dos Woods - Pranks in Sherwood / Robin dos Bosques - Travessuras em Sherwood

programme.desc: In a small village of fishermen in the Canary Islands, Don Lucio, a man hated by all, dies unexpectedly. In the tiny apartment that divided with the woman, there is no room to make the funeral. Isabel, a neighbor, ends up with the body of the dead in her small apartment. / Numa pequena aldeia de pescadores nas Ilhas Canárias, Don Lúcio, um homem odiado por todos, morre inesperadamente. programme.title: A HISTORY OF ANNETTE ZELMAN / A Historia de Annette Zelman
programme.desc: Paris, 1942. A young Jewish student of Fine Arts, falls in love with Jean Jausion, a young man from a Catholic bourgeois family. The fate seems to smile at them. But in the Paris occupied by the Nazis, their relationship unfolds a series of events that rush them into a true nightmare. / Paris, 1942. Uma jovem judia estudante de Belas Artes, apaixona-se por Jean Jausion, um jovem de uma família burguesa catolica. O destino parece sorrir-lhes. Mas, na Paris ocupada pelos nazis, a sua relaçao desenrola uma serie de acontecimentos que os precipitam num verdadeiro pesadelo.

programme.desc: Whether winter or summer sports, several wild animals compete in sporting events. Whatever sport, they react according to their personality and the particularities of their anatomy, creating comic or poetic situations, but always eccentric and very fun! / Sejam desportos de inverno ou verao, vários animais selvagens competem em eventos desportivos. Seja qual for o desporto, eles reagem de acordo com a sua personalidade e as particularidades da sua anatomia, criando situações comicas ou poeticas, mas sempre excentricas e muito divertidas!

programme.title: GRIZZY AND THE LOREMINGUES / Grizzy E Os Lemingues
programme.desc: Lemingues promote a trunk launch contest when Grizzy sends them away. The rodents land in an old Celtic place, where they find a magic bracelet that increases the strength of those who wear it. The Lemingues start the competition with their new power, but this time with boys. / Os Lemingues promovem um concurso de lançamento de troncos quando Grizzy os manda para longe. Os roedores aterram num antigo lugar celta, onde encontram uma pulseira mágica que aumenta a força de quem a usa. Os Lemingues iniciam a competiçao com o seu novo poder, mas desta vez com menires.

programme.title: GRIZZY AND THE LOREMINGUES / Grizzy E Os Lemingues
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemingues fight for the television command. The discussion takes the bear to the castle tower during a storm. In a secret room, it see a human form in light of lightning. Scared, it connects a mechanism activated by the lightning that gives life to medieval armor. / Grizzy e os Lemingues lutam pelo comando da televisao. A discussao leva o urso à torre do castelo durante uma tempestade. Numa sala secreta ve uma forma humana à luz de um relâmpago. Assustado, liga um mecanismo ativado pelo relâmpago que dá vida a uma armadura medieval.

programme.title: Gus, the minorca knight / Gus, O Cavaleiro Minorca

programme.title: World Sports Championships - Pure Natation: Final and Finals / Campeonatos do Mundo de Desportos Aquáticos - Nataçao Pura: Meias-Finais e Finais
programme.desc: The city of Doha hosts the Aquatic Sports World Championship, which brings together the best athletes in this one of the largest events in the world sport. In competition we will have athletes of the modalities of swimming in open waters, artistic swimming, water jumps, pure swimming and aquatic pole. / A cidade de Doha recebe o Campeonato do Mundo de Desportos Aquáticos, que reúne os melhores atletas neste que e um dos maiores eventos do desporto mundial. Em competiçao teremos atletas das modalidades de Nataçao em Águas Abertas, Nataçao Artística, Saltos para a Água, Nataçao Pura e Polo Aquático.

programme.title: Argonauts and the gold coin / Os Argonautas e a Moeda de Ouro
programme.desc: Alba arrives in Rodas, a small fishing village, to pass the summer at his aunt Helena's house. Alba is convinced that it will be a boring and lonely summer ... I could not be more mistaken! Soon she will make new and wonderful friends: Lucas, Sali, Olivia and Nil. / Alba chega a Rodas, uma pequena vila piscatoria, para passar o verao na casa da sua tia Helena. Alba está convencida que será um verao chato e solitário... Nao poderia estar mais enganada! Em breve ela fará novos e maravilhosos amigos: Lucas, Sali, Olivia e Nil.

programme.title: Sport 2 / Desporto 2
programme.desc: Welcome to the program of modalities practiced in Portugal and abroad. / Bem-vindo ao programa das modalidades praticadas em Portugal e no estrangeiro.

programme.title: The live - a river as in the old days / O Morava - Um Rio Como Antigamente
programme.desc: In the heart of Europe, on the border between Austria and Slovakia, there is one of the last and most exceptional wild areas, the river lived. In the last 60 kilometers, before flowing into the Danube, the river remains, largely, a wild and unpredictable chain. / No coraçao da Europa, na fronteira entre a Áustria e a Eslováquia, existe uma das últimas e mais excecionais áreas selvagens ribeirinhas, o rio Morava. Nos últimos 60 quilometros, antes de desaguar no Danúbio, o rio continua a ser, em grande parte, uma corrente selvagem e imprevisível.

programme.title: The walking hairdresser / A Cabeleireira Ambulante
programme.desc: Amber travels to India, where women's hair is considered the most beautiful in the world. So much so that they are the object of a very flourishing business. Our traveling hairdresser will realize how hair is a strong symbol of religious affiliation and status within society. / Amber viaja para a Índia, onde o cabelo das mulheres e considerado o mais bonito do mundo. Tanto assim e que sao objeto de um negocio muito florescente. A nossa cabeleireira itinerante irá perceber como o cabelo e um forte símbolo de filiaçao religiosa e de estatuto dentro da sociedade.

programme.title: Jungles of the world / Selvas do Mundo
programme.desc: The most amazing forests and jungles in the world in a 26 -episode documentary series. A trip around the world to discover the abundant biodiversity that the last major forests and jungles on the planet host: from the strangest inhabitants to the most beautiful and unexplored regions. / As florestas e selvas mais incríveis do mundo numa serie documental de 26 episodios. Uma viagem à volta do mundo à descoberta da abundante biodiversidade que as últimas grandes florestas e selvas do planeta albergam: desde os habitantes mais estranhos ate às regiões mais belas e inexploradas.

programme.title: Bump / Bump
programme.desc: When the family does not reveal to him Angie's new diagnosis, Jacinda feels excluded and decides to adopt a new friend and have her own secret. / Quando a família nao lhe revela o novo diagnostico de Angie, Jacinda sente-se excluída e decide adotar uma nova amiga e ter o seu proprio segredo.

programme.title: Room / Folha de Sala
programme.desc: A cultural agenda that highlights shows of theater, music and others, not forgetting the release of books and records, cinema and the realization of other events, such as exhibitions, outdoor shows, conferences. Text and Locuce of Manuela Silva Reis. / Uma agenda cultural que destaca espectáculos de teatro, música e outros, nao esquecendo o lançamento de livros e discos, o cinema e ainda a realizaçao de outros eventos, como exposições, espectáculos ao ar livre, conferencias. Texto e locuçao de Manuela Silva Reis.

programme.title: The veterinarian Jacobs / O Veterinário Jacobs
programme.desc: A hunter hit on the outskirts of Schwanitz. Was it a hunting accident or an attempted murder? With the help of Hauke, canvas Vogt investigates the victim's family, since he is known to be unpleasant. / Um caçador atingido a tiro nos arredores de Schwanitz. Terá sido um acidente de caça ou uma tentativa de assassinato? Com a ajuda de Hauke, Lona Vogt investiga a família da vítima, uma vez que ele e conhecido por ser desagradável.

programme.title: Journal 2 / Jornal 2
programme.desc: The world in 30 minutes. In the newspaper 2 we analyze facts and cross opinions. With each passing day we read the country and the world with data, explanations and interpretations in the most diverse areas, such as politics, science, economy and culture. / O mundo em 30 minutos. No Jornal 2 analisamos factos e cruzamos opiniões. A cada dia que passa fazemos leitura do país e do mundo com dados, explicações e interpretações nas mais diversas áreas, como Política, Ciencia, Economia e Cultura.

programme.title: Rusalka do theater at the Scala de Milao / Rusalka do Teatro alla Scala de Milao
programme.desc: Antonin Dvorak's theatrical masterpiece, written in 1900, and a recurring title in the season programs of the main European and American theaters. Interestingly, it was never presented at La Scala. / A obra-prima teatral de Antonin Dvorák, escrita em 1900, e um título recorrente nos programas de temporada dos principais teatros europeus e americanos. Curiosamente, nunca foi apresentada no La Scala.

programme.title: That dear month of August / Aquele Querido Mes de Agosto
programme.desc: In Portugal, on August, the population and activities multiply: parties, pilgrimages, music and a lot of animation. Emigrants visit the homeland at the holidays and intersect with the inhabitants at the festivities. A footage team is in the region and looks for actors for a fiction movie. / Em Portugal, no mes de agosto, multiplica-se a populaçao e as atividades: festas, romarias, música e muita animaçao. Os emigrantes visitam a terra natal nas ferias e cruzam-se com os habitantes nas festividades. Uma equipa de filmagem encontra-se na regiao e procura atores para um filme de ficçao.

programme.title: Paradise (Magazine) / Paraíso (Magazine)
programme.desc: A group of elderly people gather every day in the gardens of the Catete Palace in Rio de Janeiro. By falling in the afternoon, almost centenary men and women reveal the meaning of life through ancient love songs. / Um grupo de idosos reúne-se todos os dias nos jardins do Palácio do Catete, no Rio de Janeiro. Ao cair da tarde, homens e mulheres quase centenários revelam o sentido da vida atraves de antigas canções de amor.

programme.title: Wild ties / Laços Selvagens
programme.desc: The moment when children face the world and a real challenge ... The same happens in nature! In this episode, we will find out how and being a father in the animal kingdom. How do they experience the arrival of their babies? What strategies do they use to take care of them? / O momento em que as crianças enfrentam o mundo e um verdadeiro desafio... o mesmo acontece na natureza! Neste episodio, descobriremos como e ser pai no reino animal. Como vivenciam a chegada dos seus bebes? Que estrategias usam para cuidar deles?

programme.title: Athleticus / Athleticus
programme.desc: Whether winter or summer sports, several wild animals compete in sporting events. Whatever sport, they react according to their personality and the particularities of their anatomy, creating comic or poetic situations, but always eccentric and very fun! / Sejam desportos de inverno ou verao, vários animais selvagens competem em eventos desportivos. Seja qual for o desporto, eles reagem de acordo com a sua personalidade e as particularidades da sua anatomia, criando situações comicas ou poeticas, mas sempre excentricas e muito divertidas!

programme.title: Pfffiratas / Pfffiratas
programme.desc: On Calypso Island, three crews learn pffiraria with the legendary Lamar Captain. This demanding training covers from navigation exercises and treasure hunting competitions to cannon shots and approach to enemy ships! / Na Ilha Calypso, tres tripulações aprendem Pffirataria com o lendário Capitao Lamar. Este exigente treino abrange desde exercícios de navegaçao e competições de caça ao tesouro ate disparos de canhões e abordagem a navios inimigos!

programme.title: Water Sports World Championships - Jumps: 10M Platform (Male Final) / Campeonatos do Mundo de Desportos Aquáticos - Saltos: Plataforma 10m (Final Masculina)
programme.desc: The city of Doha hosts the Aquatic Sports World Championship, which brings together the best athletes in this one of the largest events in the world sport. In competition we will have athletes of the modalities of swimming in open waters, artistic swimming, water jumps, pure swimming and aquatic pole. / A cidade de Doha recebe o Campeonato do Mundo de Desportos Aquáticos, que reúne os melhores atletas neste que e um dos maiores eventos do desporto mundial. Em competiçao teremos atletas das modalidades de Nataçao em Águas Abertas, Nataçao Artística, Saltos para a Água, Nataçao Pura e Polo Aquático.

programme.title: World Sports Championships - Pure Natation: Final and Finals / Campeonatos do Mundo de Desportos Aquáticos - Nataçao Pura: Meias-Finais e Finais
programme.desc: The city of Doha hosts the Aquatic Sports World Championship, which brings together the best athletes in this one of the largest events in the world sport. In competition we will have athletes of the modalities of swimming in open waters, artistic swimming, water jumps, pure swimming and aquatic pole. / A cidade de Doha recebe o Campeonato do Mundo de Desportos Aquáticos, que reúne os melhores atletas neste que e um dos maiores eventos do desporto mundial. Em competiçao teremos atletas das modalidades de Nataçao em Águas Abertas, Nataçao Artística, Saltos para a Água, Nataçao Pura e Polo Aquático.

programme.title: Argonauts and the gold coin / Os Argonautas e a Moeda de Ouro
programme.desc: Alba arrives in Rodas, a small fishing village, to pass the summer at his aunt Helena's house. Alba is convinced that it will be a boring and lonely summer ... I could not be more mistaken! Soon she will make new and wonderful friends: Lucas, Sali, Olivia and Nil. / Alba chega a Rodas, uma pequena vila piscatoria, para passar o verao na casa da sua tia Helena. Alba está convencida que será um verao chato e solitário... Nao poderia estar mais enganada! Em breve ela fará novos e maravilhosos amigos: Lucas, Sali, Olivia e Nil.

programme.title: Sport 2 / Desporto 2
programme.desc: Welcome to the program of modalities practiced in Portugal and abroad. / Bem-vindo ao programa das modalidades praticadas em Portugal e no estrangeiro.

programme.title: Ways / Caminhos
programme.desc: Weekly informative program dedicated to the activities of the various churches represented in Portugal. In addition to addressing the religious activities inherent to each one, "ways" also has a social concern, treating topics of interest to today's society. / Programa informativo semanal dedicado às atividades das diversas Igrejas representadas em Portugal. Para alem de abordar as atividades religiosas inerentes a cada uma, «Caminhos» tem tambem uma preocupaçao social, tratando temas de interesse para a sociedade atual.

programme.title: 70x7 / 70x7
programme.desc: Weekly updating of activities and matters related to the Catholic Church. In each episode, it presents a report that seeks signs of the religious in the human person. It seeks to expand initiatives that contribute to a life with quality and counteract what does not dignify the human person. / Atualizaçao semanal das atividades e assuntos relacionados com a igreja catolica. Em cada episodio, apresenta uma reportagem que procura sinais do religioso na pessoa humana. Procura-se ampliar iniciativas que contribuem para uma vida com qualidade e contrariar o que nao dignifica a pessoa humana.

programme.title: Family Court - Barcelona / Tribunal de Família - Barcelona
programme.desc: Lawyer Hannah Defoe and her family gather to attend the wedding of her daughter, Liv, and groom Gael, in a magnificent vineyard located in the rural area of Catalonia. / A advogada Hannah Defoe e a sua família reúnem-se para assistir ao casamento da sua filha, Liv, e do noivo Gael, numa magnífica vinha situada na zona rural da Catalunha.

programme.title: Family Court - Barcelona / Tribunal de Família - Barcelona
programme.desc: Lawyer Hannah Defoe and her family gather to attend the wedding of her daughter, Liv, and groom Gael, in a magnificent vineyard located in the rural area of Catalonia. / A advogada Hannah Defoe e a sua família reúnem-se para assistir ao casamento da sua filha, Liv, e do noivo Gael, numa magnífica vinha situada na zona rural da Catalunha.

programme.title: Bicked / Bicharada
programme.desc: Neste episode, Antonio Ripoll Vai seeks three species of flamingos. / Neste episodio, Antonio Ripoll vai procurar tres especies de flamingos.

programme.title: Sex Symbols / Sex Symbols
programme.desc: Four friends entering the pre-adolescence begins to have the first doubts about their physical changes and their sexuality. Along with them, young people will learn about sexual and emotional education through animation and entertainment. / Quatro amigos a entrar na pre-adolescencia começam a ter as primeiras dúvidas sobre as suas mudanças físicas e a sua sexualidade. Junto com eles, os jovens aprenderao sobre educaçao sexual e emocional atraves de animaçao e entretenimento.

programme.title: Bump / Bump
programme.desc: Oly returned to work for Shauna and takes a great opportunity in a conference while his colleagues are distracted. Rosa guides Seb and Liliana in some important decisions. / Oly voltou a trabalhar para Shauna e aproveita uma grande oportunidade numa conferencia enquanto os seus colegas estao distraídos. Rosa orienta Seb e Liliana em algumas decisões importantes.

programme.title: Brooklyn Bridge / Brooklyn Bridge
programme.desc: In Brooklyn of the 1950s, 14-year-old Alan Silver prepares to go to his first ball with a girl and finds herself with Benny Belinsky, her best friend. / No Brooklyn dos anos 50, Alan Silver, de 14 anos, prepara-se para ir ao seu primeiro baile com uma rapariga e desentende-se com Benny Belinsky, o seu melhor amigo.

programme.title: Journal 2 / Jornal 2
programme.desc: The world in 30 minutes. In the newspaper 2 we analyze facts and cross opinions. With each passing day we read the country and the world with data, explanations and interpretations in the most diverse areas, such as politics, science, economy and culture. / O mundo em 30 minutos. No Jornal 2 analisamos factos e cruzamos opiniões. A cada dia que passa fazemos leitura do país e do mundo com dados, explicações e interpretações nas mais diversas áreas, como Política, Ciencia, Economia e Cultura.

programme.title: 360º / 360º
programme.desc: The news seen from all angles and all points of view. In the 360º we deepen and decode events, because it is not enough to know what is happening and need to understand the reality around us. / A notícia vista de todos os ângulos e de todos os pontos de vista. No 360º aprofundamos e descodificamos os acontecimentos, porque nao basta saber o que se passa e preciso compreender a realidade à nossa volta.

programme.title: 3 at 23 / 3 às 23
programme.desc: Follow the minute the news that marks the national and world current. / Acompanhe ao minuto as notícias que marcam a atualidade nacional e mundial.

programme.title: 1979: The Year of Islamic Revolution / 1979: O Ano da Revoluçao Islâmica
programme.desc: With access to rare files, testimonials from eyewitnesses, and documents recently released by the CIA, this 2 -episodes documentary and essential for the understanding of the current medium. / Com acesso a arquivos raros, depoimentos de testemunhas oculares e documentos recentemente libertados pela CIA, este documentário de 2 episodios e essencial para a compreensao do Medio Oriente atual.

programme.title: 24 hours / 24 Horas
programme.desc: News block with a look at the ending day, clearly marking the present day of the new day that begins. In this space of information also highlight the main cultural events of the country, with the opinions of those who build them and those who were in the audience. / Bloco noticioso com um olhar para o dia que termina, marcando claramente a atualidade do novo dia que começa. Neste espaço de informaçao tem tambem destaque os principais eventos culturais do país, com as opiniões de quem os constroi e daqueles que estiveram na plateia.

programme.title: 1979: The Year of Islamic Revolution / 1979: O Ano da Revoluçao Islâmica
programme.desc: With access to rare files, testimonials from eyewitnesses, and documents recently released by the CIA, this 2 -episodes documentary and essential for the understanding of the current medium. / Com acesso a arquivos raros, depoimentos de testemunhas oculares e documentos recentemente libertados pela CIA, este documentário de 2 episodios e essencial para a compreensao do Medio Oriente atual.

programme.title: Other stories / Outras Historias
programme.sub-title: O Assombro das Palavras; Eu, meu Mestre
programme.desc: Jose Sequeira writes since childhood. Feel every word that draws on paper, such as the wooden pieces, which works with passion. Write where it fits, but not what it comes up. / Jose Sequeira escreve desde criança. Sente cada palavra que desenha no papel, tal como as peças em madeira, que trabalha com paixao. Escreve onde calha, mas nao o que calha.

programme.title: Guided tour / Visita Guiada
programme.desc: Miaa's greatest uniqueness and the huge chronological, geographical and typological arch of what it shows. Artifacts with 600,000 years found on the territory of Abrantes, irons of persia, ceramics of Egypt, vessels of the old Grecia ... / A maior singularidade do MIAA e o enorme arco cronologico, geográfico e tipologico do que mostra. Artefactos com 600 mil anos achados no territorio de Abrantes, ferros da Persia, cerâmicas do Egito, vasos da antiga Grecia...

programme.title: Front line / Linha da Frente
programme.desc: It's 10 pm and Bairro Alto is transformed into a fair. The bars compete with each other to see who sells more alcohol, challenging the boundaries of those who pass. Instead of glasses, the drinks are served in buckets. Farewells of singles, finalist trips. Lisbon and the city where you drink until falling. / Sao 10 da noite e Bairro Alto está transformado numa feira. Os bares concorrem entre si para ver quem vende mais álcool, desafiando os limites de quem passa. Em vez de copos, as bebidas sao servidas em baldes. Despedidas de solteiros, viagens de finalistas. Lisboa e a cidade onde se bebe ate cair.

programme.title: All words / Todas as Palavras
programme.desc: Ana Daniela Soares and Ines Fonseca Santos present the books and the authors who thrill us. / Ana Daniela Soares e Ines Fonseca Santos apresentam os livros e os autores que nos emocionam.

programme.title: North southern axis / Eixo Norte Sul
programme.desc: A regional information space, with reports and interviews, presented by Dina Aguiar. / Um espaço de informaçao regional, com reportagens e entrevistas, apresentado por Dina Aguiar.

programme.title: Madeira / Telejornal Madeira
programme.desc: Informative space for the spectators of the region and the Madeiran diaspora spread around the world. The television newscast of the most next television has been in the air since 1972 with a proximity information and the guarantee of quality of the public service. / Espaço informativo para os espectadores da Regiao e da diáspora madeirense espalhada pelo mundo. O Telejornal da televisao mais proxima de si está no ar desde 1972 com uma informaçao de proximidade e a garantia de qualidade do serviço público.

programme.title: Azores Telejornal 2025 / Telejornal Açores 2025
programme.desc: The updated information of the Azores - every day, live on RTP Azores. / A informaçao atualizada dos Açores - todos os dias, em direto na RTP Açores.

programme.title: Reporter Africa - 2nd Ediçao / Reporter África - 2ª Ediçao
programme.desc: Daily news, with emission live and broadcast from Monday to Friday, with news from the African continent. / Noticiário diário, com emissao em direto e transmitido de segunda a sexta, com notícias do continente africano.

programme.title: All words / Todas as Palavras
programme.desc: Ana Daniela Soares and Ines Fonseca Santos present the books and the authors who thrill us. / Ana Daniela Soares e Ines Fonseca Santos apresentam os livros e os autores que nos emocionam.

programme.title: Africa 7 days / África 7 Dias
programme.desc: On the weekend the African current spent in a 30 -minute program. Weekly news summary originated from the Africa Reporter, with the most important themes, of the various RTP delegations in Africa. / Ao fim de semana a atualidade africana passada em revista num programa de 30 minutos. Súmula de notícias semanais com origem no Reporter África, com os temas mais importantes, das diversas delegações da RTP em África.

programme.title: Indiscreet window / Janela Indiscreta
programme.desc: The indiscreet window and its movie program! It presents, in the first hand, cinematic premieres and exclusive interviews with the protagonists of national and international productions, making known curiosities and backstage stories. / O Janela Indiscreta e o seu programa de cinema! Apresenta, em primeira mao, estreias cinematográficas e entrevistas exclusivas aos protagonistas das produções nacionais e internacionais, dando a conhecer curiosidades e historias de bastidores.

programme.title: Good morning Portugal weekend / Bom Dia Portugal Fim de Semana
programme.desc: Space in which the news of the national and international today, sports, meteorology, traffic and economy in the mornings of its weekend is highlighted. / Espaço em que se dá relevo às notícias da atualidade nacional e internacional, desporto, meteorologia, trânsito e economia nas manhas do seu fim de semana.

programme.title: The grand ludopedium encyclopedia / A Grandiosa Enciclopedia do Ludopedio
programme.desc: It was precisely 100 years ago that Portugal debuted as a selection in a "private" against Spain, with a defeat to the 3-1 Lusitanian colors. Here in the grandiose we mark the date with one of the most prominent scorers in the history of the National Selection: Pedro Pauleta, the "Cyclone of the Azores". / Foi há precisamente 100 anos que Portugal se estreou como Seleçao num "particular" frente à Espanha, com uma derrota para as cores lusitanas por 3-1. programme.title: The rest and landscape / O Resto e Paisagem
programme.desc: The rest is a landscape and a documentary series that leads us to know the unusual scripts of a country rich in history, places and curiosities. Jose Sá Fernandes and the host of a trip that will lead us to travel from Portugal from North to South, from Arcos de Valdevez to Odivelas. / O Resto É Paisagem e uma serie documental que nos leva a conhecer os roteiros incomuns de um país rico em historia, lugares e curiosidades. Jose Sá Fernandes e o host de uma viagem que nos vai levar a percorrer Portugal de norte a sul, de Arcos de Valdevez a Odivelas.

programme.title: 1000 x Camilo / 1000 x Camilo
programme.desc: Beginning in biography, we will go through the professional, romanticism, the port, the polemist, the satire and their obsession with death, among many other themes. And we will talk to names like Isabel Pires de Lima, Mário Claudio, Manuel Sobrinho Simões, Julio Machado Vaz or Rita Blanco. / Começando na biografia, percorreremos o profissional, o romantismo, o Porto, o polemista, a sátira e a sua obsessao pela morte, entre tantos outros temas. E falaremos com nomes como Isabel Pires de Lima, Mário Cláudio, Manuel Sobrinho Simões, Júlio Machado Vaz ou Rita Blanco.

programme.title: Cesson vs PSG - NNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue / Cesson vs PSG - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. programme.desc: National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing or Abbreviated NASCAR is the most famous automotive organization under whose ingress and strict rules are organized by car racing. Under the NASCAR organization, a large number of races and runways all over the world. So the most popular races are divided by series, and these are Sprint Cup Series, then Xfinitiy Series and the third most important Camping World Truck Series. / National Association for Stock Car Auto Racing ili skraćeno NASCAR je najpoznatija automobilska organizacija pod čijom ingerencijom i strogim pravilima se organizuju auto trke. Pod NASCAR organizacijom pripada veliki broj trka i pista po celom svetu. Tako da su najpopularnije trke podeljene po serijama, a to su Sprint Cup Series, potom Xfinitiy Series i treća najznačanija Camping World Truck Series.

programme.title: Handball - Super League: Red Star - Partizan / Rukomet - Super liga: Crvena zvezda - Partizan
programme.desc: The Serbian Handball Support was formed in 2006. after the disintegration of the Joint State of Serbia and Montenegro and disbanding the former Super League of Serbia and Montenegro. Until 2019. year, the League managed the Handball Federation of Serbia. After that, the League organization has taken over the SUPER LEGA HANDFACTS Association. The most titles (nine) has RK Vojvodina. / Rukometna Superliga Srbije je formirana 2006. nakon raspada zajedničke države Srbije i Crne Gore i rasformiranja bivše Superlige Srbije i Crne Gore. Do 2019. godine ligom je rukovodio Rukometni savez Srbije. Nakon toga, organizaciju lige je preuzela Asocijacija rukometnih klubova superlige. Najviše titula (devet) ima RK Vojvodina.

programme.title: Basketball - Radivoja Koraca Cup: Partizan - Mega, Semifinals 2 / Košarka - Kup Radivoja Koraća: Partizan - Mega, polufinale 2
programme.desc: Radivoje Korać Cup is the official name of the National Basketball Cup of Serbia. He received his name in honor of Radivoje Korać, the former Yugoslav national team player, who killed in 1969. in a traffic accident near Sarajevo. / Kup Radivoja Koraća je zvanični naziv nacionalnog košarkaškog kupa Srbije. Ime je dobio u čast Radivoja Koraća, bivšeg jugoslovenskog reprezentativca, koji je poginuo 1969. u saobraćajnoj nesreći blizu Sarajeva.

programme.title: Football - Mozzart Bet Superliga: Red Star - Javor / Fudbal - Mozzart Bet Superliga: Crvena zvezda - Javor
programme.desc: The Serbian Super League has had its premiere in the 2006/2007 season. In today's league system, there are 20 teams and functions on the sub-circuit principle of competition. The history of the Super League was largely marked by two large Belgrade Rivals, Partizan and Red Star. Historically, according to the number of titles, the Red-White Titles to the city is more successful. / Srpska Superliga svoju premijeru imala je u sezoni 2006./2007. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 20 ekipa i funkcioniše po dvokružnom principu takmičenju. Istoriju Superlige u najvećoj meri su obeležila dva velika beogradska rivala, Partizan i Crvena zvezda. Istorijski gledano, po broju osvojenih titula crveno-beli do grada je uspešniji.

programme.desc: The highest independent club basketball ranking women's basketball is launched as most competitions in Serbia in 2006. years after the disintegration of the Serbian and Montenegro community. The competition takes place in two parts. The first part is the so-called regular part where each team plays with each and based on the end result is determined by which teams will enter the next phase of the Plejof. Behavihood Women's basketball in this part of Europe will surely attract your attention! Don't miss! / Najviši samostalni klupski košarkaški rang ženske košarke pokrenut je kao i većina takmičenja u Srbiji 2006. godine nakon raspada zajednice Srbije i Crne Gore. Takmičenje se odvija u dva dela. Prvi deo je takozvani regularni deo u kojem se igra liga u kojoj svaka ekipa igra sa svakom i na temelju krajnjeg rezultata se određuje koje ekipe će ući u sledeću fazu plejof. programme.title: Football - Friendly match: Borussia Dortmund - Lille / Fudbal - Prijateljska utakmica: Borussia Dortmund - Lille
programme.desc: The club seasons in most world leagues are divided into two parts, autumn and spring. At the time of the summer and winter, the clubs are in the preparatory period and a heavy rhythm of the training are complemented by playing preparatory friendly matches. Friendly encounters are a great way to examine the current team of teams and digesting different tactical variants for the upcoming official matches. / Klupske sezone u većini svetskih liga podeljene su u dva dela, jesenski i prolećni. U vreme leta i zime klubovi su u pripremnom periodu i težak ritam treninga upotpunjuju odigravanjem pripremnih prijateljskih utakmica. Prijateljski susreti su odličan način za ispitivanje trenutne snage ekipa i probavanje različitih taktičkih varijanti za nadolazeće zvanične utakmice.

programme.title: NBA Chasing History / NBA Chasing History
programme.desc: Emission dedicated to the NBA league. Learn all the interesting things about this prestigious competition, discover details recently completed matches and get to know your favorite players from a little different angle. / Emisija posvećena NBA ligi. Saznajte sve zanimljivostima o ovom prestižnom takmičenju, otkrijte detalje nedavno završenih utakmica i upoznajte omiljene igrače iz malo drugačijeg ugla.

programme.title: Košarka: NBA - The Best of / Košarka: NBA - The Best of
programme.desc: The sixth day of June of June 1946. years will change the basketball game forever. On that day in New York, the most elite world basketball competition, the NBA league was founded. 29 Teams from the US and one from Canada Each autumn begins the hunt for the legendary ring intended for the Champions of the NBA league. The teams are divided into an east and western conference and through 82 regular season, the regular season hunting one of the eight playoff positions. Conference champions are entering the large NBA final where in a series of a maximum of seven games decide on the new champion. The NBA final is one of the most accurate sports events of the year that delights all basketball lovers. / Šesti dan juna meseca davne 1946. godine zauvek će promeniti košarkašku igru. Tog dana u Njujorku osnovano je najelitnije svetsko košarkaško takmičenje, NBA liga. 29 ekipa iz SAD-a i jedna iz Kanade svaku jesen počinje lov na legendarni prsten namenjen prvaku NBA lige. Ekipe su podeljene na istočnu i zapadnu konferenciju te kroz 82 utakmice regularne sezone love jednu od osam pozicija za doigravanje. Konferencijski prvaci ulaze u veliko NBA finale gde u seriji od maksimalno sedam utakmica odlučuju o novom prvaku. NBA finale je jedno od najpraćenijih sportskih događaja godine koje oduševljava sve košarkaške zaljubljenike.

programme.title: Football - Poland League: Brook-bet Thermalica - Drive / Fudbal - Poljska liga: Bruk-Bet Termalica - Pogon
programme.desc: Ekstraklasa is the highest professional football league of Poland. The first league of Poland in football was founded in 1927. years. This league is organized by the Football Association of Poland (PZPN). Currently, 16 teams participate in the league. The champion directly wins the title of the Polish champion. The number of teams changed with years, the 90s participated in 18 and in the 30s only 10. / Ekstraklasa je najviša profesionalna fudbalska liga Poljske. Prva liga Poljske u fudbalu, osnovana je 1927. godine. Ovu ligu organizuje Fudbalski savez Poljske (PZPN). Trenutno, u ligi učestvuje 16 ekipa. Prvak direktno osvaja titulu poljskog šampiona. Broj ekipa se sa godinama menjao, 90-ih učestvovalo ih je 18, a 30-ih samo 10.

programme.title: Football - Mozzart Bet Superliga: OFK Beograd - Javor / Fudbal - Mozzart Bet Superliga: OFK Beograd - Javor
programme.desc: The Serbian Super League has had its premiere in the 2006/2007 season. In today's league system, there are 20 teams and functions on the sub-circuit principle of competition. The history of the Super League was largely marked by two large Belgrade Rivals, Partizan and Red Star. Historically, according to the number of titles, the Red-White Titles to the city is more successful. / Srpska Superliga svoju premijeru imala je u sezoni 2006./2007. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 20 ekipa i funkcioniše po dvokružnom principu takmičenju. Istoriju Superlige u najvećoj meri su obeležila dva velika beogradska rivala, Partizan i Crvena zvezda. Istorijski gledano, po broju osvojenih titula crveno-beli do grada je uspešniji.

programme.title: F1 Hungaroring: Qualifying / F1 Hungaroring: Kvalifikacije
programme.desc: The Grand Award of Hungary is an integral part of the World Cup in Formula 1. This is a competition that is held every year on the Hungaroring, located near Budapest. / Velika nagrada Mađarske je sastavni deo Svetskog prvenstva u Formuli 1. programme.title: Healthy sport zone / Zona zdravog sporta
programme.desc: Get to know the outdoor sports, and people who are involved in them. In order to play these sports, it takes good physical fitness, but often the love of nature. / Upoznajte sportove na otvorenom, i ljude koji se bave njima. Za bavljenje ovim sportovima potrebna je dobra fizička sprema, ali često i ljubav prema prirodi.

programme.title: Volleyball - Russian League: Dinamo -Lo - Dynamo Moscow / Odbojka - Ruska liga: Dinamo-Lo - Dynamo Moscow
programme.desc: The Russian league in volleyball is the highest rank, professional, volleyball competition in this country. The competition was first played in 1992. years, and is considered to continue the Soviet most league, which was founded in 1933. years. / Ruska liga u odbojci je najviši rang, profesionalnog, odbojkaškog takmičenja u ovoj zemlji. Takmičenje je prvi put odigrano 1992. godine, a smatra se nastavkom sovjetske najviše lige koja je osnovana 1933. godine.

programme.title: Volleyball - Russian League: Locomotive - Belogorie / Odbojka - Ruska liga: Lokomotiv - Belogorie
programme.desc: The Russian league in volleyball is the highest rank, professional, volleyball competition in this country. The competition was first played in 1992. years, and is considered to continue the Soviet most league, which was founded in 1933. years. / Ruska liga u odbojci je najviši rang, profesionalnog, odbojkaškog takmičenja u ovoj zemlji. programme.title: Hokej - KHL: Salavat Yulaev - Spartak, G5 / Hokej - KHL: Salavat Yulaev - Spartak, G5
programme.desc: The strongest hockey hockey competition in Europe and Asia is called KHL or a continental hockey league. Only the competition was created from the Russian Super League in 2008. And since then the competition is spreading to increasingly European and Asian countries and thus becomes an unofficial other Hockey League of the world after the American-Canadian NLA. At the end of the season, the winner of the KHL Plejofa received a prestigious Gagarin Cup, while the best placed the Russian team wins the title of Russia Champions. Since 2011. The League except the clubs from the former USSR includes clubs from Central Europe, while since 2016. One Chinese representative enters first. / Najjače hokejaško takmičenje u hokeju na području Evrope i Azije zove se KHL ili Kontinentalna Hokejaška Liga. Samo takmičenje je nastalo iz ruske Superlige 2008. godine i od tada se takmičenje širi na sve više evropskih i azijskih zemalja i tako postaje neslužbeno druga najbolja hokejaška liga sveta nakon američko-kanadskog NHLa. Na kraju sezone pobednik KHL plejofa dobija prestižni Gagarin Kup, dok najbolje plasirana Ruska ekipa osvaja titulu šampiona Rusije. Od 2011. ligu osim klubova iz bivšeg SSSR-a ulaze klubovi iz centralne Evrope, dok od 2016. po prvi put ulazi i jedan Kineski predstavnik.

programme.title: Basketball - VTB League: UNICS - CSKA / Košarka - VTB liga: UNICS - CSKA
programme.desc: The VTB league brings together the best basketball clubs from Eastern and Northern Europe. With the dominant Russian clubs in the league, clubs from Belarus, Estonia, Kazakh and Latvia are also attended. Through the history of the League launched in 2008. More clubs from Lithuania and Ukraine were also involved. Starting from the season 2013-204. The VTB League is also the national championship for Russian clubs, from which the champion of Russia becomes best. In order for clubs to access the league must have a minimum capacity hall for 3000 viewers. The name of the VTB league comes from the General Sponsor of the League of the VTB Bank. FIBA Europe is 2013 officially recognized the league. / VTB liga okuplja ponajbolje košarkaške klubove iz Istočne i Severne Evrope. Uz dominantno ruske klubove u ligi prisustvuju još i klubovi iz Belorusije, Estonije, Kazahstana i Letonije. Kroz istoriju lige koja je pokrenuta 2008. godine sudelovali su još klubovi iz Litvanije i Ukrajine. Počevši od sezone 2013.-2014. VTB liga je ujedno i nacionalno prvenstvo za ruske klubove, od kojih najbolje plasirani postaje prvak Rusije. Kako bi klubovi pristupili ligi moraju imati dvoranu minimalnog kapaciteta za 3000 gledaoca. Naziv VTB lige potiče od generalnog sponzora lige VTB banke. FIBA Evropa je 2013. službeno prepoznala ligu.
