programme.desc: Follow the matches of the Russian beach volleyball championship! This competition in the existing format is held starting in 1992. years. / Pratite mečeve ruskog prvenstva u odbojci za žene! Ovo takmičenje u postojećem formatu održava se počevši od 1992. godine.

programme.title: Volleyball - Russian League: Zenit - Dynamo -Lo / Odbojka - Ruska liga: Zenit - Dinamo-LO
programme.desc: The Russian league in volleyball is the highest rank, professional, volleyball competition in this country. The competition was first played in 1992. years, and is considered to continue the Soviet most league, which was founded in 1933. years. / Ruska liga u odbojci je najviši rang, profesionalnog, odbojkaškog takmičenja u ovoj zemlji. Takmičenje je prvi put odigrano 1992. godine, a smatra se nastavkom sovjetske najviše lige koja je osnovana 1933. godine.

programme.title: Hockey - KHL: Lokomotiv - Salavat, PF1 G5 / Hokej - KHL: Lokomotiv - Salavat, PF1 G5
programme.desc: The strongest hockey hockey competition in Europe and Asia is called KHL or a continental hockey league. Only the competition was created from the Russian Super League in 2008. And since then the competition is spreading to increasingly European and Asian countries and thus becomes an unofficial other Hockey League of the world after the American-Canadian NLA. At the end of the season, the winner of the KHL Plejofa received a prestigious Gagarin Cup, while the best placed the Russian team wins the title of Russia Champions. Since 2011. The League except the clubs from the former USSR includes clubs from Central Europe, while since 2016. One Chinese representative enters first. / Najjače hokejaško takmičenje u hokeju na području Evrope i Azije zove se KHL ili Kontinentalna Hokejaška Liga. Samo takmičenje je nastalo iz ruske Superlige 2008. godine i od tada se takmičenje širi na sve više evropskih i azijskih zemalja i tako postaje neslužbeno druga najbolja hokejaška liga sveta nakon američko-kanadskog NHLa. Na kraju sezone pobednik KHL plejofa dobija prestižni Gagarin Kup, dok najbolje plasirana Ruska ekipa osvaja titulu šampiona Rusije. Od 2011. ligu osim klubova iz bivšeg SSSR-a ulaze klubovi iz centralne Evrope, dok od 2016. po prvi put ulazi i jedan Kineski predstavnik.

programme.title: Football - Mozzart Bet Superliga: Mladost - Radnik / Fudbal - Mozzart Bet Superliga: Mladost - Radnik
programme.desc: The Serbian Super League has had its premiere in the 2006/2007 season. In today's league system, there are 20 teams and functions on the sub-circuit principle of competition. The history of the Super League was largely marked by two large Belgrade Rivals, Partizan and Red Star. Historically, according to the number of titles, the Red-White Titles to the city is more successful. / Srpska Superliga svoju premijeru imala je u sezoni 2006./2007. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 20 ekipa i funkcioniše po dvokružnom principu takmičenju. Istoriju Superlige u najvećoj meri su obeležila dva velika beogradska rivala, Partizan i Crvena zvezda. Istorijski gledano, po broju osvojenih titula crveno-beli do grada je uspešniji.

programme.title: Car mobile / Mobil Auto
programme.desc: A show that is a real treat for all car lovers. programme.title: Healthy sport zone / Zona zdravog sporta
programme.desc: Get to know the outdoor sports, and people who are involved in them. In order to play these sports, it takes good physical fitness, but often the love of nature. / Upoznajte sportove na otvorenom, i ljude koji se bave njima. programme.title: Fudbal - Ruska Liga: Nizhny Novgorod - Lokomotiv / Fudbal - Ruska liga: Nizhny Novgorod - Lokomotiv
programme.desc: The Russian Football League recorded his competition beginnings since 1936. Even though soccer in the federal area played since 1900. The most successful team during that time is Moscow Spartak Although the beginning of the second part of the century is more successful clubs like CSKA Moscow and Zenith from St. Petersburg. League until the season 2012/2013. She played in the period spring - autumn for a long winter and has been played classically European autumn since then. Great financial investments in Russian football clubs have much closer to the league at the UEFINE LEASTICS of the first league coefficients in force in Europe. / Ruska fudbalska liga kao naslednik Sovjetskog saveza beleži svoje takmičarske početke od 1936. godine iako se fudbal na području saveza igrao još od 1900ih. Najuspješnija ekipa za to vreme je Moskovski Spartak iako od početka drugog dela veka uspješniji su klubovi poput CSKA Moskve i Zenita iz St. Petersburga. Liga se sve do sezone 2012./2013. igrala u terminu proleće - jesen zbog dugačke zime te se od tada igra klasično evropski jesen - proleće. Velika finansijska ulaganja u ruske fudbalske klubove jako su približili ligu na Uefinoj lestvici koeficijenata prvih liga po snazi u Evropi.

programme.title: Football - Croatia League: Rijeka - Lokomotiva / Fudbal - Hrvatska liga: Rijeka - Lokomotiva
programme.desc: The Croatian football league was founded in 1992. year and the first historical title won Split Hajduk. Through years, the competition system and the number of clubs changed but in recent years, today's system with 10 teams and the four-circular form of the competition. The transition cup intended for the champion is the work of the academic sculptor Marijana Earth. He won him in Zagreb Dinamo mostly. The absolute recorder in the number of favorites achieved is the legend of Varteks Davor Vugrinec with 144 goals. / Hrvatska fudbalska liga osnovana je 1992. godine i prvu istorijsku titulu je osvojio splitski Hajduk. Kroz godine sistem takmičenja i broj klubova se menjao ali poslednjih godina ustalio se današnji sistem sa 10 ekipa i četverokružnim oblikom takmičenja. Prelazni kup namenjen prvaku delo je akademskog kipara Marijana Zaradića. Najviše puta osvajao ga je zagrebački Dinamo. Apsolutni rekorder po broju postignutih pogodaka legenda je Varteksa Davor Vugrinec sa 144 gola.

programme.desc: The show in which we will introduce you to inspiring stories about athletes and the path to success from the angle of their fathers! programme.title: Basketball - ABA League: Mega Superbet - Cedevita Olympia / Košarka - ABA liga: Mega Superbet - Cedevita Olimpija
programme.desc: The ABA League was established by the best basketball clubs from Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, Croatia, Serbia and Slovenia. As such consists of clubs from the space of the former SFRY and representatives of Hungary, Bulgaria, Israel and the Czech Republic were still involved in it. On several occasions, it also changed the name depending on the sponsor, and today is the official name of Adriatic Basketball Association (ABA) League. The competition is played in two parts, the first part takes place by playing two games, each, with each, one on the domestic terrain and one on the guest field, ie along the two-circular league system. The second part of the competition or playoff differs from season to season. / ABA liga je osnovana od strane najboljih košarkaških klubova iz Bosne i Hercegovine, Crne Gore, Hrvatske, Srbije i Slovenije. Kao takva sastoji se od klubova sa prostora bivše SFRJ te su u njoj još učestvovali predstavnici Mađarske, Bugarske, Izraela i Češke. U nekoliko navrata je menjala i naziv u zavisnosti od sponzora, a danas joj je službeni naziv Adriatic Basketball Association (ABA) League. Takmičenje se igra u dva dela, prvi deo se odvija tako što sve ekipe igraju po dve utakmice, svako, sa svakim, jednu na domaćem terenu i jednu na gostujućem terenu, odnosno po dvokružnom liga sistemu. Drugi deo takmičenja odnosno plejof se razlikuje od sezone do sezone.

programme.title: Football: Wwin League BiH: Zrinjski - Sarajevo - Postponed / Fudbal: WWIN Liga BIH: Zrinjski - Sarajevo - odložena
programme.desc: Founded in 2000. The Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina is the highest ranking of the football competition in BiH. The entrance of the cubes from the Republika Srpska two years later received a format with 16 clubs in the two-circular competition system. Today, 12 teams competed in the league, which has been divided into league after the 22-year-in-law and the league for survival. The first historical champion of BiH was a leotar from Trebinje. The club with the most conquered championship titles is Zrinjski from Mostar. The largest European success is the placement of the railway worker in the UEFA Cup semifinals in 1984. Years. / Osnovana 2000. godine Premijer liga Bosne i Hercegovine najviši je rang fudbalskog takmičenja u BiH. Ulaskom kubova iz Republike Srpske dve godine kasnije liga dobija format sa 16 klubova u dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. Danas se u ligi takmiči 12 ekipa koje se nakon 22 odigrana kola dele na Ligu za prvaka i Ligu za opstanak. Prvi istorijski prvak BiH bio je Leotar iz Trebinja. Klub sa najviše osvojenih titula prvaka je Zrinjski iz Mostara. Najveći evropski uspeh je plasman Željezničara u polufinale kupa UEFA 1984. godine.

programme.title: They live for football / Oni žive za fudbal
programme.desc: The show for all lovers of this sport, which are fed up with industrial, high-cost football, for those who are a lot of tacticals and games without goals. The show will follow the matches played in the third rank of the football competition in Serbia. Every week we will present one match from all four groups of Serbian leagues, we will hear interesting interviews and see interesting attachments. / Emisija za sve ljubitelje ovog sporta, koji su se zasitili industrijskog, visokobudžetnog fudbala, za one kojima je dosta taktiziranja i utakmica bez golova. Emisija će pratiti utakmice koje se igraju u trećem rangu fudbalskog takmičenja u Srbiji. Svake nedelje predstavićemo po jednu utakmicu iz sve četiri grupe srpske lige, čućemo zanimljive intervjue i videti interesantne priloge.

programme.title: Football - English League: Newcastle - Chelsea / Fudbal - Engleska liga: Newcastle - Chelsea
programme.desc: Every August 20 team begins hunting at the most respected trophy of English football. The English Premier in the format in which the game was founded in 1992. As a continuation of the English League founded back in 1888. The season lasts to May in the two-circular system where each team plays 38 games. The first winter of the championship is the most trophy English football club, Manchester United. Being a champion of England is a goal that weighs every player of the Premier League. / Svakog avgusta 20 ekipa započinje lov na najcenjeniji trofej engleskog fudbala. Engleska Premier liga u formatu u kojem se danas igra osnovana je 1992. godine kao nastavak na Englesku ligu osnovanu davne 1888. Sezona traje do maja u dvokružnom sistemu gde svaka ekipa kroz sezonu odigra 38 utakmica. Prvi osvajač prvenstva je najtrofejniji engleski fudbalski klub, Mančester Junajted. Biti prvak Engleske je cilj kojem teži svaki igrač Premier lige.

programme.title: Football - FA Cup: Crystal Palace - Manchester City, Finals / Fudbal - FA kup: Crystal Palace - Manchester City, finale
programme.desc: The FA Cup begins with its football tradition Back 1871. year as the first competition in the world organized by a soccer organization. All professional football clubs in England are participating in this competition as well as a large number of amateur clubs until 10. English football. The matches play in the knockout system on a single match where the host is determined by a draw with no holder. Clubs from the higher leagues are included in the later stages of the competition. The finals played in London at Vembla Stadium and the winner ensures the performance in the UEFA Europa League. / FA kup započinje sa svojom fudbalskom tradicijom davne 1871. godine kao prvo takmičenje na svetu koje je organizovala neka fudbalska organizacija. U ovom takmičenju učestvuju svi profesionalni fudbalski klubovi u Engleskoj kao i veliki broj amaterskih klubova sve do 10. ranga engleskog fudbala. Utakmice se igraju u nokaut sistemu na jednu dobijenu utakmicu gde je domaćin određen žrebom pri čemu nema nosioca. Klubovi iz viših liga se uključuju u kasnijim fazama takmičenja. Finale se igra u Londonu na stadionu Vembli te pobednik osigurava nastup u UEFA Ligi Evrope.

programme.title: FBBAL - Spanish League: Betis - Atletico Madrid / Fudbal - Španska liga: Betis - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: Primera or popular La Liga is the first Spanish football league. With as many as 22 conquered titles of the European Primary Champion, the Spanish Primera for years are considered the best European football league. Founded in 1929. year, the example counts 20 teams that in 38 cars are trying to collect the largest number of points. This is the most path set after the hand of Madrid Real, while the other is the most successful Team of Barcelona. With top teams of Spanish league, it adorns and extremely technical mentality of the game mostly clubs with the aim of overcoming opponents. / Primera ili popularno La Liga prva je španska fudbalska liga. Sa čak 22 osvojene titule prvaka Evrope španska Primera godinama se smatra najboljom evropskom fudbalskom ligom. Osnovana 1929. godine, Primera broji 20 ekipa koje u 38 kola sezone pokušavaju skupiti najveći broj bodova. To je najviše puta pošlo za rukom madridskom Realu dok je druga najuspešnija ekipa Barselona. Uz vrhunske ekipe špansku ligu krasi i izrazito tehnički mentalitet igre većine klubova sa ciljem za nadigravanjem protivnika.

programme.title: Football - Italian League: Juventus - Lazio / Fudbal - Italijanska liga: Juventus - Lazio
programme.desc: Seria A is a professional football competition that counts 20 teams in the two-circular league championship. Since 1929, when she was founded, Seria and she became synonymous with tactical football. For many years, Italian football was considered the best in Europe with its quality and a series of great players and coaches. / Seria A je profesionalno fudbalsko takmičenje koje broji 20 ekipa u dvokružnom ligaškom prvenstvu. Još od 1929. godine kada je osnovana, Seria A postala je sinonim za taktički fudbal. programme.title: Football - French League: Rennes - Monaco / Fudbal - Francuska liga: Rennes - Monaco
programme.desc: Ligue 1 The first is the French professional football league that has 20 teams in the fight for the title of France champions. It was founded in 1932. years and is considered one of the most respected European leagues. The most trophy club with ten won titles is AS Saint Etienne but the green on the new title is waiting since 1981. years and the times of the Great Michel Platini. The encounters of the French league are an unavoidable event for every lover of this magnificent game. / Ligue 1 prva je francuska profesionalna fudbalska liga koja broji 20 ekipa u borbi za titulom prvaka Francuske. Osnovana je 1932. godine i smatra se jednom od najcenjenijih evropskih liga. programme.title: Football - UEFA League Conference: Fiorentina - Lask / Fudbal - UEFA Liga konferencija: Fiorentina - LASK
programme.desc: From 2021. Years of football lovers enjoy the League of the Conference organized by UEFA. The idea for her appeared in 2015. years, and includes lower ranked teams of state championships. The qualifications are divided into two parts, after which 32 teams that are divided into eight groups are entered in the competition. 16 teams progresses in the eighth final, then quarterfinals, semifinals and finals. / Od 2021. godine ljubitelji fudbala uživaju u Ligi konferencija koju organizuje UEFA. Ideja za nju pojavila se 2015. godine, a uključuje niže rangirane timove državnih prvenstava. Kvalifikacije su podeljene u dva dela, nakon kojih u takmičenje ulaze 32 tima koji su podeljeni u osam grupa po četiri. 16 timova napreduje u osminu finala, zatim četvrtfinale, polufinale i finale.

programme.title: Football - Europa League / Fudbal - Liga Evrope
programme.desc: The second most prestigious club football competition in Europe is officially under the auspices of the European Football Federation of UEFE since 1971. years. The unofficial predecessor of this competition was a cup of fair cities that played since 1955. until 1971. years. From that season, the competition is officially called the UEFA Cup and is under that name until 2009. when it was renamed to the UEFA Europa League. Over the years, the competition format itself changed several times, and from the 2004/2005 season. A group phase was introduced after which the elimination follow. The trophy itself for the winner of this competition was designed in 1972. for the UEFA Cup final by the Italian artist Bertoni and each year is awarded to the winner who keeps him a year. / Drugo najprestižnije klupsko fudbalsko takmičenje u Evropi je službeno pod okriljem Evropske fudbalske federacije UEFE od 1971. godine. Neslužbeni prethodnik ovog takmičenja je bio Kup velesajamskih gradova koji se igrao od 1955. do 1971. godine. Od te sezone takmičenje se službeno zove Kup Uefa i pod tim nazivom je sve do 2009. kada je preimenovano u Uefa Ligu Evrope. Tokom godina se sam format takmičenja nekoliko puta menjao, a od sezone 2004./2005. uvedena je grupna faza nakon koje slede eliminacije. Sam trofej za pobednika ovog takmičenja dizajniran je 1972. za finale Kupa Uefa od strane italijanskog umetnika Bertonija i svake godine se dodeljuje pobedniku koji ga čuva godinu dana.

programme.title: Football - Champions League: PSG - Aston Villa / Fudbal - Liga šampiona: PSG - Aston Villa
programme.desc: At the proposal of the French journalist Gabriela Hanot in 1955. The Champion Cup was established, the annual continental competition in which only the champions of their states are performed. The media popularization of this format in 1992. The UEFA Champions League, competition for all the best clubs of Europe was established. The placement in the Champions League Clubs achieve a result in the league competitions of its state. The Champions League finals became a television the most watched football event on the planet. The most conquered titles of the Champions of Europe has Madrid Giant Real. / Na predlog francuskog novinara Gabriela Hanota 1955. godine osnovan je Kup prvaka, godišnje kontinentalno takmičenje u kojem nastupaju samo prvaci svojih država. Medijskom popularizacijom ovog formata 1992. godine osnovana je UEFA Liga šampiona, takmičenje za sve najbolje klubove Evrope. Plasman u Ligu šampiona klubovi ostvaruju rezultatom na ligaškim takmičenjima svoje države. Finale Lige šampiona postalo je televizijski najgledaniji fudbalski događaj na planeti. programme.title: Football: Wwin Liga BiH: Rudar - Široki Brijeg / Fudbal: WWIN Liga BIH: Rudar - Široki Brijeg
programme.desc: Founded in 2000. The Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina is the highest ranking of the football competition in BiH. The entrance of the cubes from the Republika Srpska two years later received a format with 16 clubs in the two-circular competition system. Today, 12 teams competed in the league, which has been divided into league after the 22-year-in-law and the league for survival. The first historical champion of BiH was a leotar from Trebinje. The club with the most conquered championship titles is Zrinjski from Mostar. The largest European success is the placement of the railway worker in the UEFA Cup semifinals in 1984. Years. / Osnovana 2000. godine Premijer liga Bosne i Hercegovine najviši je rang fudbalskog takmičenja u BiH. Ulaskom kubova iz Republike Srpske dve godine kasnije liga dobija format sa 16 klubova u dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. Danas se u ligi takmiči 12 ekipa koje se nakon 22 odigrana kola dele na Ligu za prvaka i Ligu za opstanak. Prvi istorijski prvak BiH bio je Leotar iz Trebinja. Klub sa najviše osvojenih titula prvaka je Zrinjski iz Mostara. Najveći evropski uspeh je plasman Željezničara u polufinale kupa UEFA 1984. godine.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Real Madrid - Olympiacos, G4 / Košarka - Euroleague: Real Madrid - Olympiacos, G4
programme.desc: The Euroleague is a competition that started its journey into the world of European basketball under the name Cup of European Champions in 1958. years, and the first trophy won the KSK Riga team from the then USSR and today's Latvia. This competition is certainly a recommendation to all lovers of quality women's volleyball! / Rastom popularnosti odbojke u Evropi i žene su dobile najjače klupsko odbojkaško takmičenje pod nazivom Kup Prvaka godinu nakon svojih muških kolega 1961. godine. Kao i u muškoj odbojci istorija beleži dominaciju ruskih klubova u doba SSSR-a čiji broj osvojenih trofeja premašuje broj 20. Prve pobednice ovog popularnog takmičenja pod novim imenom Lige šampiona su bile odbojkašice iz italijanske Modene. Prve pobednice ovog takmičenja uopšte bile su odbojkašice Dinama iz Moskve. Ovo takmičenje je svakako preporuka svim ljubiteljima kvalitetne ženske odbojke!

programme.title: RUKOMET - EHF League Evrope: Toulouse - Porto / Rukomet - EHF Liga Evrope: Toulouse - Porto
programme.desc: EHF Cup How else by importance, competition for male handball clubs in Europe begins in 1993. years. Until then, this competition was called the IHF Cup that did its first season in the 1981-1982 season. Since 2012. The EHF Cup was connected by the former EHF Cup Cup Cup Cup. The competition as well as the Champions League consists of the part where clubs play by groups and the best goes to Knock Out stage. After the quarterfinals in two matches between the opponents, the Final Four follows. The semifinals and finals as well as the match for the third place are played on one game obtained. / EHF kup kako drugo po važnosti takmičenje za muške rukometne klubove u Evropi svoj put započinje 1993. godine. Do tada se ovo takmičenje nazivalo IHF kup koje je svoju prvu sezonu odradilo u sezoni 1981.-1982. Od 2012. godine EHF kupu je priključen nekadašnji EHF Kup pobednika kupova. Takmičenje se kao i Liga šampiona sastoji od dela gde klubovi igraju po grupama i najbolji prolazi u knock out fazu. Nakon četvrtfinala na dve utakmice između protivnika sledi final four. Polufinale i finale kao i utakmica za treće mesto se igraju na jednu dobijenu utakmicu.

programme.title: Handball: Bundesliga - Never Stop / Rukomet: Bundesliga - Never stop
programme.desc: In recent years, the popularity of handball in Germany is continuously growing. This issue is dedicated to professionals who managed to achieve the children's dreams and achieve great successes on the handball field. Thanks to interviews, archival recordings and photographs, viewers have the opportunity to learn that the challenges faced the handball players that now bodle fans from all over the world! / Poslednjih nekoliko godina, popularnost rukometa u Nemačkoj kontinuirano raste. Ova emisija posvećena je profesionalcima koji su uspeli da ostvare dečačke snove i postignu velike uspehe na rukometnom terenu. Zahvaljujući intervjuima, arhivskim snimcima i fotografijama, gledaoci imaju priliku da saznaju sa kojim su se sve izazovima suočavali rukometaši koje sada bodre navijači iz celog sveta!

programme.title: Handball: Bundesliga - Never Stop / Rukomet: Bundesliga - Never stop
programme.desc: In recent years, the popularity of handball in Germany is continuously growing. This issue is dedicated to professionals who managed to achieve the children's dreams and achieve great successes on the handball field. Thanks to interviews, archival recordings and photographs, viewers have the opportunity to learn that the challenges faced the handball players that now bodle fans from all over the world! / Poslednjih nekoliko godina, popularnost rukometa u Nemačkoj kontinuirano raste. programme.title: Handball - Germany League: Fuchse Berlin - Melsungen / Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Fuchse Berlin - Melsungen
programme.desc: Handball Bundesliga is the highest rank of handball competitions in Germany. In addition to the Spanish League, the Bundesliga is considered the best European league. It was founded in 1965. as a separate competition of northern and southern regions. Only since 1977. acts as a unique competition. Currently counts 19 teams in the two-circular competition system. The most won titles are counted by the Kil Handball Club. High quality handball games and filled forums are the reason why Bundesliga is so accompanied all over the world. / Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang rukometnih takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Uz špansku ligu Bundesliga se smatra najboljom evropskom ligom. Osnovana je 1965. godine kao odvojeno takmičenje severne i južne regije. Tek od 1977. deluje kao jedinstveno takmičenje. Trenutno broji 19 ekipa u dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. Najviše osvojenih titula broji rukometni klub Kil. Visok kvalitet rukometne igre i ispunjene tribine razlog su zašto je Bundesliga toliko praćena u celom svetu.

programme.title: Volleyball - Italian League (M): Lube Cvitanova - Trentino, Finals G4 / Odbojka - Italijanska liga (M): Lube Cvitanova - Trentino, finale G4
programme.desc: During the 1980s, the Italian men of the volleyball reaches the popularity of the world's proportions. Investments in volleyball are becoming increasing and large multinational companies thanks to investments in Italian clubs push the Italian series and among the strongest world volleyball leagues. The series called the volleyball NBA, which you contributed to the numerous world-famous volleyball players who played in Italian clubs. At the same time, Italian clubs have dominated European competitions in that period. / Tokom 80ih godina prošlog veka italijanska muška odbojka dostiže popularnost svetskih razmera. Ulaganja u odbojku postaju sve veća i velike multinacionalne kompanije zahvaljujući ulaganjima u italijanske klubove guraju italijansku Seriju A među najjače svetske odbojkaške lige. Serija A se nazvala odbojkaški NBA čemu si doprineli brojni svjetski poznati odbojkaši koji su igrali u italijanskim klubovima. Ujedno italijanski klubovi su dominirali Evropskim takmičenjima u tom periodu.

programme.title: Greatest Sporting Moments / Greatest Sporting Moments
programme.desc: Magazine on the highest moments in the history of sports. / Magazin o najvećim trenucima u istoriji sporta.

programme.title: Football - Switzerland League: Basel - Grasshoppers / Fudbal - Švajcarska liga: Basel - Grasshoppers
programme.desc: The Swiss League is one of the longest leagues in Europe whose first season has started in the 20th. Century and from 1897. Years. Since 2003, the league is played by a ten team where each game with every four games each house and two in the guests. The last team after 36 cars leaves the elite rank of Switzerland football and turns out to another Swiss league. The team with the highest title is Grasshopper Club Zurich with 27, of which 19 are in the period of professionalism. The new millennium marked the base from the Basel with multiple consecutive championship titles and very good results in the Champions League. / Švajcarska liga je jedna od najdugovječnijih liga u Evropi čija je prva sezona krenula još u 20. veku odnosno od 1897. godine. Liga se od 2003. igra po sistemu deset ekipa gde svaki igra sa svakim četiri utakmice po dve kući i dve u gostima. Poslednja ekipa nakon 36 kola napušta elitni rang švajvarskog fudbala i ispada u drugu švajcarsku ligu. Ekipa sa najviše titula je Grasshopper Club Zurich sa 27, od kojih su 19 u razdoblju profesionalizma. Novi milenijum je obeležio klub iz Bazela sa višestrukim uzastopnim titulama prvaka i jako dobrim rezultatima u Ligi šampiona.

programme.title: Atletika: Gold Tour - Ostrava Golden Spike / Atletika: Gold Tour - Ostrava Golden Spike
programme.desc: Follow Ostrava Golden Spike, athletic competition that is held in Ostrava, Czech Republic. The competition is part of the series of the world gold league. / Pratite Ostrava Golden Spike, atletsko takmičenje koje se održava u Ostravi, Češka. Takmičenje je deo serije Svetske zlatne lige.

programme.title: Were two scribes once / Byli jednou dva písaři
programme.desc: France, 19th century: Two elderly Lord, Bouvard (Jiří Sovák) and Pecuchet (Miroslav Horníček) will meet on the bench in the park one afternoon. They are forbidden to find out that both scribes are and have less than a month to pension. In addition, they are associated with the interests of science, literature and art. When Bouvard dies the godfather and leaves him a generous amount, Bouvard remembers his friend, she buys a farm in the countryside, and both go there to indulge in sciences. / Francie, 19. století: Na lavičce v parku se jednoho odpoledne setkají dva postarší pánove, Bouvard (Jiří Sovák) a Pecuchet (Miroslav Horníček). Zapovídají se a zjistí, že jsou oba dva písaři a mají necelý měsíc do penze. Kromě toho je pojí společne zájmy o vědu, literaturu a umění. Když pak Bouvardovi zemře kmotr a odkáže mu velkorysou částku, Bouvard si vzpomene na sveho přítele, zakoupí statek na venkově a oba tam odjedou oddávat se vědám.

programme.title: Darts entertaining: special / Pikado zabava: Poseben
programme.desc: "Darts Party" goes to the third round! The target is ready for excitement, action and plenty of fun! In the third season of "Darts Party", participants in a multi -week tournament fight to enter the big serial finals. In more than 20 dynamic episodes, it is not just a perfect throw - but a path to it: be it on rotating platforms, slippery soils or with flying obstacles - anyone who wants to hit the board must first overcome obstacles. It takes precision, alertness and athletics - which provides spectacular scenes and great fun. Each week, the highlight is a tense weekly finale, in which four daily winners compete. But only one of them qualifies the grand finals. More show. More action. More dots! Turn on and cheer - in the new Darts Party season! / "Darts Party" gre v tretji krog! Tarča je pripravljena za vznemirjenje, akcijo in obilo zabave! V tretji sezoni "Darts Party" se udeleženci v večtedenskem turnirju borijo za vstop v veliki serijski finale. V več kot 20 dinamičnih epizodah ne gre le za popoln met – temveč za pot do tja: naj bo to na vrtečih se platformah, spolzkih tleh ali z letečimi ovirami – kdor želi zadeti tablo, mora najprej premagati ovire. Potrebni so natančnost, zbranost in atletika – kar poskrbi za spektakularne prizore in odlično zabavo. Vsak teden vrhunec predstavlja napet tedenski finale, v katerem se pomerijo štirje dnevni zmagovalci. A le eden izmed njih se uvrsti v veliki finale. Več šova. Več akcije. Več pikada! Vklopite in navijajte – v novi sezoni Darts Party!

programme.title: 1. Zvezna League: Highlights FC Bayern Munchen, season 2024/2025 / 1. zvezna liga: Highlights FC Bayern Munchen, Saison 2024/2025
programme.desc: After one season of break, Bayern again won the championship title. The team around Harry Khan thus won 33. The Bundesliga title in its history. programme.title: Football (M): Werder B. - St. Pauli, Bundesliga 2024/2025 / Nogomet (M): Werder B. - St. Pauli, Bundesliga 2024/2025
programme.desc: With all that Germany has given us throughout history, the Bundesliga proudly stands. In the highest rank of a football competition founded in 1963, 18 teams compete, which start matches for a popular plate every year in August. It was most often won by Bayern Munich, as many as 24 times. The cheerleading culture, full of tribes and top football is what Bundesliga adorns from its beginnings to the present day. Don't miss the opportunity to enjoy the Bundesliga matches. You will definitely not be sorry. / Ob vsem, kar nam je Nemčija skozi zgodovino dala, ponosno stoji tudi Bundesliga. V najvišjem rangu nogometnega tekmovanja, ustanovljenega leta 1963, se pomeri 18 ekip, ki vsako leto v avgustu pričnejo tekme za priljubljeni krožnik. Največkrat ga je osvojil Bayern Munchen, in sicer kar 24-krat. Kultura navijanja, polnih tribin in vrhunskega nogometa je tisto, kar Bundesligo krasi od njenih začetkov do današnjih dni. Ne zamudite priložnosti, da uživate v tekmah Bundeslige. Zagotovo vam ne bo žal.

programme.title: Football (M): Koper - Viking, Qualifications for Conference League 2025/2026 / Nogomet (M): Koper - Viking, Kvalifikacije za Konferenčno ligo 2025/2026
programme.desc: Since 2021, football fans will enjoy the conference league of Europe organized by UEFA. The idea for this league appeared in 2015 and includes a lower ranked team of national championships. The qualifications are divided into two parts, after which 32 teams will enter the competition, which will be divided into eight groups of four each. 16 teams will advance to the eighth finals, then to the quarterfinals, the semifinals and the finals. The winner of the final game will qualify for the European League next season. / Od leta 2021 bodo nogometni navdušenci uživali v Konferenčni ligi Evrope, ki jo organizira UEFA. Ideja za to ligo se je pojavila leta 2015, vključuje pa nižje rangirane ekipe državnih prvenstev. Kvalifikacije so razdeljene na dva dela, po katerih bo v tekmovanje vstopilo 32 ekip, ki bodo razdeljene v osem skupin po štiri. 16 ekip bo napredovalo v osmino finala, nato v četrtfinale, polfinale in finale. Zmagovalec finalne tekme se bo uvrstil v Ligo Evrope v naslednji sezoni.

programme.title: NOGOMET (M): Heidenheim - Bochum, Bundesliga 2024/2025 / Nogomet (M): Heidenheim - Bochum, Bundesliga 2024/2025
programme.desc: With all that Germany has given us throughout history, the Bundesliga proudly stands. In the highest rank of a football competition founded in 1963, 18 teams compete, which start matches for a popular plate every year in August. It was most often won by Bayern Munich, as many as 24 times. The cheerleading culture, full of tribes and top football is what Bundesliga adorns from its beginnings to the present day. Don't miss the opportunity to enjoy the Bundesliga matches. You will definitely not be sorry. / Ob vsem, kar nam je Nemčija skozi zgodovino dala, ponosno stoji tudi Bundesliga. V najvišjem rangu nogometnega tekmovanja, ustanovljenega leta 1963, se pomeri 18 ekip, ki vsako leto v avgustu pričnejo tekme za priljubljeni krožnik. Največkrat ga je osvojil Bayern Munchen, in sicer kar 24-krat. Kultura navijanja, polnih tribin in vrhunskega nogometa je tisto, kar Bundesligo krasi od njenih začetkov do današnjih dni. Ne zamudite priložnosti, da uživate v tekmah Bundeslige. Zagotovo vam ne bo žal.

programme.desc: The second biggest European club basketball competition definitely deserves the attention of lovers of this sport. Although in the shade of Euroleague, Eurocup offers plenty of surprises and quality games. / Drugo največje tekmovanje v evropski klubski košarki si vsekakor zasluži pozornost ljubiteljev tega športa. Čeprav je v senci Evrolige, ponuja Eurocup obilo presenečenj in kakovostne igre.

programme.title: Football (M): Koper - Viking, Qualifications for Conference League 2025/2026 / Nogomet (M): Koper - Viking, Kvalifikacije za Konferenčno ligo 2025/2026
programme.desc: Since 2021, football fans will enjoy the conference league of Europe organized by UEFA. The idea for this league appeared in 2015 and includes a lower ranked team of national championships. The qualifications are divided into two parts, after which 32 teams will enter the competition, which will be divided into eight groups of four each. 16 teams will advance to the eighth finals, then to the quarterfinals, the semifinals and the finals. The winner of the final game will qualify for the European League next season. / Od leta 2021 bodo nogometni navdušenci uživali v Konferenčni ligi Evrope, ki jo organizira UEFA. Ideja za to ligo se je pojavila leta 2015, vključuje pa nižje rangirane ekipe državnih prvenstev. Kvalifikacije so razdeljene na dva dela, po katerih bo v tekmovanje vstopilo 32 ekip, ki bodo razdeljene v osem skupin po štiri. 16 ekip bo napredovalo v osmino finala, nato v četrtfinale, polfinale in finale. Zmagovalec finalne tekme se bo uvrstil v Ligo Evrope v naslednji sezoni.

programme.title: Football (M): Domzale - Maribor, first League Telemach 2025/26 / Nogomet (M): Domzale - Maribor, Prva liga Telemach 2025/26
programme.desc: The Slovenian first league was founded in 1991, after Slovenia became an independent state with the collapse of the former Yugoslavia. By 1990, the Slovenian Republican League was one of the lower leagues in Yugoslav football. Until the breakup of Yugoslavia, only a few clubs played in the highest football rank of the then country. After establishing independence, only two clubs have never dropped out of the highest rank of Slovenian football, namely Celje and Maribor. The league is made up of ten teams, each playing four matches - two at home and two away, the last team on the rankings falls out, and the penultimate in qualifying is fighting for existence. / Slovenska prva liga je bila ustanovljena leta 1991, potem ko je Slovenija z razpadom nekdanje Jugoslavije postala samostojna država. Do leta 1990 je bila slovenska republiška liga ena izmed nižjih lig v jugoslovanskem nogometu. Do razpada Jugoslavije je v najvišjem nogometnem rangu takratne države igralo le nekaj klubov. Po ustanovitvi neodvisnosti le dva kluba nikoli nista izpadla iz najvišjega ranga slovenskega nogometa, in sicer Celje in Maribor. Liga je sestavljena iz desetih moštev, od katerih vsako igra po štiri tekme - dve doma in dve v gosteh, zadnja ekipa na lestvici izpade, predzadnja pa se v kvalifikacijah bori za obstanek.

programme.title: Football (M): Koper - Viking, Qualifications for Conference League 2025/2026 / Nogomet (M): Koper - Viking, Kvalifikacije za Konferenčno ligo 2025/2026
programme.desc: Since 2021, football fans will enjoy the conference league of Europe organized by UEFA. The idea for this league appeared in 2015 and includes a lower ranked team of national championships. The qualifications are divided into two parts, after which 32 teams will enter the competition, which will be divided into eight groups of four each. 16 teams will advance to the eighth finals, then to the quarterfinals, the semifinals and the finals. The winner of the final game will qualify for the European League next season. / Od leta 2021 bodo nogometni navdušenci uživali v Konferenčni ligi Evrope, ki jo organizira UEFA. Ideja za to ligo se je pojavila leta 2015, vključuje pa nižje rangirane ekipe državnih prvenstev. Kvalifikacije so razdeljene na dva dela, po katerih bo v tekmovanje vstopilo 32 ekip, ki bodo razdeljene v osem skupin po štiri. 16 ekip bo napredovalo v osmino finala, nato v četrtfinale, polfinale in finale. Zmagovalec finalne tekme se bo uvrstil v Ligo Evrope v naslednji sezoni.

programme.title: Football (M): Mainz - B. Leverkusen, Bundesliga 2024/2025 / Nogomet (M): Mainz - B. Leverkusen, Bundesliga 2024/2025
programme.desc: With all that Germany has given us throughout history, the Bundesliga proudly stands. In the highest rank of a football competition founded in 1963, 18 teams compete, which start matches for a popular plate every year in August. It was most often won by Bayern Munich, as many as 24 times. The cheerleading culture, full of tribes and top football is what Bundesliga adorns from its beginnings to the present day. Don't miss the opportunity to enjoy the Bundesliga matches. You will definitely not be sorry. / Ob vsem, kar nam je Nemčija skozi zgodovino dala, ponosno stoji tudi Bundesliga. V najvišjem rangu nogometnega tekmovanja, ustanovljenega leta 1963, se pomeri 18 ekip, ki vsako leto v avgustu pričnejo tekme za priljubljeni krožnik. Največkrat ga je osvojil Bayern Munchen, in sicer kar 24-krat. Kultura navijanja, polnih tribin in vrhunskega nogometa je tisto, kar Bundesligo krasi od njenih začetkov do današnjih dni. Ne zamudite priložnosti, da uživate v tekmah Bundeslige. Zagotovo vam ne bo žal.

programme.title: Football (M): Olympia - Celje, first league Telemach 2025/2026 / Nogomet (M): Olimpija - Celje, Prva liga Telemach 2025/2026
programme.desc: The Slovenian first league was founded in 1991, after Slovenia became an independent state with the collapse of the former Yugoslavia. By 1990, the Slovenian Republican League was one of the lower leagues in Yugoslav football. Until the breakup of Yugoslavia, only a few clubs played in the highest football rank of the then country. After establishing independence, only two clubs have never dropped out of the highest rank of Slovenian football, namely Celje and Maribor. The league is made up of ten teams, each playing four matches - two at home and two away, the last team on the rankings falls out, and the penultimate in qualifying is fighting for existence. / Slovenska prva liga je bila ustanovljena leta 1991, potem ko je Slovenija z razpadom nekdanje Jugoslavije postala samostojna država. Do leta 1990 je bila slovenska republiška liga ena izmed nižjih lig v jugoslovanskem nogometu. Do razpada Jugoslavije je v najvišjem nogometnem rangu takratne države igralo le nekaj klubov. Po ustanovitvi neodvisnosti le dva kluba nikoli nista izpadla iz najvišjega ranga slovenskega nogometa, in sicer Celje in Maribor. Liga je sestavljena iz desetih moštev, od katerih vsako igra po štiri tekme - dve doma in dve v gosteh, zadnja ekipa na lestvici izpade, predzadnja pa se v kvalifikacijah bori za obstanek.

programme.title: A simple plan / Ein einfacher Plan
programme.desc: During a foray through the Walder, Hank, his fried brother Jacob and his burned -down friend Lou on a sports aircraft wreck. It must have been under the snow for a while. On board you will only find the little that the kraudes left from the pilot and a bag with $ four million. Certainly drug money that nobody can claim to. Accountant Hank is not enthusiastic about the idea of keeping the money. After all, he can be convinced by the other two, but only on the condition that he keeps the money and the prey is only shared after the police found the wreck and identified the pilot. Hank's wife Sarah also agrees with the simple plan, but soon Sat Sarah distrusts. Can Hank trust the two fools? Do you keep your loose mouth? Were you not seen by someone when they got the bag out? Questions about questions that Hank can only answer with another plan. He goes back to the wreck and leaves a few hundred thousand so that nobody comes up with the idea that there is more. But while Jacob lubricates stands, he loses his nerves and beats an old neighbor dead, who happened to drive past. Now Hank's simple plan is getting a little more complicated: after all, they have to make the body disappear. / Bei einem Streifzug durch die Walder stossen Hank , sein beschrankter Bruder Jacob und dessen abgebrannter Freund Lou auf ein Sportflugzeugwrack. Es muss schon eine Weile unter dem Schnee gelegen haben. An Bord finden sie nur das Wenige, das die Krahen vom Piloten ubrig gelassen haben, und eine Tasche mit vier Millionen Dollar. Sicher Drogengeld, auf das niemand einen Anspruch erheben kann. Buchhalter Hank ist von der Idee, das Geld zu behalten, nicht gerade begeistert. Schliesslich lasst er sich von den anderen beiden uberzeugen, aber nur unter der Bedingung, dass er das Geld aufbewahrt und die Beute erst geteilt wird, nachdem die Polizei das Wrack gefunden und den Piloten identifiziert hat. Dem einfacher Plan stimmt auch Hanks Frau Sarah sofort zu.Doch schon bald sat Sarah Misstrauen. Kann Hank den beiden Deppen trauen? Halten sie ihr loses Mundwerk? Wurden sie nicht von jemandem gesehen, als sie die Tasche herausholten? Fragen uber Fragen, die Hank nur mit einem anderen Plan beantworten kann. Er geht zum Wrack zuruck und lasst ein paar Hunderttausend liegen, damit niemand auf den Gedanken kommt, dass da noch mehr ist. Aber wahrend Jacob Schmiere steht, verliert er die Nerven und schlagt einen alten Nachbarn tot, der zufalligerweise vorbeifahrt. Jetzt wird Hanks einfacher Plan etwas komplizierter: Schliesslich mussen sie die Leiche verschwinden lassen.

programme.title: National 1st August show of the SRG SSR / Nationale 1. August-Sendung der SRG SSR
programme.desc: From a lightning mate in Ticino, track worker in Graubunden, a dragqueen in Lausanne VD to the "SRF Nachtclub" moderator Ralph Wicki: Sven Epiney, Carla Norghauer, Jean-Marc Richard and Corina Schmed take the audience for the National 1st August show of the SRG SSR on an exciting journey through the night. In numerous reports from all language regions, the four moderators encounter people, for whom life in the dark is something very self -confident. Kultband Sens Unik, who is celebrating its brilliant comeback at numerous festivals this summer, as well as the folk music formation Les Welsches. / Von einem Blitzjager im Tessin, Gleisarbeitern in Graubunden, einer Dragqueen in Lausanne VD bis zum «SRF Nachtclub»-Moderator Ralph Wicki: Sven Epiney , Carla Norghauer , Jean-Marc Richard und Corina Schmed nehmen die Zuschauerinnen und Zuschauer fur die nationale 1. August-Sendung der SRG SSR mit auf eine spannende Reise durch die Nacht. In zahlreichen Reportagen aus allen Sprachregionen treffen die vier Moderatorinnen und Moderatoren auf Menschen, fur die das Leben im Dunkeln etwas ganz Selbstverstandliches ist.Weiter entdecken die vier auf zahlreichen Streifzugen das nachtliche Lausanne VD und begegnen dabei unter anderen dem Turmwachter der Kathedrale, der - einer langen Tradition folgend - auch heute noch vom Turm jede Nacht die Stunden ausruft.Fur den passenden musikalischen Rahmen sorgen die Lausanner Kultband Sens Unik, die in diesem Sommer auf zahlreichen Festivals ihr fulminantes Comeback feiert, sowie die Volksmusikformation les Welsches.

programme.title: Conversation on August 1st with Federal Prasident Karin Keller-Sutter / Gesprach zum 1. August mit Bundesprasidentin Karin Keller-Sutter
programme.desc: Talk / Talk

programme.title: Ding Dong - The 10 most fascinating Hauser far from home / Ding Dong - Die 10 faszinierendsten Hauser fern der Heimat
programme.sub-title: Villa der Superreichen und ein Skulpturengarten mit Meerblick
programme.desc: The furnishing of the villa in Bangkok is impressive, but above all the walk-in clothing and accessories rooms, as well as the well-stocked wine cellar. Viola and Jan are really fascinated by the openness of the hosts. After the good food, everyone jumps together in the pool - with the clothes. A visit to the artist Dorte Wehmeyer in Mallorca also ends in the pool. She not only set up her villa with a view of the sea itself, but also turned her entire garden, the "Garden of Tolerance" with her huge sculptures into a work of art. Viola Tami and Jan Fitze have meanwhile visited so many extraordinary and fascinating Hauser with "Ding Dong" that you know exactly which Hauser even have a "wow effect" in the memory. Summer mood on the lake, it is a special pleasure for you to pretend a personal hit parade of the top ten of your most extraordinary foreign adventure. In each episode, they show two homes who have left a lasting impression on them. Which house is your absolute favorite in the Ruckschau, which visit is the most printed encounter into the "thing dong" story and in which house were the two of them loved to spend all summer? These and many other highlights reveal them in the season full of fascinating Hauser far from home. / Die Einrichtung der Villa in Bangkok ist beeindruckend, vor allem aber die begehbaren Kleider- und Accessoires-Zimmer, sowie der gut bestuckte Weinkeller. Richtig fasziniert sind Viola und Jan aber von der Offenheit der Gastgeber. Wie es sich im Sommer gehort, springen nach dem guten Essen alle zusammen in den Pool - mit den Kleidern versteht sich. Ebenfalls im Pool endet der Besuch bei der Kunstlerin Dorte Wehmeyer in Mallorca. Sie hat nicht nur ihre Villa mit Blick aufs Meer selbst eingerichtet, sondern ihren ganzen Garten, den «Garden of Tolerance» mit ihren riesigen Skulpturen in ein Kunstwerk verwandelt.Viola Tami und Jan Fitze haben unterdessen mit «Ding Dong» schon so viele aussergewohnliche und faszinierende Hauser besucht, dass sie genau wissen, welche Hauser sogar in der Erinnerung noch einen «Wow-Effekt» auf sie haben.Jetzt, in entspannter Sommerlaune am See, ist es fur sie ein besonderes Vergnugen, eine personliche Hitparade der Top-Ten ihrer aussergewohnlichsten Auslandabenteuer zu prasentieren. Sie zeigen in jeder Folge zwei Hauser, die bei ihnen einen bleibenden Eindruck hinterlassen haben. Welches Haus ist in der Ruckschau ihr absoluter Favorit, welcher Besuch geht als verruckteste Begegnung in die «Ding Dong»-Geschichte ein und in welchem Haus wurden die beiden wohl am liebsten gleich selbst den ganzen Sommer verbringen? Diese und viele weitere Highlights verraten sie in der Staffel voller faszinierender Hauser fernab der Heimat.

programme.title: Switzerland from above / Die Schweiz von oben
programme.desc: The slow TV format “Switzerland from above” shows the protection of Switzerland from a new perspective in a unique way. This episode shows impressive views of the Bernese Oberland. The viewers fly, among other things, over Niesen and Brienzergrat to Lauterbrunnen Be and Murren Be. «Switzerland from above» - a unique journey through Switzerland. / Das Slow-TV-Format «Schweiz von oben» zeigt auf einzigartige Weise die Schonheit der Schweiz aus einer neuen Perspektive. Diese Episode zeigt eindruckliche Blicke aufs Berner Oberland. Die Zuschauenden fliegen unter anderem uber Niesen und Brienzergrat nach Lauterbrunnen BE und Murren BE.«Schweiz von oben» - eine einzigartige Reise durch die Schweiz.

programme.title: Donnschtig-Jass / Donnschtig-Jass
programme.desc: The “Donnschtig-Jass” goes on a summer tour for the 42nd time: while seven weeks host Rainer Maria Salzgeber, comedian Stefan Buser and referee Sonia Kalin are on the road throughout German Switzerland. The audience awaits the best entertainment - with Jasswettkampfen, musical highlights and prominent personalities. To a guest in the Funften broadcast in Einsiedeln SZ is the SRF moderator Nik Hartmann. The other musical guest are Gola and Megawatts, Trauffer, the SchwiizergooFe and Diana. In the show Jassen The two communities Eglisau ZH and Huntwangen ZH for the host right of the next "Donnschtig-Jass". Anyone who wins from them will decide the best Jassers of the selected communities in five jass rounds. All towns are presented in a local portrait in the programs. The Jass journey continues to the cantons of Zurich and Baselland. In the audience competition, it is called "Kahlen Kuhlen Head": Nik Hartmann competes against Stefan Buser while carving ice cream. Who forms the gentle work of art from a large ice block? Moderator Rainer Maria Salzgeber ride again this year on Friday after the live broadcast with his racing bike to the next venue. On the Funsten stage of Einsiedeln SZ into the Zurcher Unterland, he puts almost 100 kilometers back. / Der «Donnschtig-Jass» geht zum 42. Mal auf Sommertour: Wahrend sieben Wochen sind Gastgeber Rainer Maria Salzgeber, Comedian Stefan Busser und Schiedsrichterin Sonia Kalin in der ganzen Deutschschweiz unterwegs. Das Publikum erwartet beste Unterhaltung - mit Jasswettkampfen, musikalischen Highlights und prominenten Personlichkeiten.Zu Gast in der funften Sendung in Einsiedeln SZ ist der SRF-Moderator Nik Hartmann. Die weiteren musikalischen Gaste sind Gola and Megawatt, Trauffer, die Schwiizergoofe und Diana.In der Sendung jassen die beiden Gemeinden Eglisau ZH und Huntwangen ZH um das Gastgeberrecht des nachsten «Donnschtig-Jass». Wer von ihnen gewinnt, entscheiden die besten Jasserinnen und Jasser der ausgewahlten Gemeinden in funf Jass-Runden. Alle Ortschaften werden in den Sendungen in einem Ortsportrat naher vorgestellt. Weiter fuhrt die Jass-Reise in die Kantone Zurich und Baselland.Im Publikumswettbewerb heisst es «kuhlen Kopf bewahren»: Nik Hartmann tritt beim Eisschnitzen gegen Stefan Busser an. Wer formt aus einem grossen Eisblock das schonere Kunstwerk?Moderator Rainer Maria Salzgeber fahrt auch dieses Jahr jeweils am Freitag nach der Livesendung mit seinem Rennrad zum nachsten Austragungsort. Auf der funften Etappe von Einsiedeln SZ ins Zurcher Unterland legt er knapp 100 Kilometer zuruck.

programme.title: Potzzig / Potzmusig
programme.sub-title: Blasmusik aus dem Theater National Bern
programme.desc: Brass music is not only very popular, but also part of the national folk culture. With 54,000 members, the brass music association is the greatest amateur music association in Switzerland. The SRG SSR invited six clubs to the National Theater in Bern as part of a demand project to professionally record new brass music and thus help the brass music to be a bigger medial platform. From German -speaking Switzerland, the Konkordia Aedermannsdorf and the Musikverein Dietlikon, from Romandie, take part in the fanfare Lancienny and the Fanfare La Dixence Dheremence, from which Ticino the Filarmonica Unione Carvina and from Rator -Romanesque Switzerland Die Musica da Domat. “Potzmusig” has captured the cheapest wind music moments for them. / Blasmusik ist nicht nur sehr beliebt, sondern auch Teil der nationalen Volkskultur. Mit 54000 Mitgliedern ist der Blasmusikverband der grosste Amateurmusikverband der Schweiz. Die SRG SSR hat im Rahmen eines Forderprojekts sechs Vereine ins Theater National in Bern eingeladen, um neue Blasmusik professionell einzuspielen und so der Blasmusik zu einer grosseren medialen Plattform zu verhelfen.Aus der Deutschschweiz nehmen die Konkordia Aedermannsdorf und der Musikverein Dietlikon teil, aus der Romandie die Fanfare LAncienne Courgenay und die Fanfare La Dixence dHeremence, aus dem Tessin die Filarmonica Unione Carvina und aus der ratoromanischen Schweiz die Musica da Domat. «Potzmusig» hat die schonsten Blasmusik-Momente fur Sie eingefangen.

programme.title: The last postillon from St. Gotthard / Der letzte Postillon vom St. Gotthard
programme.desc: Fluelen 1879. The steamship Winkelried overcons the Lake Lucerne and brings passengers for the Gotthardpost. The coachman Johannes Zgraggen can refrain from the day on which he will drive the last stalks over the passport, because the western Swiss engineer Louis Favre is driving an ambitious project on the Gotthard: Between Goshenen and Airolo, the longest railway tunnel in the world is being built between 1872 and 1882, but for the time being, the travelers still have to be brought to Italy. The conductor Kaspar Danioth tries to place the ladies and gentlemen in a possibly conflict -free manner in the four -span of carriage. Because he has reserved telegraphically, the American Steffen gets the gently outdoor area. The newly ground -in Berlin couple must therefore be used with the cabin, while young Angela and her travel well -being, the tunnel engineer Caminata, make themselves comfortable in the middle section. The mail goes off, and soon the lively travel company does not only come to the post. A poacher pursues his illegal craft high up in the mountains. And deep down in the mountain Italian guest workers on the tunnel, who will sustainably cause life on the Gotthard. Two historical data is even thored in the film: On July 18, 1879, the senior engineer Louis Favre died of a heart attack in the middle of the tunnel, and on February 29, 1880, the long-awaited piercing on the Gotthard died. For the covers, however, who had previously requested the passengers in their multi -clamped, post -yellow cars, it was the beginning of the end. The poet Friedrich Schneeberger has immortalized this fact in his melancholic folk song "I am the last postillon from the Gotthard ...". Even today, the melody of the evergreens in manner choirs and radios hunts concerts. And of course the stanzas accompanied by the posthorn are also sung in the film "The last postillon of the St. Gotthard" by the Kutscher Zgraggen when - high up on the go - over the last time he overturned the pass. / Fluelen 1879. Das Dampfschiff Winkelried uberquert den Vierwaldstattersee und bringt Passagiere fur die Gotthardpost. Der Kutscher Johannes Zgraggen kann den Tag absehen, an dem er die letzte Postkutsche uber den Pass fahren wird, denn der Westschweizer Ingenieur Louis Favre treibt am Gotthard ein ehrgeiziges Projekt voran: Zwischen Goschenen und Airolo entsteht zwischen 1872 und 1882 der langste Eisenbahntunnel der Welt.Doch vorerst mussen die Reisenden noch uber den Pass nach Italien gebracht werden. Der Kondukteur Kaspar Danioth versucht, die Damen und Herren moglichst konfliktfrei in der vierspannigen Kutsche zu platzieren. Weil er telegrafisch reserviert hat, bekommt der US-Amerikaner Steffen den schonsten Aussenplatz. Das frisch vermahlte Berliner Paar muss sich deshalb mit der Kabine begnugen, wahrend es sich die junge Angela und ihre Reisebekanntschaft, der Tunnelingenieur Caminata , im Mittelteil bequem machen.Ebenfalls gebucht haben der Bierbrauer Hafeli samt Gemahlin und der zu Reichtum gekommene Muller Torriani . Die Post geht ab, und schon bald hort die muntere Reisegesellschaft nicht nur das Posthorn, sondern auch einen Schuss. Hoch oben im Gebirge geht ein Wilderer seinem ungesetzlichen Handwerk nach. Und tief unten im Berg graben italienische Gastarbeiter am Tunnel, der das Leben am Gotthard nachhaltig verandern wird.In einigen Szenen zeigt Regisseur Heuberger, unter welch schwierigen Bedingungen der Bau des Gotthardtunnels vorangetrieben wurde. Zwei historische Daten werden im Film sogar ausfuhrlich gewurdigt: Am 18. Juli 1879 stirbt mitten im Tunnel der leitende Ingenieur Louis Favre an einem Herzinfarkt, und am 29. Februar 1880 erfolgt der lang ersehnte Durchstich am Gotthard.Die Eroffnung der Gotthard-Eisenbahnlinie am 1. Juni 1882 war ein Freudentag fur Europa. Fur die Kutscher aber, die bisher die Passagiere in ihren mehrspannigen, postgelben Wagen sicher uber den Pass befordert hatten, war es der Anfang vom Ende. Der Dichter Friedrich Schneeberger hat diesen Umstand in seinem melancholischen Volkslied «Ich bin vom Gotthard der letzte Postillon...» verewigt. Noch heute gehort die Melodie zu den Evergreens bei Mannerchoren und Radiowunschkonzerten. Und naturlich werden die vom Posthorn begleiteten Strophen auch im Film «Der letzte Postillon vom St. Gotthard» vom Kutscher Zgraggen gesungen, wenn er - hoch oben auf dem Bock - zum letzten Mal den Pass uberquert.

programme.title: Ding Dong - The 10 most fascinating Hauser far from home / Ding Dong - Die 10 faszinierendsten Hauser fern der Heimat
programme.sub-title: Villa der Superreichen und ein Skulpturengarten mit Meerblick
programme.desc: The furnishing of the villa in Bangkok is impressive, but above all the walk-in clothing and accessories rooms, as well as the well-stocked wine cellar. Viola and Jan are really fascinated by the openness of the hosts. After the good food, everyone jumps together in the pool - with the clothes. A visit to the artist Dorte Wehmeyer in Mallorca also ends in the pool. She not only set up her villa with a view of the sea itself, but also turned her entire garden, the "Garden of Tolerance" with her huge sculptures into a work of art. Viola Tami and Jan Fitze have meanwhile visited so many extraordinary and fascinating Hauser with "Ding Dong" that you know exactly which Hauser even have a "wow effect" in the memory. Summer mood on the lake, it is a special pleasure for you to pretend a personal hit parade of the top ten of your most extraordinary foreign adventure. In each episode, they show two homes who have left a lasting impression on them. Which house is your absolute favorite in the Ruckschau, which visit is the most printed encounter into the "thing dong" story and in which house were the two of them loved to spend all summer? These and many other highlights reveal them in the season full of fascinating Hauser far from home. / Die Einrichtung der Villa in Bangkok ist beeindruckend, vor allem aber die begehbaren Kleider- und Accessoires-Zimmer, sowie der gut bestuckte Weinkeller. Richtig fasziniert sind Viola und Jan aber von der Offenheit der Gastgeber. Wie es sich im Sommer gehort, springen nach dem guten Essen alle zusammen in den Pool - mit den Kleidern versteht sich. Ebenfalls im Pool endet der Besuch bei der Kunstlerin Dorte Wehmeyer in Mallorca. Sie hat nicht nur ihre Villa mit Blick aufs Meer selbst eingerichtet, sondern ihren ganzen Garten, den «Garden of Tolerance» mit ihren riesigen Skulpturen in ein Kunstwerk verwandelt.Viola Tami und Jan Fitze haben unterdessen mit «Ding Dong» schon so viele aussergewohnliche und faszinierende Hauser besucht, dass sie genau wissen, welche Hauser sogar in der Erinnerung noch einen «Wow-Effekt» auf sie haben.Jetzt, in entspannter Sommerlaune am See, ist es fur sie ein besonderes Vergnugen, eine personliche Hitparade der Top-Ten ihrer aussergewohnlichsten Auslandabenteuer zu prasentieren. Sie zeigen in jeder Folge zwei Hauser, die bei ihnen einen bleibenden Eindruck hinterlassen haben. Welches Haus ist in der Ruckschau ihr absoluter Favorit, welcher Besuch geht als verruckteste Begegnung in die «Ding Dong»-Geschichte ein und in welchem Haus wurden die beiden wohl am liebsten gleich selbst den ganzen Sommer verbringen? Diese und viele weitere Highlights verraten sie in der Staffel voller faszinierender Hauser fernab der Heimat.

programme.title: Burgundy - hidden jewel / Burgund - Verborgenes Juwel
programme.desc: In the east of France is the Burgund region, known for its wines and the world -famous mustard, which is named after its capital Dijon. The historic city of Tournus with its narrow streets, picturesque bursts and its Romanesque abbey church is reminiscent of a rich past. / Im Osten Frankreichs liegt die Region Burgund, bekannt fur ihre Weine und den weltberuhmten Senf, der nach ihrer Hauptstadt Dijon benannt ist. Die geschichtstrachtige Stadt Tournus mit ihren engen Gassen, malerischen Platzen und ihrer romanischen Abteikirche erinnert an eine reiche Vergangenheit.

programme.title: Window for Sunday / Fenster zum Sonntag
programme.desc: He is young, sporty and energetic, in the church as well as in the job he goes full throttle. Dominique Hirschi wants to learn a dream and kitesurfing before starting a new job. For this he travels to Egypt with a friend. He is on a board for the first time on the Red Sea - he is pulled by a steering kite. Everything goes well on the first day - but on the second evening an unexpected strong wind comes up and Dominique loses control - he wants to pull the security lines, but it gets tangled. It is thrown uncontrollably through the air and fell into shallow water from six to seven meters high. At that moment Dominique is thinking about how he has already lost his life, but kitesurfers pull it out of the water. 48 hours later, after an operation in the intensive care unit in Nottwil LU, he learns that he was aware of the right. Dominique is again professionally. A new matter of the heart of him is to accompany other affected people at eye -high. He does this in the Mypeer association: affected coaches affected. / Er ist jung, sportlich und energiegeladen, in der Kirche wie auch im Job gibt er Vollgas. Vor einem neuen Stellenantritt will Dominique Hirschi sich unbedingt einen Traum erfullen und Kitesurfen lernen. Dafur reist er mit einem Freund nach Ägypten. Am roten Meer steht er zum ersten Mal auf einem Board - er wird dabei von einem Lenkdrachen (engl. «kite») gezogen. Am ersten Tag verlauft alles gut - doch am zweiten Abend kommt ein unerwarteter starker Wind auf und Dominique verliert die Kontrolle - er will die Sicherheitsleine ziehen, aber diese verheddert sich. Unkontrolliert wird er durch die Luft geschleudert und sturzt aus sechs bis sieben Metern Hohe in seichtes Wasser. In diesem Moment denkt Dominique daruber nach, wie er sein Leben bereits verloren hat, doch Kitesurfer ziehen ihn aus dem Wasser. 48 Stunden spater, nach einer Operation auf der Intensivstation in Nottwil LU, erfahrt er, dass er vom Rucken abwarts gelahmt ist.Gut zehn Jahre sind vergangen. Dominique ist wieder berufstatig. Eine neue Herzensangelegenheit von ihm ist es, andere Betroffene auf Augenhohe zu begleiten. Dies tut er in der Vereinigung mypeer: Betroffene coachen Betroffene.

programme.title: Contrasts / Cuntrasts

programme.title: healthy / gesundheitheute
programme.desc: With increasing age there are also typical wear and tear on the eye. The gray star, medically cataract, is an entry of the eye lens, which increasingly makes the vision of vision increasingly difficult. About every fifth person in Switzerland over 65 years is affected. The view is then comparable to that through a dirty window. In a standardized operation, the trubbed lens is replaced by an artificial lens. “Health today” accompanies a man during this intervention and a woman in whom both a lens trub and a weak weakness could be corrected. But what if it suddenly fails bushes? In medicine, this phanoma is referred to as an alopecia areata - also known as a circular hair loss. "Health today" took up the topic in November and showed how those affected deal with hair loss. In today's edition, the focus is on a woman who had almost completely lost her hair due to the disease. This is the hair again of innovative medical therapy - a moving example of new hope at Alopecia Area, but the side effects can be considerable. / Mit zunehmendem Alter zeigen sich auch am Auge typische Abnutzungserscheinungen. Der Graue Star, medizinisch Katarakt, ist eine Eintrubung der Augenlinse, die das Sehvermogen zunehmend erschwert. Etwa jede funfte Person in der Schweiz uber 65 Jahren ist davon betroffen. Die Sicht ist dann vergleichbar mit der durch ein schmutziges Fenster.In einer standardisierten Operation wird die getrubte Linse durch eine Kunstlinse ersetzt. «GESUNDHEITHEUTE» begleitet einen Mann wahrend dieses Eingriffs und eine Frau, bei der sowohl eine Linsentrubung als auch eine Sehschwache korrigiert werden konnten.Alopecia areata Volles, glanzendes Haar steht fur Gesundheit und Attraktivitat. Was aber, wenn es plotzlich buschelweise ausfallt? Dieses Phanomen wird in der Medizin als Alopecia areata bezeichnet - auch bekannt als kreisrunder Haarausfall.«GESUNDHEITHEUTE» griff das Thema bereits im November auf und zeigte, wie Betroffene mit dem Haarverlust umgehen. In der heutigen Ausgabe steht eine Frau im Mittelpunkt, die aufgrund der Erkrankung fast vollstandig ihre Haare verloren hatte.Dank einer innovativen medizinischen Therapie wuchsen die Haare wieder nach - ein bewegendes Beispiel fur neue Hoffnung bei Alopecia areata, doch die Nebenwirkungen konnen erheblich sein.

programme.title: Wine tasting for the beginning / Weinprobe fur Anfanger
programme.desc: Bernard Campan is Jacques, a grey -grave wine handler who, despite numerous health problems, is determined to further overlook his demanding profession. One day he meets his master in Hortense (Isabelle Carre). Tagsuber nurse, a volunteer at night, she comes to Jacques shop to get a bottle of wine for the residents of a homeless shelter. Hortense is selfless for disadvantaged and failed existence; However, if it were after her ruling mother (Geneviève mnich), she was finally looking for herself and looking for the right thing for the family base. And actually what follows is an ER-WILT-SIE-SIEN-MIC-MIC-NON when Hortense takes part in Jacques wine tasting workshop and fly the sparks. But soon it turns out that Hortense has its own ambitions that give up both their potential admirers and her pious mother. / Bernard Campan ist Jacques, ein griesgramiger Weinhandler, der trotz zahlreicher gesundheitlicher Probleme entschlossen ist, seinen fordernden Beruf weiter auszuuben. Eines Tages trifft er in Hortense (Isabelle Carre) seinen Meister. Tagsuber Krankenschwester, nachts ehrenamtliche Helferin, kommt sie in Jacques Laden vorbei, um eine Flasche Wein fur die Bewohner eines Obdachlosenheims zu besorgen.Hortense engagiert sich selbstlos fur Benachteiligte und gescheiterte Existenzen; ginge es allerdings nach ihrer herrschsuchtigen Mutter (Geneviève Mnich), wurde sie endlich fur sich selber schauen und nach dem Richtigen fur die Familiengrundung suchen.Und tatsachlich, was folgt, ist ein Er-Will-Mich-Sie-Will-Mich-Nicht, als Hortense an Jacques Weinverkostungs-Workshop teilnimmt und die Funken fliegen. Doch schon bald stellt sich heraus, dass Hortense eigene Ambitionen hat, die sowohl ihren potenziellen Verehrer als auch ihre fromme Mutter uberraschen.
